h4.p: [03] 1^b^.^eb^ saḷāyatanavaggassa ^a^V3.0001^ea^ ^a^M3.0001^ea^ ^a^P2.0354^ea^ paṭhame ^b^cakkhu^eb^nti dve cakkhūni -- ñāṇacakkhu ceva maṃsacakkhu ca. tattha ^b^ñāṇacakkhu^eb^ pañcavidhaṃ -- buddhacakkhu, dhammacakkhu, samantacakkhu, dibbacakkhu, paññācakkhūti. tesu buddhacakkhu nāma āsayānusayañāṇañceva indriyaparopariyattañāṇañca, yaṃ -- ``buddhacakkhunā lokaṃ volokento''ti (mahāva0 9; ma0 ni0 1.283; 2.338) āgataṃ ^a^V3.0002^ea^. dhammacakkhu nāma heṭṭhimā tayo maggā tīṇi ca phalāni, yaṃ -- ``virajaṃ vītamalaṃ dhammacakkhuṃ udapādī''ti (mahāva0 16; ma0 ni0 2.395) āgataṃ. samantacakkhu nāma sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ, yaṃ -- ``pāsādamāruyha samantacakkhū''ti (mahāva0 8; ma0 ni0 1.282; 2.338) āgataṃ. dibbacakkhu nāma ālokapharaṇena uppannaṃ ñāṇaṃ, yaṃ -- ``dibbena cakkhunā visuddhenā''ti (pārā0 13; ma0 ni0 2.341) āgataṃ. paññācakkhu nāma catusaccaparicchedakañāṇaṃ, yaṃ -- ``cakkhuṃ udapādī''ti (sa0 ni0 5.1081; mahāva0 15) āgataṃ.

[03] ^b^maṃsacakkhupi^eb^ ^a^M3.0002^ea^ duvidhaṃ -- sasambhāracakkhu, pasādacakkhūti. tesu yvāyaṃ akkhikūpake akkhipaṭalehi parivārito maṃsapiṇḍo, yattha catasso dhātuyo vaṇṇagandharasojā sambhavo jīvitaṃ bhāvo cakkhupasādo kāyapasādoti saṅkhepato terasa sambhārā honti. vitthārato pana catasso dhātuyo vaṇṇagandharasojā sambhavoti ime nava catusamuṭṭhānavasena chattiṃsa, jīvitaṃ bhāvo cakkhupasādo kāyapasādoti ime kammasamuṭṭhānā tāva cattāroti cattārīsa sambhārā honti. idaṃ sasambhāracakkhu ^a^P2.0355^ea^ nāma. yaṃ panettha setamaṇḍalaparicchinnena kaṇhamaṇḍalena parivārite diṭṭhimaṇḍale sanniviṭṭhaṃ rūpadassanasamatthaṃ pasādamattaṃ, idaṃ pasādacakkhu nāma. tassa tato paresañca sotādīnaṃ vitthārakathā visuddhimagge vuttāva.

[03] tattha yadidaṃ pasādacakkhu, taṃ gahetvā bhagavā -- ^b^cakkhuṃ, bhikkhave, anicca^eb^ntiādimāha. tattha -- ``catūhi kāraṇehi aniccaṃ udayabbayavantatāyā''tiādinā nayena vitthārakathā heṭṭhā pakāsitāyeva. ^b^sotampi^eb^ pasādasotameva adhippetaṃ, tathā ^b^ghānajivhākāyā. mano^eb^ti tebhūmakasammasanacāracittaṃ. iti idaṃ suttaṃ chasu ajjhattikāyatanesu tīṇi lakkhaṇāni dassetvā kathite bujjhanakānaṃ ajjhāsayena vuttaṃ.
[03] 2-3^b^.^eb^ dutiyaṃ dve lakkhaṇāni, tatiyaṃ ekalakkhaṇaṃ dassetvā kathite bujjhanakānaṃ ajjhāsayena vuttaṃ. sesāni pana tehi sallakkhitāni vā ettakeneva vā sallakkhessantīti.

[03] 4-6^b^.^eb^ catutthe ^a^V3.0003^ea^ ^b^rūpagandharasaphoṭṭhabbā^eb^ catusamuṭṭhānā, ^b^saddo^eb^ dvisamuṭṭhāno, ^b^dhammā^eb^ti tebhūmakadhammārammaṇaṃ. idampi bāhiresu chasu āyatanesu tilakkhaṇaṃ dassetvā kathite bujjhanakānaṃ vasena vuttaṃ. pañcame chaṭṭhe ca dutiyatatiyesu vuttasadisova nayo.
[03] 7-12^b^.^eb^ sattamādīni ^a^M3.0003^ea^ atītānāgatesu cakkhādīsu aniccalakkhaṇādīni sallakkhetvā paccuppannesu balavagāhena kilamantānaṃ vasena vuttāni. sesaṃ sabbattha heṭṭhā vuttanayamevāti.
[06] aniccavaggo paṭhamo.

[03] 13-16^b^.^eb^ yamakavaggassa ^a^P2.0356^ea^ paṭhamadutiyesu ^b^ajjhattikāna^eb^nti ajjhattajjhattavasena ajjhattikānaṃ. so pana nesaṃ ajjhattikabhāvo chandarāgassa adhimattabalavatāya veditabbo. manussānañhi antogharaṃ viya cha ajjhattikāyatanāni, gharūpacāraṃ viya cha bāhirāyatanāni. yathā nesaṃ puttadāradhanadhaññapuṇṇe antoghare chandarāgo adhimattabalavā hoti, tattha kassaci pavisituṃ na denti, appamattena bhājanasaddamattenāpi ``kiṃ eta''nti? vattāro bhavanti. evamevaṃ chasu ajjhattikesu āyatanesu adhimattabalavachandarāgoti. iti imāya chandarāgabalavatāya tāni ``ajjhattikānī''ti vuttāni. gharūpacāre pana no tathā balavā hoti, tattha carante manussepi catuppadānipi na sahasā nivārenti. kiñcāpi na nivārenti, anicchantā pana pasupacchimattampi gahituṃ na denti. iti nesaṃ tattha na adhimattabalavachandarāgo hoti. rūpādīsupi tatheva na adhimattabalavachandarāgo, tasmā tāni ``bāhirānī''ti vuttāni. vitthārato ^a^V3.0004^ea^ pana ajjhattikabāhirakathā visuddhimagge vuttāva. sesaṃ dvīsupi suttesu heṭṭhā vuttanayameva. tathā tatiyacatutthesu.

[03] 17-18^b^.^eb^ pañcame ^b^nissaṭā^eb^ti nikkhantā. ^b^visaññuttā^eb^ti nosaṃyuttā. ^b^vippamuttā^eb^ti no adhimuttā ^b^vimariyādīkatena cetasā^eb^ti nimmariyādīkatena cetasā. yañhi kilesajātaṃ vā vaṭṭaṃ vā appahīnaṃ hoti, tena ^a^M3.0004^ea^ sekhānaṃ cittaṃ samariyādīkataṃ nāma. yaṃ pahīnaṃ, tena vimariyādīkataṃ. idha pana sabbaso kilesānañceva vaṭṭassa ca pahīnattā vimariyādīkatena ^a^P2.0357^ea^ kilesavaṭṭamariyādaṃ atikkantena cittena vihariṃsūti attho. chaṭṭhepi eseva nayo. chasupi panetesu suttesu catusaccameva kathitanti veditabbaṃ.
[03] 19-22^b^.^eb^ sattamādīsu catūsu vaṭṭavivaṭṭameva kathitaṃ. anupubbakathā pana nesaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbāti.
[06] yamakavaggo dutiyo.
[03] 23^b^.^eb^ sabbavaggassa paṭhame ^b^sabbaṃ vo, bhikkhave^eb^ti sabbaṃ nāma catubbidhaṃ -- sabbasabbaṃ, āyatanasabbaṃ, sakkāyasabbaṃ, padesasabbanti. tattha --
[21] ``na tassa addiṭṭhamidhātthi kiñci,
[27] atho aviññātamajānitabbaṃ.
[26] sabbaṃ ^a^V3.0005^ea^ abhiññāsi yadatthi neyyaṃ,
[22] tathāgato tena samantacakkhū''ti.. (mahāni0 156; cūḷani0 dhotakamāṇavapucchāniddeso 32; paṭi0 ma0 1.121) --

[25] idaṃ sabbasabbaṃ nāma. ``sabbaṃ vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi, taṃ suṇāthā''ti (saṃ0 ni0 4.24) idaṃ āyatanasabbaṃ nāma. ``sabbadhammamūlapariyāyaṃ vo, bhikkhave, desessāmī''ti (ma0 ni0 1.1) idaṃ sakkāyasabbaṃ nāma. ``sabbadhammesu vā pana paṭhamasamannāhāro uppajjati cittaṃ mano mānasaṃ...pe0... tajjāmanodhātū''ti idaṃ padesasabbaṃ nāma. iti pañcārammaṇamattaṃ padesasabbaṃ. tebhūmakadhammā sakkāyasabbaṃ. catubhūmakadhammā āyatanasabbaṃ. yaṃkiñci neyyaṃ sabbasabbaṃ. padesasabbaṃ sakkāyasabbaṃ ^a^M3.0005^ea^ na pāpuṇāti, sakkāyasabbaṃ āyatanasabbaṃ na pāpuṇāti, āyatanasabbaṃ sabbasabbaṃ na pāpuṇāti. kasmā? sabbaññutaññāṇassa ayaṃ nāma dhammo ārammaṇaṃ na hotīti natthitāya. imasmiṃ pana sutte āyatanasabbaṃ adhippetaṃ.

[03] ^b^paccakkhāyā^eb^ti ^a^P2.0358^ea^ paṭikkhipitvā. ^b^vācāvatthukamevassā^eb^ti, vācāya vattabbavatthumattakameva bhaveyya. imāni pana dvādasāyatanāni atikkamitvā ayaṃ nāma añño sabhāvadhammo atthīti dassetuṃ na sakkuṇeyya. ^b^puṭṭho ca na sampāyeyyā^eb^ti, ``katamaṃ aññaṃ sabbaṃ nāmā''ti? pucchito, ``idaṃ nāmā''ti vacanena sampādetuṃ na sakkuṇeyya. ^b^vighātaṃ āpajjeyyā^eb^ti dukkhaṃ āpajjeyya. ^b^yathā taṃ, bhikkhave, avisayasmi^eb^nti ettha ^b^ta^eb^nti nipātamattaṃ. ^b^yathā^eb^ti kāraṇavacanaṃ, yasmā avisaye puṭṭhoti attho. avisayasmiñhi sattānaṃ vighātova hoti, kūṭāgāramattaṃ silaṃ sīsena ukkhipitvā gambhīre udake taraṇaṃ avisayo, tathā candimasūriyānaṃ ākaḍḍhitvā pātanaṃ, tasmiṃ avisaye vāyamanto vighātameva āpajjati, evaṃ imasmimpi avisaye vighātameva āpajjeyyāti adhippāyo.

[03] 24^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^b^sabbappahānāyā^eb^ti sabbassa pahānāya. ^b^cakkhusamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayita^eb^nti cakkhusamphassaṃ mūlapaccayaṃ katvā uppannā sampaṭicchanasantīraṇavoṭṭhabbanajavanavedanā. cakkhuviññāṇasampayuttāya ^a^V3.0006^ea^ pana vattabbameva natthi. sotadvārādivedanāpaccayādīsupi eseva nayo. ettha pana ^b^mano^eb^ti bhavaṅgacittaṃ. ^b^dhammā^eb^ti ārammaṇaṃ. ^b^manoviññāṇa^eb^nti sahāvajjanakajavanaṃ. ^b^manosamphasso^eb^ti bhavaṅgasahajāto samphasso. ^b^vedayita^eb^nti sahāvajjanavedanāya javanavedanā. bhavaṅgasampayuttāya pana vattabbameva natthi. āvajjanaṃ bhavaṅgato amocetvā ^b^mano^eb^ti sahāvajjanena bhavaṅgaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^dhammā^eb^ti ārammaṇaṃ. ^b^manoviññāṇa^eb^nti javanaviññāṇaṃ. ^b^manosamphasso^eb^ti bhavaṅgasahajāto samphasso. ^b^vedayita^eb^nti javanasahajātā vedanā. sahāvajjanena bhavaṅgasahajātāpi vaṭṭatiyeva. yā panettha desanā anusiṭṭhiāṇā, ayaṃ paṇṇatti nāmāti.

[03] 25^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^a^M3.0006^ea^ ^a^P2.0359^ea^ ^b^sabbaṃ abhiññā pariññā pahānāyā^eb^ti sabbaṃ abhijānitvā parijānitvā pajahanatthāya. ^b^abhiññā pariññā pahātabba^eb^nti abhijānitvā parijānitvā pahātabbaṃ. sesaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.

[03] 26^b^.^eb^ catutthe ^b^anabhijānaṃ aparijānaṃ avirājayaṃ appajaha^eb^nti anabhijānanto aparijānanto avirājento appajahanto. ettha ca ^b^avirājento^eb^ti avigacchāpento. iti imasmiṃ sutte tissopi pariññā kathitā honti. ``abhijāna''nti hi vacanena ñātapariññā kathitā, ``parijāna''nti vacanena tīraṇapariññā, ``virājayaṃ pajaha''nti dvīhi pahānapariññāti.

[03] 27^b^.^eb^ pañcame ^b^cakkhuviññāṇaviññātabbā dhammā^eb^ti heṭṭhā gahitarūpameva gahetvā dasseti. heṭṭhā vā āpāthagataṃ gahitaṃ, idha anāpāthagataṃ. idaṃ panettha sanniṭṭhānaṃ -- heṭṭhā āpāthagatampi anāpāthagatampi gahitameva, idha pana cakkhuviññāṇasampayuttā tayo khandhā. te hi cakkhuviññāṇena ^a^V3.0007^ea^ saha viññātabbattā ``cakkhuviññāṇaviññātabbā''ti vuttā. sesapadesupi eseva nayo.

[03] 28^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhe ^b^gayāsīse^eb^ti gayāgāmassa hi avidūre gayāti ekā pokkharaṇīpi atthi nadīpi, gayāsīsanāmako hatthikumbhasadiso piṭṭhipāsāṇopi, yattha bhikkhusahassassapi okāso pahoti, bhagavā tattha viharati. tena vuttaṃ ``gayāsīse''ti. ^b^bhikkhū āmantesī^eb^ti tesaṃ sappāyadhammadesanaṃ vicinitvā taṃ desessāmīti āmantesi.

[03] tatrāyaṃ anupubbikathā -- ito kira dvānavutikappe mahindo nāma rājā ahosi. tassa jeṭṭhaputto phusso nāma. so pūritapāramī pacchimabhavikasatto, paripākagate ñāṇe bodhimaṇḍaṃ āruyha ^a^P2.0360^ea^ sabbaññutaṃ paṭivijjhi ^a^M3.0007^ea^. rañño kaniṭṭhaputto tassa aggasāvako ahosi, purohitaputto dutiyasāvako. rājā cintesi -- ``mayhaṃ jeṭṭhaputto nikkhamitvā buddho jāto, kaniṭṭhaputto aggasāvako, purohitaputto dutiyasāvako''ti. so ``amhākaṃyeva buddho, amhākaṃ dhammo, amhākaṃ saṅgho''ti vihāraṃ kāretvā vihāradvārakoṭṭhakato yāva attano gharadvārā ubhato veḷubhittikuṭikāhi parikkhipitvā matthake suvaṇṇatārakakhacitasamosaritagandhadāmamālādāmavitānaṃ bandhāpetvā heṭṭhā rajatavaṇṇaṃ vālukaṃ santharitvā pupphāni vikirāpetvā tena maggena bhagavato āgamanaṃ kāresi.

[03] satthā vihārasmiṃyeva ṭhito cīvaraṃ pārupitvā antosāṇiyāva saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṅghena rājagehaṃ āgacchati, katabhattakicco antosāṇiyāva gacchati. koci kaṭacchubhikkhāmattampi dātuṃ na labhati. tato nāgarā ujjhāyiṃsu, ``buddho loke uppanno, na ca mayaṃ puññāni kātuṃ labhāma. yathā hi candimasūriyā sabbesaṃ ālokaṃ karonti, evaṃ buddhā nāma sabbesaṃ hitatthāya uppajjanti, ayaṃ pana rājā sabbesaṃ puññacetanaṃ attanoyeva anto pavesetī''ti.

[03] tassa ca rañño aññe tayo puttā atthi. nāgarā tehi saddhiṃ ekato hutvā sammantayiṃsu, ``rājakulehi saddhiṃ aṭṭo nāma natthi, ekaṃ upāyaṃ karomā''ti. te paccante core ^a^V3.0008^ea^ uṭṭhāpetvā, ``katipayā gāmā pahaṭā''ti sāsanaṃ āharāpetvā rañño ārocayiṃsu. rājā putte pakkosāpetvā``tātā, ahaṃ mahallako, gacchatha core vūpasamethā''ti pesesi. payuttacorā ito cito ca avippakiritvā tesaṃ santikameva āgacchiṃsu. te anāvāse gāme vāsetvā ``vūpasamitā corā''ti āgantvā rājānaṃ vanditvā aṭṭhaṃsu.

[01] rājā tuṭṭho ``tātā, varaṃ vo demī''ti āha. te adhivāsetvā gantvā nāgarehi saddhiṃ mantayiṃsu, ``raññā amhākaṃ varo dinno. kiṃ gaṇhāmā''ti? ayyaputtā, tumhākaṃ hatthiassādayo na dullabhā ^a^P2.0361^ea^, buddharatanaṃ pana dullabhaṃ, na sabbakālaṃ uppajjati, tumhākaṃ jeṭṭhabhātikassa phussabuddhassa paṭijagganavaraṃ gaṇhathāti. te ``evaṃ karissāmā''ti nāgarānaṃ paṭissuṇitvā ^a^M3.0008^ea^ katamassukammā sunhātā suvilittā rañño santikaṃ gantvā, ``deva, no varaṃ dethā''ti yāciṃsu. kiṃ gaṇhissatha tātāti? deva, amhākaṃ hatthiassādīhi attho natthi, jeṭṭhabhātikassa no phussabuddhassa paṭijagganavaraṃ dethāti. ``ayaṃ varo na sakkā mayā jīvamānena dātu''nti dve kaṇṇe pidahi. ``deva, na tumhe amhehi balakkārena varaṃ dāpitā, tumhehi attano ruciyā tuṭṭhehi dinno. kiṃ, deva, rājakulassa dve kathā vaṭṭantī''ti? saccavāditāya bhaṇiṃsu.

[03] rājā vinivattituṃ alabhanto -- ``tātā, satta saṃvacchare satta māse satta ca divase upaṭṭhahitvā tumhākaṃ dassāmī''ti āha. ``sundaraṃ, deva, pāṭibhogaṃ dethā''ti. ``kissa pāṭibhogaṃ tātā''ti? ``ettakaṃ kālaṃ amaraṇapāṭibhogaṃ devā''ti. ``tātā, ayuttaṃ pāṭibhogaṃ dāpetha, na sakkā evaṃ pāṭibhogaṃ dātuṃ, tiṇagge ussāvabindusadisaṃ sattānaṃ jīvita''nti. ``no ce, deva, pāṭibhogaṃ detha, mayaṃ antarā matā kiṃ kusalaṃ karissāmā''ti? ``tena hi, tātā, cha saṃvaccharāni dethā''ti. ``na sakkā, devā''ti. ``tena hi pañca, cattāri, tīṇi, dve, ekaṃ saṃvaccharaṃ detha''. ``satta, cha māse detha...pe0... māsaḍḍhamattaṃ dethā''ti. ``na sakkā, devā''ti. ``tena hi sattadivasamattaṃ dethā''ti. ``sādhu, devāti satta divase sampaṭicchiṃsu''. rājā satta saṃvacchare satta māse satta divase kattabbasakkāraṃ sattasuyeva divasesu akāsi.

[03] tato puttānaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ satthāraṃ pesetuṃ aṭṭhausabhavitthataṃ maggaṃ alaṅkārāpesi, majjhaṭṭhāne catūsabhappamāṇaṃ ^a^V3.0009^ea^ padesaṃ hatthīhi maddāpetvā kasiṇamaṇḍalasadisaṃ katvā vālukāya santharāpetvā pupphābhikiṇṇamakāsi, tattha tattha kadaliyo ca puṇṇaghaṭe ca ṭhapāpetvā dhajapaṭākā ^a^P2.0362^ea^ ukkhipāpesi. usabhe usabhe pokkharaṇiṃ khaṇāpesi, aparabhāge dvīsu passesu gandhamālāpupphāpaṇe pasārāpesi. majjhaṭṭhāne catūsabhavitthārassa alaṅkatamaggassa ubhosu passesu dve dve usabhavitthāre magge khāṇukaṇṭake harāpetvā daṇḍadīpikāyo kārāpesi. rājaputtāpi attano āṇāpavattiṭṭhāne soḷasausabhamaggaṃ tatheva alaṅkārāpesuṃ.

[01] rājā ^a^M3.0009^ea^ attano āṇāpavattiṭṭhānassa kedārasīmaṃ gantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā paridevamāno, ``tātā, mayhaṃ dakkhiṇakkhiṃ uppāṭetvā gaṇhantā viya gacchatha, evaṃ gaṇhitvā gatā pana buddhānaṃ anucchavikaṃ kareyyātha. mā surāsoṇḍā viya pamattā vicaritthā''ti āha. te ``jānissāma mayaṃ, devā''ti satthāraṃ gahetvā gatā, vihāraṃ kāretvā satthu niyyātetvā tattha satthāraṃ paṭijaggantā kālena therāsane, kālena majjhimāsane, kālena saṅghanavakāsane tiṭṭhanti. dānaṃ upaparikkhamānānaṃ tiṇṇampi janānaṃ ekasadisameva ahosi. te upakaṭṭhāya vassūpanāyikāya cintayiṃsu -- ``kathaṃ nu kho satthu ajjhāsayaṃ gaṇheyyāmā''ti? atha nesaṃ etadahosi -- ``buddhā nāma dhammagaruno, na āmisagaruno, sīle patiṭṭhamānā mayaṃ satthu ajjhāsayaṃ gahetuṃ sakkhissāmā''ti dānasaṃvidhāyake manusse pakkosāpetvā, ``tātā, imināva nīhārena yāgubhattakhādanīyādīni sampādentā dānaṃ pavattethā''ti vatvā dānasaṃvidahanapalibodhaṃ chindiṃsu.

[03] atha nesaṃ jeṭṭhabhātā pañcasate purise ādāya dasasu sīlesu patiṭṭhāya dve kāsāyāni acchādetvā kappiyaṃ udakaṃ paribhuñjamāno vāsaṃ kappesi. majjhimo tīhi, kaniṭṭho dvīhi purisasatehi saddhiṃ tatheva paṭipajji. te yāvajīvaṃ satthāraṃ upaṭṭhahiṃsu. satthā tesaṃyeva santike parinibbāyi.

[03] tepi kālaṃ katvā tato paṭṭhāya dvānavutikappe manussalokato devalokaṃ, devalokato ca manussalokaṃ saṃsarantā amhākaṃ satthukāle devalokā cavitvā manussaloke nibbattiṃsu. tesaṃ dānagge byāvaṭo mahāamacco aṅgamagadhānaṃ rājā bimbisāro hutvā nibbatti. te tasseva rañño raṭṭhe ^a^P2.0363^ea^ brāhmaṇamahāsālakule nibbattiṃsu. jeṭṭhabhātā jeṭṭhova jāto, majjhimakaniṭṭhā majjhimakaniṭṭhāyeva. yepi tesaṃ parivāramanussā, te parivāramanussāva jātā. te vuddhimanvāya tayopi ^a^V3.0010^ea^ janā taṃ purisasahassaṃ ādāya nikkhamitvā tāpasā hutvā uruvelāyaṃ nadītīreyeva vasiṃsu. aṅgamagadhavāsino māse māse tesaṃ mahāsakkāraṃ abhiharanti.

[03] atha ^a^M3.0010^ea^ amhākaṃ bodhisatto katābhinikkhamano anupubbena sabbaññutaṃ patvā pavattitavaradhammacakko yasādayo kulaputte vinetvā saṭṭhi arahante dhammadesanatthāya disāsu uyyojetvā sayaṃ pattacīvaramādāya -- ``te tayo jaṭilabhātike damessāmī''ti uruvelaṃ gantvā anekehi pāṭihāriyasatehi tesaṃ diṭṭhiṃ bhinditvā te pabbājesi. so taṃ iddhimayapattacīvaradharaṃ samaṇasahassaṃ ādāya gayāsīsaṃ gantvā tehi parivārito nisīditvā, -- ``katarā nu kho etesaṃ dhammakathā sappāyā''ti cintento, ``ime sāyaṃpātaṃ aggiṃ paricaranti. imesaṃ dvādasāyatanāni ādittāni sampajjalitāni viya katvā desessāmi, evaṃ ime arahattaṃ pāpuṇituṃ sakkhissantī''ti sanniṭṭhānamakāsi. atha nesaṃ tathā dhammaṃ desetuṃ imaṃ ādittapariyāyaṃ abhāsi. tena vuttaṃ -- ``bhikkhū āmantesīti tesaṃ sappāyadhammadesanaṃ vicinitvā taṃ desessāmīti āmantesī''ti. tattha ^b^āditta^eb^nti padittaṃ sampajjalitaṃ. sesaṃ vuttanayameva. iti imasmiṃ sutte dukkhalakkhaṇaṃ kathitaṃ.
[03] 29^b^.^eb^ sattame ^b^addhabhūta^eb^nti adhibhūtaṃ ajjhotthaṭaṃ, upaddutanti attho. imasmimpi sutte dukkhalakkhaṇameva kathitaṃ.

[03] 30^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhame ^b^sabbamaññitasamugghātasāruppa^eb^nti sabbesaṃ taṇhāmānadiṭṭhimaññitānaṃ samugghātāya anucchavikaṃ. ^b^idhā^eb^ti imasmiṃ sāsane. ^b^cakkhuṃ na maññatī^eb^ti cakkhuṃ ^a^P2.0364^ea^ ahanti vā mamanti vā paroti vā parassāti vā na maññati. ^b^cakkhusmiṃ na maññatī^eb^ti ahaṃ cakkhusmiṃ, mama kiñcanapalibodho cakkhusmiṃ paro cakkhusmiṃ, parassa kiñcanapalibodho cakkhusminti na maññati. ^b^cakkhuto na maññatī^eb^ti ahaṃ cakkhuto niggato, mama kiñcanapalibodho cakkhuto niggato, paro cakkhuto niggato, parassa kiñcanapalibodho cakkhuto ^a^V3.0011^ea^ niggatoti evampi na maññati, taṇhāmānadiṭṭhimaññanānaṃ ekampi na uppādetīti attho. ^b^cakkhuṃ meti na maññatī^eb^ti mama cakkhūti na maññati, mamattabhūtaṃ taṇhāmaññanaṃ na uppādetīti attho. sesaṃ uttānamevāti. imasmiṃ sutte catucattālīsāya ṭhānesu arahattaṃ pāpetvā vipassanā kathitā.

[03] 31^b^.^eb^ navame ^a^M3.0011^ea^ ^b^samugghātasappāyā^eb^ti samugghātassa upakārabhūtā. ^b^tato taṃ hoti aññathā^eb^ti tato taṃ aññenākārena hoti. ^b^aññathābhāvī bhavasatto loko bhavamevābhinandatī^eb^ti aññathābhāvaṃ vipariṇāmaṃ upagamanena aññathābhāvī hutvāpi bhavesu satto laggo lagito palibuddho ayaṃ loko bhavaṃyeva abhinandati. ^b^yāvatā, bhikkhave, khandhadhātuāyatana^eb^nti, bhikkhave, yattakaṃ idaṃ khandhā ca dhātuyo ca āyatanāni cāti khandhadhātuāyatanaṃ. ^b^tampi na maññatī^eb^ti sabbampi na maññatīti heṭṭhā gahitameva saṃkaḍḍhitvā puna dasseti. imasmiṃ sutte aṭṭhacattālīsāya ṭhānesu arahattaṃ pāpetvā vipassanā kathitā.

[03] 32^b^.^eb^ dasame ^b^etaṃ mamā^eb^tiādīhi tīhi tīhi padehi taṇhāmānadiṭṭhigāhe dassetvā tiparivaṭṭanayena desanā katā. paṭipāṭiyā pana tīsupi imesu suttesu saha vipassanāya cattāropi maggā kathitāti.
[06] sabbavaggo tatiyo.

[03] 33-42^b^.^eb^ jātidhammavagge ^a^P2.0365^ea^ ^b^jātidhamma^eb^nti jāyanadhammaṃ nibbattanasabhāvaṃ. ^b^jarādhamma^eb^nti jīraṇasabhāvaṃ. ^b^byādhidhamma^eb^nti byādhino uppattipaccayabhāvena byādhisabhāvaṃ. ^b^maraṇadhamma^eb^nti maraṇasabhāvaṃ ^a^V3.0012^ea^. ^b^sokadhamma^eb^nti sokassa uppattipaccayabhāvena sokasabhāvaṃ. ^b^saṃkilesikadhamma^eb^nti saṃkilesikasabhāvaṃ. ^b^khayadhamma^eb^nti khayagamanasabhāvaṃ. ^b^vayadhammā^eb^dīsupi eseva nayoti.
[06] jātidhammavaggo catuttho.

[03] 43-52^b^.^eb^ aniccavagge ^a^M3.0012^ea^ ^b^abhiññeyya^eb^nti pade ñātapariññā āgatā, itarā pana dve gahitāyevāti veditabbā. ^b^pariññeyyapahātabba^eb^padesupi tīraṇapahānapariññāva āgatā, itarāpi pana dve gahitāyevāti veditabbā. ^b^sacchikātabba^eb^nti paccakkhaṃ kātabbaṃ. ^b^abhiññāpariññeyya^eb^nti idhāpi pahānapariññā avuttāpi gahitāyevāti veditabbā. ^b^upadduta^eb^nti anekaggaṭṭhena. ^b^upassaṭṭha^eb^nti upahataṭṭhena. sesaṃ uttānamevāti.
[06] sabbāniccavaggo pañcamo.
[06] paṭhamo paṇṇāsako.

[03] 53-62^b^.^eb^ avijjāvagge ^b^avijjā^eb^ti catūsu saccesu aññāṇaṃ. ^b^vijjā^eb^ti arahattamaggavijjā. ^b^aniccato jānato passato^eb^ti dukkhānattavasenāpi jānato passato ^a^P2.0366^ea^ pahīyatiyeva, idaṃ pana aniccavasena kathite bujjhanakapuggalassa ajjhāsayena vuttaṃ. eseva nayo sabbattha. api cettha ^b^saṃyojanā^eb^ti dasa saṃyojanāni. ^b^āsavā^eb^ti cattāro āsavā. ^b^anusayā^eb^ti satta anusayā. ^b^sabbupādānapariññāyā^eb^ti sabbesaṃ catunnampi upādānānaṃ tīhi pariññāhi parijānanatthāya. ^b^pariyādānāyā^eb^ti khepanatthāya. sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
[06] avijjāvaggo chaṭṭho.

[03] 63^b^.^eb^ migajālavaggassa paṭhame ^a^V3.0013^ea^ ^b^cakkhuviññeyyā^eb^ti cakkhuviññāṇena passitabbā. ^b^sotaviññeyyā^eb^dīsupi eseva nayo. ^b^iṭṭhā^eb^ti pariyiṭṭhā vā hontu ^a^M3.0013^ea^ mā vā, iṭṭhārammaṇabhūtāti attho. ^b^kantā^eb^ti kamanīyā. ^b^manāpā^eb^ti manavaḍḍhanakā. ^b^piyarūpā^eb^ti piyajātikā. ^b^kāmūpasaṃhitā^eb^ti ārammaṇaṃ katvā uppajjamānena kāmena upasaṃhitā ^b^rajanīyā^eb^ti rañjanīyā, rāguppattikāraṇabhūtāti attho. ^b^nandī^eb^ti taṇhānandī. ^b^saṃyogo^eb^ti saṃyojanaṃ. ^b^nandisaṃyojanasaṃyutto^eb^ti nandībandhanena baddho. ^b^araññavanapatthānī^eb^ti araññāni ca vanapatthāni ca. tattha kiñcāpi abhidhamme nippariyāyena ``nikkhamitvā bahi indakhīlā sabbametaṃ arañña''nti (vibha0 529) vuttaṃ, tathāpi yaṃ taṃ ``pañcadhanusatikaṃ pacchima''nti (pārā0 654) araññakaṅganipphādakaṃ senāsanaṃ vuttaṃ, tadeva adhippetanti veditabbaṃ. ^b^vanapattha^eb^nti gāmantaṃ atikkamitvā manussānaṃ anupacāraṭṭhānaṃ, yattha na kasīyati na vapīyati. vuttampi cetaṃ --

[02] ``vanapatthanti dūrānametaṃ senāsanānaṃ adhivacanaṃ. vanapatthanti vanasaṇḍānametaṃ, vanapatthanti bhiṃsanakānametaṃ, vanapatthanti salomahaṃsānametaṃ, vanapatthanti pariyantānametaṃ, vanapatthanti amanussūpacārānaṃ senāsanānametaṃ ^a^P2.0367^ea^ adhivacana''nti (vibha0 531).

[03] ettha ca pariyantānanti imaṃ ekaṃ pariyāyaṃ ṭhapetvā sesapariyāyehi vanapatthāni veditabbāni. ^b^pantānī^eb^ti pariyantāni atidūrāni. ^b^appasaddānī^eb^ti udukkhalamusaladārakasaddādīnaṃ abhāvena appasaddāni. ^b^appanigghosānī^eb^ti tesaṃ tesaṃ ninnādamahānigghosassa abhāvena appanigghosāni. ^b^vijanavātānī^eb^ti sañcaraṇajanassa sarīravātavirahitāni. ^b^manussarāhasseyyakānī^eb^ti manussānaṃ rahokammassa anucchavikāni. ^b^paṭisallānasāruppānī^eb^ti nilīyanasāruppāni.
[03] 64^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^a^V3.0014^ea^ ^b^nandinirodhā dukkhanirodho^eb^ti taṇhānandiyā nirodhena vaṭṭadukkhassa nirodho.

[03] 65-67^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^a^M3.0014^ea^ ^b^samiddhī^eb^ti attabhāvassa samiddhatāya evaṃ laddhanāmo. tassa kira therassa attabhāvo abhirūpo ahosi pāsādiko, ukkhittamālāpuṭo viya alaṅkatamālāgabbho viya ca sabbākārapāripūriyā samiddho. tasmā samiddhitveva saṅkhaṃ gato. ^b^māro^eb^ti maraṇaṃ pucchati. ^b^mārapaññattī^eb^ti māroti paññatti nāmaṃ nāmadheyyaṃ. ^b^atthi tattha māro vā mārapaññatti vā^eb^ti tattha maraṇaṃ vā maraṇanti idaṃ nāmaṃ vā atthīti dasseti. catutthaṃ uttānameva, tathā pañcamaṃ.
[03] 68^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhe ^a^P2.0368^ea^ ^b^loko^eb^ti lujjanapalujjanaṭṭhena loko. iti migajālattherassa āyācanasuttato paṭṭhāya pañcasupi suttesu vaṭṭavivaṭṭameva kathitaṃ.

[03] 69^b^.^eb^ sattame ^b^sītavane^eb^ti evaṃnāmake susānavane. ^b^sappasoṇḍikapabbhāre^eb^ti sappaphaṇasadisatāya evaṃladdhanāme pabbhāre. ^b^upasenassā^eb^ti dhammasenāpatino kaniṭṭhabhātikaupasenattherassa. ^b^āsīviso patito hotī^eb^ti thero kira katabhattakicco mahācīvaraṃ gahetvā leṇacchāyāya mandamandena vātapānavātena bījiyamāno nisīditvā dupaṭṭanivāsane sūcikammaṃ karoti. tasmiṃ khaṇe leṇacchadane dve āsīvisapotakā kīḷanti. tesu eko patitvā therassa aṃsakūṭe avatthāsi. so ca phuṭṭhaviso hoti. tasmā patitaṭṭhānato paṭṭhāya therassa kāye dīpasikhā viya vaṭṭiṃ pariyādiyamānamevassa visaṃ otiṇṇaṃ. thero visassa tathāgamanaṃ disvā kiñcāpi taṃ patitamattameva yathāparicchedena gataṃ, attano pana iddhibalena ``ayaṃ attabhāvo leṇe mā vinassatū''ti ^a^V3.0015^ea^ adhiṭṭhahitvā bhikkhū āmantesi. ^b^purāyaṃ kāyo idheva vikiratī^eb^ti yāva na vikirati, tāva naṃ bahiddhā nīharathāti attho. ^b^aññathatta^eb^nti aññathābhāvaṃ. ^b^indriyānaṃ vā vipariṇāma^eb^nti cakkhusotādīnaṃ indriyānaṃ ^a^M3.0015^ea^ pakativijahanabhāvaṃ. ^b^tattheva vikirī^eb^ti bahi nīharitvā ṭhapitaṭṭhāne mañcakasmiṃyeva vikiri.

[03] 70^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhame ^b^rūpappaṭisaṃvedī^eb^ti nīlapītādibhedaṃ ārammaṇaṃ vavatthāpento rūpaṃ paṭisaṃviditaṃ karoti, tasmā rūpappaṭisaṃvedī nāma hoti. ^b^rūparāgappaṭisaṃvedī^eb^ti kilesassa atthibhāveneva pana rūparāgaṃ paṭisaṃviditaṃ karoti nāma, tasmā rūparāgappaṭisaṃvedīti vuccati. ^b^sandiṭṭhiko^eb^tiādīni visuddhimagge vuttatthāneva. ^b^no^eb^ ^a^P2.0369^ea^ ^b^ca rūparāgappaṭisaṃvedī^eb^ti kilesassa natthibhāveneva na rūparāgaṃ paṭisaṃviditaṃ karoti nāma, tasmā ``no ca rūparāgappaṭisaṃvedī''ti vuccati. imasmiṃ sutte sekhāsekhānaṃ paccavekkhaṇā kathitā.

[03] 71^b^.^eb^ navame ^b^phassāyatanāna^eb^nti phassākarānaṃ. ^b^avusita^eb^nti avuṭṭhaṃ. ^b^ārakā^eb^ti dūre. ^b^etthāhaṃ, bhante, anassasa^eb^nti, bhante, ahaṃ ettha anassasiṃ, naṭṭho nāma ahanti vadati. bhagavā -- ``ayaṃ bhikkhu `ahaṃ nāma imasmiṃ sāsane naṭṭho'ti vadati, kinnu khvassa aññesu dhātukammaṭṭhāna-kasiṇakammaṭṭhānādīsu abhiyogo atthī''ti cintetvā, tampi apassanto -- ``kataraṃ nu kho kammaṭṭhānaṃ imassa sappāyaṃ bhavissatī''ti cintesi. tato ``āyatanakammaṭṭhānameva sappāya''nti disvā taṃ kathento ^b^taṃ kiṃ maññasi bhikkhū^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^sādhū^eb^ti tassa byākaraṇe sampahaṃsanaṃ. ^b^esevanto dukkhassā^eb^ti ayameva vaṭṭadukkhassanto paricchedo, nibbānanti attho.

[03] 72^b^.^eb^ dasame ^b^anassasa^eb^nti nassasiṃ, naṭṭho nāmamhi icceva attho. ^b^āyatiṃ apunabbhavāyā^eb^ti ^a^V3.0016^ea^ ettha āyatiṃ apunabbhavo nāma nibbānaṃ, nibbānatthāya pahīnaṃ bhavissatīti attho.
[03] 73^b^.^eb^ ekādasame ^a^M3.0016^ea^ ^b^anassasa^eb^nti naṭṭho, ^b^panassasa^eb^nti atinaṭṭho. sesaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbanti.
[06] migajālavaggo sattamo.

[03] 74-78^b^.^eb^ gilānavaggassa ^a^P2.0370^ea^ paṭhame ^b^amukasmi^eb^nti asukasmiṃ. ayameva vā pāṭho. ^b^appaññāto^eb^ti aññāto apākaṭo. navopi hi koci paññāto hoti rāhulatthero viya sumanasāmaṇero viya ca, ayaṃ pana navo ceva apaññāto ca. sesamettha vuttanayamevāti. tathā ito paresu catūsu.
[03] 79^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhe ^b^aniccato jānato^eb^ti dukkhānattavasena jānatopi pahīyatiyeva, idaṃ pana aniccalakkhaṇaṃ dassetvā vutte bujjhanakassa ajjhāsayena vuttaṃ.

[03] 80^b^.^eb^ sattame ^b^sabbe dhammā^eb^ti sabbe tebhūmakadhammā. ^b^nālaṃ abhinivesāyā^eb^ti abhinivesaparāmāsaggāhena ^a^V3.0017^ea^ gaṇhituṃ na yuttā. ^b^sabbanimittānī^eb^ti sabbāni saṅkhāranimittāni. ^b^aññato passatī^eb^ti yathā apariññātābhiniveso jano passati, tato aññato passati. apariññātābhiniveso hi jano sabbanimittānipi attato passati. pariññātābhiniveso pana anattato passati, no attatoti evaṃ imasmiṃ sutte anattalakkhaṇameva kathitaṃ.
[03] 81^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhame ^a^M3.0017^ea^ ^b^idha no^eb^ti ettha ^b^no^eb^-kāro nipātamattameva. sesaṃ uttānatthameva. kevalaṃ idha dukkhalakkhaṇaṃ kathitanti veditabbaṃ.
[03] 82^b^.^eb^ navame ^b^lujjatī^eb^ti palujjati bhijjati. idha aniccalakkhaṇaṃ kathitaṃ.

[03] 83^b^.^eb^ dasame ^b^chinnapapañce^eb^ti taṇhāpapañcassa chinnattā chinnapapañce. ^b^chinnavaṭume^eb^ti taṇhāvaṭumasseva chinnattā chinnavaṭume. kiṃ pucchāmīti pucchati? atikkantabuddhehi pariharitāni cakkhusotādīni pucchāmīti pucchati. atha vā sace magge bhāvitepi anāgate cakkhusotādivaṭṭaṃ vaḍḍheyya, taṃ pucchāmīti pucchatīti.
[06] gilānavaggo aṭṭhamo.
[03] 84^b^.^eb^ channavaggassa ^a^V3.0018^ea^ ^a^P2.0371^ea^ paṭhame ^b^palokadhamma^eb^nti bhijjanakasabhāvaṃ. evamettha aniccalakkhaṇameva kathitaṃ.
[03] 85^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^b^attaniyenā^eb^ti attano santakena parikkhārena. evamettha anattalakkhaṇameva kathitaṃ.
[03] 86^b^.^eb^ tatiyaṃ khandhiyavagge ānandovāde (saṃ0 ni0 3.83) vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.

[03] 87^b^.^eb^ catutthe ^a^M3.0018^ea^ ^b^channo^eb^ti evaṃnāmako thero, na abhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhantathero. ^b^paṭisallānā^eb^ti phalasamāpattito. ^b^gilānapucchakā^eb^ti gilānupaṭṭhākā. gilānupaṭṭhānaṃ nāma buddhapasatthaṃ buddhavaṇṇitaṃ, tasmā evamāha. ^b^sīsaveṭhaṃ dadeyyā^eb^ti sīse veṭhanaṃ sīsaveṭhaṃ, tañca dadeyya. ^b^sattha^eb^nti jīvitahārakasatthaṃ. ^b^nāvakaṅkhāmī^eb^ti na icchāmi. ^b^pariciṇṇo^eb^ti paricarito. ^b^manāpenā^eb^ti manavaḍḍhanakena kāyakammādinā. ettha ca satta sekhā paricaranti nāma, arahā paricārī nāma, bhagavā pariciṇṇo nāma.

[03] ^b^etañhi, āvuso, sāvakassa patirūpa^eb^nti, āvuso, sāvakassa nāma etaṃ anucchavikaṃ. ^b^anupavajja^eb^nti appavattikaṃ appaṭisandhikaṃ. ^b^pucchāvuso sāriputta, sutvā vedissāmā^eb^ti ayaṃ sāvakapavāraṇā ^a^V3.0019^ea^ nāma. ^b^etaṃ^eb^ ^a^P2.0372^ea^ ^b^mamā^eb^tiādīni taṇhāmānadiṭṭhiggāhavasena vuttāni. ^b^nirodhaṃ disvā^eb^ti khayavayaṃ ñatvā. ^b^netaṃ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attāti samanupassāmī^eb^ti aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattāti samanupassāmi. ettakesu ṭhānesu channatthero sāriputtattherena pucchitaṃ pañhaṃ arahatte pakkhipitvā kathesi. sāriputtatthero pana tassa puthujjanabhāvaṃ ñatvāpi taṃ ``puthujjano''ti vā ``khīṇāsavo''ti vā avatvā tuṇhīyeva ahosi. cundatthero panassa puthujjanabhāvaṃ saññāpessāmīti cintetvā ovādaṃ adāsi.

[03] tattha ^b^tasmā^eb^ti yasmā māraṇantikaṃ vedanaṃ adhivāsetuṃ asakkonto satthaṃ āharāmīti vadati, tasmā puthujjano āyasmā, tena idampi manasikarohīti dīpeti. yasmā vā channaṃ āyatanānaṃ nirodhaṃ disvā cakkhādīni tiṇṇaṃ gāhānaṃ vasena na samanupassāmīti vadasi. tasmā idampi tassa bhagavato sāsanaṃ āyasmatā manasikātabbantipi puthujjanabhāvameva dīpento vadati. ^b^niccakappa^eb^nti niccakālaṃ. ^b^nissitassā^eb^ti taṇhāmānadiṭṭhīhi nissitassa. ^b^calita^eb^nti vipphanditaṃ hoti. yathayidaṃ āyasmato uppannaṃ vedanaṃ adhivāsetuṃ asakkontassa ``ahaṃ vedayāmi, mama vedanā''ti appahīnaggāhassa idāni vipphanditaṃ hoti, imināpi naṃ ``puthujjanova tva''nti vadati.

[03] ^b^passaddhī^eb^ti ^a^M3.0019^ea^ kāyacittapassaddhi, kilesapassaddhi nāma hotīti attho. ^b^natiyā^eb^ti taṇhānatiyā. ^b^asatī^eb^ti bhavatthāya ālayanikantipariyuṭṭhāne asati. ^b^āgatigati na hotī^eb^ti paṭisandhivasena āgati nāma, cutivasena gamanaṃ nāma na hoti. ^b^cutūpapāto^eb^ti cavanavasena cuti, upapajjanavasena upapāto. ^b^nevidha na huraṃ na ubhayamantarenā^eb^ti na idhaloke na paraloke na ubhayattha hoti. ^b^esevanto dukkhassā^eb^ti vaṭṭadukkhakilesadukkhassa ^a^P2.0373^ea^ ayameva anto ayaṃ paricchedo parivaṭumabhāvo hoti. ayameva hi ettha attho. ye pana ``ubhayamantarenā''ti vacanaṃ gahetvā antarābhavaṃ icchanti, tesaṃ vacanaṃ niratthakaṃ. antarābhavassa hi bhāvo abhidhamme paṭikkhittoyeva. ``antarenā''ti vacanaṃ pana vikappantaradīpanaṃ. tasmā ayamettha attho -- neva idha na huraṃ, aparo vikappo na ubhayanti.

[03] ^b^satthaṃ āharesī^eb^ti jīvitahārakasatthaṃ āhari, āharitvā kaṇṭhanāḷaṃ chindi. athassa tasmiṃ khaṇe maraṇabhayaṃ okkami, gatinimittaṃ upaṭṭhāsi. so attano puthujjanabhāvaṃ ñatvā, saṃviggacitto ^a^V3.0020^ea^ vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā, saṅkhāre pariggaṇhanto arahattaṃ patvā, samasīsī hutvā parinibbuto. ^b^sammukhāyeva anupavajjatā byākatā^eb^ti kiñcāpi idaṃ therassa puthujjanakāle byākaraṇaṃ hoti; etena pana byākaraṇena anantarāyamassa parinibbānaṃ ahosi. tasmā bhagavā tadeva byākaraṇaṃ gahetvā kathesi.

[03] ^b^upavajjakulānī^eb^ti upasaṅkamitabbakulāni. iminā thero, ``bhante, evaṃ upaṭṭhākesu ca upaṭṭhāyikāsu ca vijjamānāsu so bhikkhu tumhākaṃ sāsane parinibbāyissatī''ti pubbabhāgapaṭipattiyaṃ kulasaṃsaggadosaṃ dassento pucchati. athassa bhagavā kulesu saṃsaggābhāvaṃ dīpento ^b^honti hete sāriputtā^eb^tiādimāha. imasmiṃ kira ṭhāne therassa kulesu asaṃsaṭṭhabhāvo pākaṭo ahosi. sesaṃ sabbattha uttānameva.

[03] 88-89^b^.^eb^ pañcame ^b^tañce^eb^ti taṃ cakkhuñceva rūpañca. ^b^nandisamudayā dukkhasamudayo^eb^ti taṇhāya samodhānena pañcakkhandhadukkhassa samodhānaṃ hoti. iti ^a^M3.0020^ea^ chasu dvāresu ``nandisamudayā dukkhasamudayo''ti iminā dvinnaṃ saccānaṃ vasena ^a^P2.0374^ea^ vaṭṭaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā dassesi. dutiyanaye ^b^nirodho maggo^eb^ti dvinnaṃ saccānaṃ vasena vivaṭṭaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā dassesi. ^b^iminā tvaṃ puṇṇā^eb^ti pāṭiyekko anusandhi. evaṃ tāva vaṭṭavivaṭṭavasena desanaṃ arahatte pakkhipitvā idāni puṇṇattheraṃ sattasu ṭhānesu sīhanādaṃ nadāpetuṃ ^b^iminā tva^eb^ntiādimāha.

[03] ^b^caṇḍā^eb^ti duṭṭhā kibbisā. ^b^pharusā^eb^ti kakkhaḷā ^b^akkosissantī^eb^ti dasahi akkosavatthūhi akkosissanti. ^b^paribhāsissantī^eb^ti ``kiṃ samaṇo nāma tvaṃ, idañcidañca te karissāmā''ti tajjessanti. ^b^evametthā^eb^ti evaṃ mayhaṃ ettha bhavissati. ^b^daṇḍenā^eb^ti catuhatthadaṇḍena vā khadiradaṇḍena vā ghaṭikamuggarena vā. ^b^satthenā^eb^ti ekatodhārādinā satthena. ^b^satthahārakaṃ pariyesantī^eb^ti jīvitahārakasatthaṃ pariyesanti. idaṃ thero tatiyapārājikavatthusmiṃ asubhakathaṃ sutvā attabhāvena jigucchantānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ satthahārakapariyesanaṃ sandhāyāha. ^b^damūpasamenā^eb^ti ettha ^b^damo^eb^ti indriyasaṃvarādīnaṃ etaṃ nāmaṃ.
[21] ``saccena ^a^V3.0021^ea^ danto damasā upeto,
[22] vedantagū vusitabrahmacariyo''ti.. (saṃ0 ni0 1.195; su0 ni0 467) --

[07] ettha hi indriyasaṃvaro damoti vutto. ``yadi saccā damā cāgā, khantyā bhiyyodha vijjatī''ti (su0 ni0 191; saṃ0 ni0 1.246) ettha paññā damoti vuttā. ``dānena damena saṃyamena saccavajjenā''ti (dī0 ni0 1.165; ma0 ni0 2.226) ettha uposathakammaṃ damoti vuttaṃ. imasmiṃ pana sutte khanti damoti veditabbo. ^b^upasamo^eb^ti tasseva vevacanaṃ.
[03] ^b^atha kho āyasmā puṇṇo^eb^ti ko panesa puṇṇo, kasmā ca panettha gantukāmo ahosīti? sunāparantavāsiko eva esa, sāvatthiyaṃ pana asappāyavihāraṃ sallakkhetvā tattha gantukāmo ahosi.

[03] tatrāyaṃ ^a^M3.0021^ea^ anuppubbikathā -- sunāparantaraṭṭhe kira ekasmiṃ vāṇijagāme ete dve bhātaro. tesu kadāci jeṭṭho pañca sakaṭasatāni gahetvā janapadaṃ ^a^P2.0375^ea^ gantvā bhaṇḍaṃ āharati, kadāci kaniṭṭho. imasmiṃ pana samaye kaniṭṭhaṃ ghare ṭhapetvā, jeṭṭhabhātiko pañca sakaṭasatāni gahetvā, janapadacārikaṃ caranto anupubbena sāvatthiṃ patvā, jetavanassa nātidūre sakaṭasatthaṃ nivesetvā bhuttapātarāso parijanaparivuto phāsukaṭṭhāne nisīdi.

[03] tena ca samayena sāvatthivāsino bhuttapātarāsā uposathaṅgāni adhiṭṭhāya suddhuttarāsaṅgā gandhapupphādihatthā yena buddho, yena dhammo, yena saṅgho, tanninnā tappoṇā tappabbhārā hutvā, dakkhiṇadvārena nikkhamitvā jetavanaṃ gacchanti. so te disvā ``kahaṃ ime gacchantī''ti ekaṃ manussaṃ pucchi. kiṃ tvaṃ, ayyo, na jānāsi? loke buddhadhammasaṅgharatanāni nāma uppannāni, icceso mahājano satthu santikaṃ dhammakathaṃ sotuṃ gacchatīti. tassa ``buddho''ti vacanaṃ chavicammādīni chinditvā aṭṭhimiñjaṃ āhacca aṭṭhāsi. so attano parijanaparivuto tāya parisāya saddhiṃ vihāraṃ gantvā, satthu madhurassarena dhammaṃ desentassa parisapariyante ṭhito, dhammaṃ sutvā pabbajjāya cittaṃ uppādesi. atha tathāgatena kālaṃ viditvā parisāya uyyojitāya satthāraṃ ^a^V3.0022^ea^ upasaṅkamitvā, vanditvā, svātanāya nimantetvā, dutiyadivase maṇḍapaṃ kāretvā, āsanāni paññāpetvā, buddhappamukhassa saṅghassa mahādānaṃ datvā, bhuttapātarāso uposathaṅgāni adhiṭṭhāya bhaṇḍāgārikaṃ pakkosāpetvā, ``ettakaṃ dhanaṃ vissajjitaṃ, ettakaṃ dhanaṃ na vissajjita''nti sabbaṃ ācikkhitvā, ``imaṃ sāpateyyaṃ mayhaṃ kaniṭṭhassa dehī''ti sabbaṃ niyyātetvā, satthu santike pabbajitvā, kammaṭṭhānaparāyaṇo ahosi.

[03] athassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasikarontassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ na upaṭṭhāti. tato cintesi -- ``ayaṃ janapado mayhaṃ asappāyo, yaṃnūnāhaṃ satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā sakaraṭṭhameva gaccheyya''nti. atha pubbaṇhasamaye piṇḍāya caritvā, sāyanhe paṭisallānā vuṭṭhahitvā, bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā, kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathāpetvā, satta ^a^P2.0376^ea^ sīhanāde naditvā, pakkāmi. tena vuttaṃ, ``atha kho āyasmā puṇṇo...pe0... viharatī''ti.

[03] kattha ^a^M3.0022^ea^ panāyaṃ vihāsīti? catūsu ṭhānesu vihāsi. sunāparantaraṭṭhaṃ tāva pavisitvā ca ^b^abbuhatthapabbataṃ^eb^ nāma patvā vāṇijagāmaṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi. atha naṃ kaniṭṭhabhātā sañjānitvā bhikkhaṃ datvā, ``bhante, aññattha agantvā idheva vasathā''ti paṭiññaṃ kāretvā tattheva vasāpesi.

[03] tato ^b^samuddagirivihāraṃ^eb^ nāma agamāsi. tattha ayakantapāsāṇehi paricchinditvā katacaṅkamo atthi, koci taṃ caṅkamituṃ samattho nāma natthi. tattha samuddavīciyo āgantvā ayakantapāsāṇesu paharitvā mahāsaddaṃ karonti. thero ``kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasikarontānaṃ phāsuvihāro hotū''ti samuddaṃ nissaddaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhāsi.

[03] tato ^b^mātulagiriṃ^eb^ nāma agamāsi. tatthapi sakuṇasaṅgho ussanno rattiñca divā ca saddo ekābaddhova ahosi. thero ``idaṃ ṭhānaṃ na phāsuka''nti tato ^b^makulakārāmavihāraṃ^eb^ nāma gato. so vāṇijagāmassa nātidūro naccāsanno gamanāgamanasampanno vivitto appasaddo. thero ``imaṃ ṭhānaṃ phāsuka''nti tattha rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānacaṅkamanādīni kāretvā vassaṃ upagacchi. evaṃ catūsu ṭhānesu vihāsi.

[03] athekadivasaṃ ^a^V3.0023^ea^ tasmiṃyeva antovasse pañca vāṇijasatāni ``parasamuddaṃ gacchāmā''ti nāvāya bhaṇḍaṃ pakkhipiṃsu. nāvārohanadivase therassa kaniṭṭhabhātā theraṃ bhojetvā, therassa santike sikkhāpadāni gahetvā, vanditvā, ``bhante, samuddo nāma asaddheyyo anekantarāyo, amhe āvajjeyyāthā''ti vatvā nāvaṃ āruhi. nāvā uttamajavena gacchamānā aññataraṃ dīpakaṃ pāpuṇi. manussā ``pātarāsaṃ karissāmā''ti dīpake uttiṇṇā. tasmiṃ pana dīpake aññaṃ kiñci natthi, candanavanameva ahosi.

[03] atheko vāsiyā rukkhaṃ ākoṭetvā lohitacandanabhāvaṃ ñatvā āha -- ``bho, mayaṃ lābhatthāya parasamuddaṃ ^a^P2.0377^ea^ gacchāma, ito ca uttari lābho nāma natthi, caturaṅgulamattā ghaṭikā satasahassaṃ agghati. hāretabbayuttakaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ hāretvā candanassa pūressāmā''ti te tathā kariṃsu ^a^M3.0023^ea^. candanavane adhivatthā amanussā kujjhitvā, ``imehi amhākaṃ candanavanaṃ nāsitaṃ ghātessāma ne''ti cintetvā -- ``idheva ghātitesu sabbaṃ ekakuṇapaṃ bhavissati, samuddamajjhe nesaṃ nāvaṃ osīdessāmā''ti āhaṃsu. atha nesaṃ nāvaṃ āruyha muhuttaṃ gatakāleyeva uppātikaṃ uṭṭhapetvā sayampi te amanussā bhayānakāni rūpāni dassayiṃsu. bhītā manussā attano attano devatānaṃ namassanti. therassa kaniṭṭho cūḷapuṇṇakuṭumbiko ``mayhaṃ bhātā avassayo hotū''ti therassa namassamāno aṭṭhāsi.

[03] theropi kira tasmiṃyeva khaṇe āvajjetvā, tesaṃ byasanuppattiṃ ñatvā, vehāsaṃ uppatitvā, abhimukho aṭṭhāsi. amanussā theraṃ disvāva ``ayyo puṇṇatthero etī''ti apakkamiṃsu, uppātikaṃ sannisīdi. thero ``mā bhāyathā''ti te assāsetvā ``kahaṃ gantukāmatthā''ti pucchi. bhante, amhākaṃ sakaṭṭhānameva gacchāmāti. thero nāvaṅgaṇe akkamitvā ``etesaṃ icchitaṭṭhānaṃ gacchatū''ti adhiṭṭhāsi. vāṇijā sakaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā, taṃ pavattiṃ puttadārassa ārocetvā, ``etha theraṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmā''ti pañcasatāpi attano pañcahi mātugāmasatehi saddhiṃ tīsu saraṇesu patiṭṭhāya upāsakattaṃ paṭivedesuṃ. tato nāvāya bhaṇḍaṃ otāretvā therassa ekaṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ katvā, ``ayaṃ, bhante, tumhākaṃ koṭṭhāso''ti āhaṃsu. thero mayhaṃ visuṃ koṭṭhāsakiccaṃ natthi. satthā pana tumhehi diṭṭhapubboti. na diṭṭhapubbo, bhanteti. tena hi iminā satthu maṇḍalamāḷaṃ karotha. evaṃ satthāraṃ passissathāti. te sādhu, bhanteti. tena ca koṭṭhāsena attano ca koṭṭhāsehi maṇḍalamāḷaṃ kātuṃ ārabhiṃsu.

[03] satthāpi ^a^V3.0024^ea^ kira taṃ āraddhakālato paṭṭhāya paribhogaṃ akāsi. ārakkhamanussā rattiṃ obhāsaṃ disvā, ``mahesakkhā devatā atthī''ti saññaṃ kariṃsu. upāsakā maṇḍalamāḷañca bhikkhusaṅghassa ^a^P2.0378^ea^ ca senāsanāni niṭṭhāpetvā dānasambhāraṃ sajjetvā, ``kataṃ, bhante, amhehi attano kiccaṃ, satthāraṃ pakkosathā''ti therassa ārocesuṃ. thero sāyanhasamaye iddhiyā sāvatthiṃ gantvā, ``bhante, vāṇijagāmavāsino tumhe daṭṭhukāmā ^a^M3.0024^ea^, tesaṃ anukampaṃ karothā''ti bhagavantaṃ yāci. bhagavā adhivāsesi. thero sakaṭṭhānameva paccāgato.

[03] bhagavāpi ānandattheraṃ āmantesi, ``ānanda, sve sunāparante vāṇijagāme piṇḍāya carissāma, tvaṃ ekūnapañcasatānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ salākaṃ dehī''ti. thero ``sādhu, bhante''ti bhikkhusaṅghassa tamatthaṃ ārocetvā, ``ākāsacārī bhikkhū salākaṃ gaṇhantū''ti āha. taṃdivasaṃ kuṇḍadhānatthero paṭhamaṃ salākaṃ aggahesi. vāṇijagāmavāsinopi ``sve kira satthā āgamissatī''ti gāmamajjhe maṇḍapaṃ katvā dānaggaṃ sajjayiṃsu. bhagavā pātova sarīrapaṭijagganaṃ katvā, gandhakuṭiṃ pavisitvā, phalasamāpattiṃ appetvā, nisīdi. sakkassa paṇḍukambalasilāsanaṃ uṇhaṃ ahosi. so ``kiṃ ida''nti āvajjetvā satthu sunāparantagamanaṃ disvā, vissakammaṃ āmantesi, ``tāta, ajja bhagavā tiṃsamattāni yojanasatāni piṇḍacāraṃ gamissati. pañca kūṭāgārasatāni māpetvā jetavanadvārakoṭṭhakamatthake gamanasajjāni katvā ṭhapehī''ti. so tathā akāsi. bhagavato kūṭāgāraṃ catumukhaṃ ahosi, dvinnaṃ aggasāvakānaṃ dvimukhāni, sesāni ekamukhāni, satthā gandhakuṭito nikkhamitvā paṭipāṭiyā ṭhapitakūṭāgāresu dhurakūṭāgāraṃ pāvisi. dve aggasāvake ādiṃ katvā ekūnapañcabhikkhusatānipi kūṭāgāragatāni ahesuṃ. ekaṃ tucchaṃ kūṭāgāraṃ ahosi, pañcapi kūṭāgārasatāni ākāse uppattiṃsu.

[03] satthā ^b^saccabandhapabbataṃ^eb^ nāma patvā kūṭāgāraṃ ākāse ṭhapesi. tasmiṃ pabbate saccabandho nāma micchādiṭṭhikatāpaso mahājanaṃ micchādiṭṭhiṃ uggaṇhāpento lābhaggayasaggappatto ^a^P2.0379^ea^ hutvā vasati, abbhantare cassa antocāṭiyaṃ padīpo viya arahattaphalassa upanissayo jalati. taṃ disvā ``dhammamassa kathessāmī''ti gantvā dhammaṃ desesi. tāpaso desanāpariyosāne arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. maggenevassa abhiññā āgatā. so ehibhikkhu hutvā iddhimayapattacīvaradharo tucchakūṭāgāraṃ pāvisi.

[03] bhagavā ^a^V3.0025^ea^ ^a^M3.0025^ea^ kūṭāgāragatehi pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ vāṇijagāmaṃ gantvā, kūṭāgārāni adissamānakāni katvā, vāṇijagāmaṃ pāvisi. vāṇijā buddhappamukhassa saṅghassa mahādānaṃ datvā satthāraṃ makulakārāmaṃ nayiṃsu. satthā maṇḍalamāḷaṃ pāvisi. mahājano yāva satthā bhattadarathaṃ paṭippassambheti, tāva pātarāsaṃ katvā uposathaṅgāni samādāya bahuṃ gandhañca pupphañca ādāya dhammassavanatthāya ārāmaṃ paccāgamāsi. satthā dhammaṃ desesi. mahājanassa bandhanamokkho jāto, mahantaṃ buddhakolāhalaṃ ahosi.

[03] satthā mahājanassa saṅgahatthāya sattāhaṃ tattheva vasi, aruṇaṃ pana mahāgandhakuṭiyaṃyeva uṭṭhapesi. sattāhampi dhammadesanāpariyosāne caturāsītiyā pāṇasahassānaṃ dhammābhisamayo ahosi. tattha sattāhaṃ vasitvā, vāṇijagāme piṇḍāya caritvā, ``tvaṃ idheva vasāhī''ti puṇṇattheraṃ nivattetvā antare ^b^nammadānadī^eb^ nāma atthi, tassā tīraṃ agamāsi. nammadā nāgarājā satthu paccuggamanaṃ katvā, nāgabhavanaṃ pavesetvā, tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ sakkāraṃ akāsi. satthā tassa dhammaṃ kathetvā nāgabhavanā nikkhami. so ``mayhaṃ, bhante, paricaritabbaṃ dethā''ti yāci. bhagavā nammadānadītīre padacetiyaṃ dassesi. taṃ vīcīsu āgatāsu pidhīyati, gatāsu vivarīyati. mahāsakkārapattaṃ ahosi. satthā tato nikkhamitvā saccabandhapabbataṃ gantvā saccabandhaṃ āha -- ``tayā mahājano apāyamagge otārito. tvaṃ idheva vasitvā, etesaṃ laddhiṃ vissajjāpetvā, nibbānamagge patiṭṭhāpehī''ti. sopi paricaritabbaṃ yāci. satthā ghanapiṭṭhipāsāṇe allamattikapiṇḍamhi lañchanaṃ viya padacetiyaṃ dassesi. tato jetavanameva gato. etamatthaṃ sandhāya ^b^teneva antaravassenā^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ.

[03] ^b^parinibbāyī^eb^ti ^a^P2.0380^ea^ anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyi. mahājano therassa satta divasāni sarīrapūjaṃ katvā, bahūni gandhakaṭṭhāni samodhānetvā, sarīraṃ jhāpetvā dhātuyo ādāya cetiyaṃ akāsi. ^b^sambahulā bhikkhū^eb^ti therassa āḷāhanaṭṭhāne ṭhitabhikkhū. sesaṃ sabbattha uttānameva. chaṭṭhaṃ uttānameva.

[03] 90-91^b^.^eb^ sattame ^a^M3.0026^ea^ ^b^ejā^eb^ti taṇhā. sā hi calanaṭṭhena ejāti vuccati. sāva ābādhanaṭṭhena ^a^V3.0026^ea^ ^b^rogo,^eb^ anto dussanaṭṭhena ^b^gaṇḍo,^eb^ nikantanaṭṭhena ^b^sallaṃ. tasmā^eb^ti yasmā ejā rogo ceva gaṇḍo ca sallañca, tasmā. ^b^cakkhuṃ na maññeyyā^eb^tiādi vuttanayameva, idhāpi sabbaṃ heṭṭhā gahitameva saṃkaḍḍhitvā dassitaṃ. aṭṭhamaṃ vuttanayameva.

[03] 92-93^b^.^eb^ navame ^b^dvaya^eb^nti dve dve koṭṭhāse. dasame ^b^itthetaṃ dvaya^eb^nti evametaṃ dvayaṃ. ^b^calañceva byathañcā^eb^ti attano sabhāvena asaṇṭhahanato calati ceva byathati ca. ^b^yopi hetu yopi paccayo^eb^ti cakkhuviññāṇassa vatthārammaṇaṃ hetu ceva paccayo ca. ^b^kuto niccaṃ bhavissatī^eb^ti kena kāraṇena niccaṃ bhavissati. yathā pana dāsassa dāsiyā kucchismiṃ jāto putto parova dāso hoti, evaṃ aniccameva hotīti attho. ^b^saṅgatī^eb^ti sahagati. ^b^sannipāto^eb^ti ekato sannipatanaṃ. ^b^samavāyo^eb^ti ekato samāgamo. ^b^ayaṃ vuccati cakkhusamphasso^eb^ti iminā saṅgatisannipātasamavāyasaṅkhātena paccayena uppannattā paccayanāmeneva saṅgati sannipāto samavāyoti ayaṃ vuccati cakkhusamphasso.

[03] ^b^sopi hetū^eb^ti phassassa vatthu ārammaṇaṃ sahajātā tayo khandhāti ayaṃ hetu. ^b^phuṭṭho^eb^ti upayogatthe paccattaṃ, phassena phuṭṭhameva gocaraṃ vedanā vedeti, cetanā ceteti, saññā sañjānātīti attho. phuṭṭhoti vā phassasamaṅgīpuggalo ^a^P2.0381^ea^, phassena phuṭṭhārammaṇameva vedanādīhi vedeti ceteti sañjānātītipi vuttaṃ hoti. iti imasmiṃ sutte samatiṃsakkhandhā kathitā honti. kathaṃ? cakkhudvāre tāva vatthu ceva ārammaṇañca rūpakkhandho, phuṭṭho vedetīti vedanākkhandho, cetetīti saṅkhārakkhandho, sañjānātīti saññākkhandho, vijānātīti viññāṇakkhandhoti. sesadvāresupi eseva nayo. manodvārepi hi vatthurūpaṃ ekantato rūpakkhandho, rūpe pana ārammaṇe sati ārammaṇampi rūpakkhandhoti cha pañcakātiṃsa honti. saṅkhepena panete chasupi dvāresu pañceva ^a^M3.0027^ea^ khandhāti sapaccaye pañcakkhandhe aniccāti vitthāretvā vuccamāne bujjhanakānaṃ ajjhāsayena idaṃ suttaṃ desitanti.
[06] channavaggo navamo.

[03] 94^b^.^eb^ saḷavaggassa ^a^V3.0027^ea^ paṭhame ^b^adantā^eb^ti adamitā. ^b^aguttā^eb^ti agopitā. ^b^arakkhitā^eb^ti na rakkhitā. ^b^asaṃvutā^eb^ti apihitā. ^b^dukkhādhivāhā hontī^eb^ti nerayikādibhedaṃ adhikadukkhaṃ āvahanakā honti. ^b^sukhādhivāhā hontī^eb^ti jhānamaggaphalapabhedaṃ adhikasukhaṃ āvahanakā honti. adhivahātipi pāṭho, esevattho.

[03] ^b^saḷevā^eb^ti cha eva. ^b^asaṃvuto yattha dukkhaṃ nigacchatī^eb^ti yesu āyatanesu saṃvaravirahito dukkhaṃ pāpuṇāti. ^b^tesañca ye saṃvaraṇaṃ avedisu^eb^nti ye tesaṃ āyatanānaṃ saṃvaraṃ vindiṃsu paṭilabhiṃsu. ^b^viharantānavassutā^eb^ti viharanti anavassutā atintā.

[03] ^b^asāditañca sādu^eb^nti assādavantañca madhurañca. ^b^phassadvayaṃ sukhadukkhe upekkhe^eb^ti sukhaphassañca dukkhaphassañcāti idaṃ phassadvayaṃ upekkhe, upekkhāmevettha uppādeyyāti attho. phassadvayaṃ sukhadukkhaṃ upekkhoti vā pāṭho, phassahetukaṃ sukhadukkhaṃ upekkho, sukhe anurodhaṃ dukkhe ca virodhaṃ anuppādento upekkhako bhaveyyātipi attho. ^b^anānuruddho^eb^ ^a^P2.0382^ea^ ^b^aviruddho kenacī^eb^ti kenaci saddhiṃ neva anuruddho na viruddho bhaveyya.

[03] ^b^papañcasaññā^eb^ti kilesasaññāya papañcasaññā nāma hutvā. ^b^itarītarā narā^eb^ti lāmakasattā ^b^papañcayantā upayantī^eb^ti papañcayamānā vaṭṭaṃ upagacchanti. ^b^saññino^eb^ti sasaññā sattā. ^b^manomayaṃ gehasitañca sabba^eb^nti sabbameva pañcakāmaguṇagehanissitaṃ manomayaṃ vitakkaṃ. ^b^panujjā^eb^ti panuditvā nīharitvā. ^b^nekkhammasitaṃ irīyatī^eb^ti dabbajātiko bhikkhu nekkhammasitaṃ iriyena irīyati.

[03] ^b^chassu yadā^eb^ ^a^M3.0028^ea^ ^b^subhāvito^eb^ti chasu ārammaṇesu yadā suṭṭhu bhāvito. ^b^phuṭṭhassa cittaṃ na vikampate^eb^ ^a^V3.0028^ea^ ^b^kvacī^eb^ti sukhaphassena vā dukkhaphassena vā phuṭṭhassa kismiñci cittaṃ na kampati na vedhati. ^b^bhavattha jātimaraṇassa pāragā^eb^ti jātimaraṇānaṃ pāraṃ nibbānaṃ gamakā hotha.

[03] 95^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^b^mālukyaputto^eb^ti mālukyabrāhmaṇiyā putto. ^b^etthā^eb^ti etasmiṃ tava ovādāyācane. iminā theraṃ apasādetipi ussādetipi. kathaṃ? ayaṃ kira daharakāle rūpādīsu pamajjitvā pacchā mahallakakāle araññavāsaṃ patthento kammaṭṭhānaṃ yācati. atha bhagavā ``ettha dahare kiṃ vakkhāma? mālukyaputto viya tumhepi taruṇakāle pamajjitvā mahallakakāle araññaṃ pavisitvā samaṇadhammaṃ kareyyāthā''ti iminā adhippāyena bhaṇanto theraṃ apasādeti nāma.

[03] yasmā pana thero mahallakakālepi araññaṃ pavisitvā samaṇadhammaṃ kātukāmo, tasmā bhagavā ``ettha dahare kiṃ vakkhāma? ayaṃ amhākaṃ mālukyaputto ^a^P2.0383^ea^ mahallakakālepi araññaṃ pavisitvā samaṇadhammaṃ kattukāmo kammaṭṭhānaṃ yācati, tumhe nāma taruṇakālepi vīriyaṃ na karothā''ti iminā adhippāyena bhaṇanto theraṃ ussādeti nāma.

[03] ^b^yatra hi nāmā^eb^ti yo nāma. ^b^kiñcāpāha^eb^nti kiñcāpi ``ahaṃ mahallako''ti ñātaṃ. yadi ahaṃ mahallako, mahallako samānopi sakkhissāmi samaṇadhammaṃ kātuṃ, desetu me, bhante, bhagavāti adhippāyena mahallakabhāvaṃ anuggaṇhanto ovādañca pasaṃsanto evamāha.

[03] ^b^adiṭṭhā adiṭṭhapubbā^eb^ti imasmiṃ attabhāve adiṭṭhā atītepi adiṭṭhapubbā. ^b^na ca passasī^eb^ti etarahipi na passasi. ^b^na ca te hoti passeyya^eb^nti evaṃ samannāhāropi te yattha natthi, api nu te tattha chandādayo uppajjeyyunti pucchati.

[03] ^b^diṭṭhe diṭṭhamatta^eb^nti rūpāyatane cakkhuviññāṇena diṭṭhe diṭṭhamattaṃ bhavissati. cakkhuviññāṇañhi rūpe rūpamattameva passati, na niccādisabhāvaṃ, iti sesaviññāṇehipi me ettha diṭṭhamattameva cittaṃ bhavissatīti attho. atha vā ^a^M3.0029^ea^ diṭṭhe diṭṭhaṃ nāma cakkhuviññāṇaṃ, rūpe rūpavijānananti ^a^V3.0029^ea^ attho. ^b^mattā^eb^ti pamāṇaṃ, diṭṭhaṃ mattā assāti diṭṭhamattaṃ, cittaṃ, cakkhuviññāṇamattameva me cittaṃ bhavissatīti attho. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- yathā āpāthagatarūpe cakkhuviññāṇaṃ na rajjati na dussati na muyhati, evaṃ rāgādivirahena cakkhuviññāṇamattameva javanaṃ bhavissati, cakkhuviññāṇapamāṇeneva javanaṃ ṭhapessāmīti. atha vā diṭṭhaṃ nāma cakkhuviññāṇena diṭṭharūpaṃ, diṭṭhe diṭṭhamattaṃ nāma tattheva uppannaṃ sampaṭicchanasantīraṇavoṭṭhabbanasaṅkhātaṃ cittattayaṃ. yathā taṃ na rajjati, na dussati, na muyhati, evaṃ āpāthagate rūpe teneva sampaṭicchanādippamāṇena javanaṃ uppādessāmi, nāhaṃ taṃ pamāṇaṃ atikkamitvā ^a^P2.0384^ea^ rajjanādivasena uppajjituṃ dassāmīti ayamettha attho. eseva nayo ^b^sutamutesu^eb^.

[03] ^b^viññāte viññātamatta^eb^nti ettha pana viññātaṃ nāma manodvārāvajjanena viññātārammaṇaṃ, tasmiṃ viññāte viññātamattanti āvajjanapamāṇaṃ. yathā āvajjanena na rajjati na dussati na muyhati, evaṃ rajjanādivasena uppajjituṃ adatvā āvajjanapamāṇeneva cittaṃ ṭhapessāmīti ayamettha attho.

[03] ^b^yato^eb^ti yadā. ^b^tato^eb^ti tadā. ^b^na tenā^eb^ti tena rāgena vā ratto, dosena vā duṭṭho, mohena vā mūḷho na bhavissati. ^b^tato tvaṃ mālukyaputta na tatthā^eb^ti yadā tvaṃ tena rāgena vā dosamohehi vā ratto vā duṭṭho vā mūḷho vā na bhavissasi, tadā tvaṃ na tattha tasmiṃ diṭṭhe vā sutamutaviññāte vā paṭibaddho allīno patiṭṭhito nāma bhavissasi. ^b^nevidhā^eb^tiādi vuttatthameva.

[03] ^b^sati muṭṭhā^eb^ti sati naṭṭhā. ^b^tañca ajjhosā^eb^ti taṃ ārammaṇaṃ gilitvā. ^b^abhijjhā ca vihesā cā^eb^ti abhijjhāya ca vihiṃsāya ca. atha vā ``tassa vaḍḍhantī''ti padenāpi saddhiṃ yojetabbaṃ, abhijjhā ca vihesā cāti imepi dve dhammā tassa vaḍḍhantīti attho.

[03] ^b^cittamassūpahaññatī^eb^ti abhijjhāvihesāhi assa cittaṃ upahaññati. ^b^ācinato^eb^ti ācinantassa. ^b^ārā nibbāna vuccatī^eb^ti evarūpassa puggalassa nibbānaṃ nāma dūre pavuccati. ^b^ghatvā^eb^ti ghāyitvā. ^b^bhotvā^eb^ti bhutvā sāyitvā ^a^M3.0030^ea^ lehitvā. ^b^phussā^eb^ti phusitvā. ^b^paṭissato^eb^ti paṭissatisaṅkhātāya ^a^V3.0030^ea^ satiyā yutto. ^b^sevato cāpi vedana^eb^nti catumaggasampayuttaṃ nibbattitalokuttaravedanaṃ sevantassa. ^b^khīyatī^eb^ti khayaṃ gacchati. kiṃ taṃ? dukkhampi kilesajātampi. ^b^aññataro^eb^ti asītiyā mahāsāvakānaṃ abbhantaro eko. iti imasmiṃ sutte gāthāhipi vaṭṭavivaṭṭameva kathitaṃ.

[03] 96^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^b^parihānadhamma^eb^nti parihānasabhāvaṃ. ^b^abhibhāyatanānī^eb^ti abhibhavitāni āyatanāni. ^b^sarasaṅkappā^eb^ti ettha sarantīti sarā, dhāvantīti attho. sarā ca ^a^P2.0385^ea^ te saṅkappā ca ^b^sarasaṅkappā. saṃyojaniyā^eb^ti bandhaniyā bandhanassa paccayabhūtā. ^b^tañce bhikkhū^eb^ti taṃ evaṃ uppannaṃ kilesajātaṃ, taṃ vā ārammaṇaṃ. ^b^adhivāsetī^eb^ti citte āropetvā vāseti. ^b^nappajahatī^eb^ti chandarāgappahānena na pajahati. evaṃ sabbapadehi yojetabbaṃ. ^b^abhibhāyatanañhetaṃ vuttaṃ bhagavatā^eb^ti etaṃ buddhena bhagavatā abhibhavitaṃ āyatananti kathitaṃ. idha dhammaṃ pucchitvā vibhajantena puggalena dhammo dassito.

[03] 97^b^.^eb^ catutthe ^b^asaṃvutassā^eb^ti apihitassa na pidahitvā sañchāditvā ṭhapitassa. ^b^byāsiñcatī^eb^ti viāsiñcati, kilesatintaṃ hutvā vattati. ^b^pāmojja^eb^nti dubbalapīti. ^b^pītī^eb^ti balavapīti. ^b^passaddhī^eb^ti darathapassaddhi. ^b^dhammā na pātubhavantī^eb^ti samathavipassanādhammā na uppajjanti. imasmiṃ sutte puggalaṃ pucchitvā vibhajantena dhammena puggalo dassito.

[03] 98^b^.^eb^ pañcame ^b^kathañca, bhikkhave, asaṃvaro^eb^ti idaṃ maggakusalassa vāmaṃ muñcitvā dakkhiṇaṃ gaṇheyyāsīti paṭhamaṃ pahātabbamaggakkhānaṃ viya uddesakkamena avatvā desanākusalatāya paṭhamaṃ pahātabbadhammakkhānavasena vuttanti veditabbaṃ. idha dhammaṃ pucchitvā dhammova vibhatto.

[03] 99^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhe ^a^V3.0031^ea^ ^a^M3.0031^ea^ ^b^samādhi^eb^nti cittekaggataṃ. idañhi suttaṃ cittekaggatāya parihāyamāne disvā, ``imesaṃ cittekaggataṃ labhantānaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ phātiṃ gamissatī''ti ñatvā kathitaṃ.

[03] 100^b^.^eb^ sattame ^a^P2.0386^ea^ ^b^paṭisallāna^eb^nti kāyavivekaṃ. idañhi suttaṃ kāyavivekena parihāyamāne disvā, ``imesaṃ kāyavivekaṃ labhantānaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ phātiṃ gamissatī''ti ñatvā kathitaṃ.
[03] 101-102^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhamaṃ upamāya parivāretvā kathite bujjhanakānaṃ, navamaṃ suddhikavaseneva bujjhanakānaṃ ajjhāsayavasena vuttaṃ. attho pana ubhayatthāpi khandhiyavagge vuttanayeneva veditabbo.

[03] 103^b^.^eb^ dasame ^b^udako suda^eb^nti ettha ^b^suda^eb^nti nipātamattaṃ. ^b^udako^eb^ti tassa nāmaṃ. ^b^idaṃ jātu vedagū^eb^ti ettha ^b^ida^eb^nti nipātamattaṃ. atha vā idaṃ mama vacanaṃ suṇāthāti dīpento evamāha. ^b^jātu vedagū^eb^ti ahaṃ ekaṃseneva vedagū, vedasaṅkhātena ñāṇena neyyesu gato, vedaṃ vā gato adhigato, paṇḍitohamasmīti attho. ^b^sabbajī^eb^ti ekaṃsena sabbavaṭṭaṃ jinitvā abhibhavitvā ṭhitosmīti vadati. ^b^apalikhataṃ gaṇḍamūla^eb^nti apalikhataṃ dukkhamūlaṃ. ^b^palikhaṇi^eb^nti palikhataṃ mayā, khanitvā ṭhitosmīti dīpeti.

[03] ^b^mātāpettikasambhavassā^eb^ti mātito ca pitito ca nibbattena mātāpettikena sukkasoṇitena sambhūtassa. ^b^odanakummāsūpacayassā^eb^ti odanena ceva kummāsena ca upacitassa vaḍḍhitassa. ^b^aniccucchādanaparimaddanabhedanaviddhaṃsanadhammassā^eb^ti ettha ayaṃ kāyo hutvā abhāvaṭṭhena aniccadhammo ^a^V3.0032^ea^, duggandhavighātatthāya tanuvilepanena ucchādanadhammo, aṅgapaccaṅgābādhavinodanatthāya khuddakasambāhanena ^a^P2.0387^ea^ parimaddanadhammo, daharakāle ^a^M3.0032^ea^ vā ūrūsu sayāpetvā gabbhavāsena dussaṇṭhitānaṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ aṅgānaṃ saṇṭhānasampādanatthaṃ añchanapīḷanādīnaṃ vasena parimaddanadhammo, evaṃ pariharitopi ca bhedanaviddhaṃsanadhammo bhijjati ceva vikirati ca, evaṃ sabhāvoti attho.

[03] tattha mātāpettikasambhavaodanakummāsūpacayaparimaddanapadehi vaḍḍhi kathitā, aniccabhedanaviddhaṃsanapadehi parihāni. purimehi vā tīhi samudayo, pacchimehi atthaṅgamoti. evaṃ cātumahābhūtikassa kāyassa vaḍḍhiparihāninibbattibhedā dassitā. sesaṃ uttānatthamevāti.
[06] saḷavaggo dasamo.
[06] dutiyo paṇṇāsako.

[03] 104^b^.^eb^ yogakkhemivaggassa paṭhame ^b^yogakkhemipariyāya^eb^nti catūhi yogehi khemino kāraṇabhūtaṃ. ^b^dhammapariyāya^eb^nti dhammakāraṇaṃ. ^b^akkhāsi yoga^eb^nti yuttiṃ kathesi. ^b^tasmā^eb^ti kasmā? kiṃ akkhātattā, udāhu pahīnattāti? pahīnattā. na hi akkhānena yogakkhemi nāma hoti.

[03] 105-113^b^.^eb^ dutiye vedanāsukhadukkhaṃ kathitaṃ, taṃ pana vipākasukhadukkhaṃ vaṭṭati. tatiye ^b^dukkhassā^eb^ti vaṭṭadukkhassa. catutthe ^b^lokassā^eb^ti saṅkhāralokassa. pañcamādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā, taṃ khandhiyavagge vuttanayameva.
[06] yogakkhemivaggo ekādasamo.

[03] 114-115^b^.^eb^ lokakāmaguṇavaggassa ^a^V3.0033^ea^ ^a^M3.0033^ea^ ^a^P2.0388^ea^ paṭhame ^b^āvāsagato^eb^ti vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gato. ^b^mārassa vasaṃ gato^eb^ti tividhassāpi mārassa vasaṃ gato. ^b^paṭimukka'ssa mārapāso^eb^ti assa gīvāya mārapāso paṭimukko pavesito. dutiyaṃ uttānameva.

[03] 116^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^b^lokassā^eb^ti cakkavāḷalokassa. ^b^lokassa anta^eb^nti saṅkhāralokassa antaṃ. ^b^vihāraṃ pāvisī^eb^ti ``mayi vihāraṃ paviṭṭhe ime bhikkhū, imaṃ uddesaṃ ānandaṃ pucchissanti, so ca tesaṃ mama sabbaññutaññāṇena saṃsanditvā kathessati. tato naṃ thomessāmi, mama thomanaṃ sutvā bhikkhū ānandaṃ upasaṅkamitabbaṃ, vacanañcassa sotabbaṃ saddhātabbaṃ maññissanti, taṃ nesaṃ bhavissati dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāyā''ti cintetvā saṃkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthaṃ avibhajitvāva nisinnāsane antarahito gandhakuṭiyaṃ pāturahosi. tena vuttaṃ ``uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṃ pāvisī''ti.

[03] ^b^satthu ceva saṃvaṇṇito^eb^ti satthārā ca pasattho. ^b^viññūna^eb^nti idampi karaṇatthe sāmivacanaṃ, paṇḍitehi sabrahmacārīhi ca sambhāvitoti attho. ^b^pahotī^eb^ti sakkoti. ^b^atikkammeva mūlaṃ atikkammeva khandha^eb^nti sāro nāma mūle vā khandhe vā bhaveyya, tampi atikkamitvāti attho. ^b^evaṃsampadamida^eb^nti evaṃsampattikaṃ, īdisanti attho. ^b^atisitvā^eb^ti atikkamitvā. ^b^jānaṃ jānātī^eb^ti jānitabbameva jānāti. ^b^passaṃ passatī^eb^ti passitabbameva passati. yathā vā ekacco viparītaṃ gaṇhanto jānantopi na jānāti, passantopi na passati, na evaṃ bhagavā. bhagavā pana jānanto jānāti, passanto passatiyeva. svāyaṃ dassanapariṇāyakaṭṭhena ^b^cakkhubhūto^eb^. viditakaraṇaṭṭhena ^b^ñāṇabhūto^eb^ ^a^P2.0389^ea^. aviparītasabhāvaṭṭhena pariyattidhammapavattanato vā hadayena cintetvā vācāya nicchāritadhammamayoti ^b^dhammabhūto^eb^. seṭṭhaṭṭhena ^b^brahmabhūto^eb^. atha vā cakkhu ^a^V3.0034^ea^ viya bhūtoti cakkhubhūto. evametesu padesu attho veditabbo. svāyaṃ dhammassa ^a^M3.0034^ea^ vattanato ^b^vattā^eb^. pavattanato ^b^pavattā^eb^. atthaṃ nīharitvā nīharitvā dassanasamatthatāya ^b^atthassa ninnetā^eb^. amatādhigamāya paṭipattiṃ desetīti ^b^amatassa dātā^eb^.

[03] ^b^agaruṃ karitvā^eb^ti punappunaṃ yācāpentopi hi garuṃ karoti nāma. attano sekkhapaṭisambhidāñāṇe ṭhatvā sinerupādato vālikaṃ uddharamāno viya dubbiññeyyaṃ katvā kathentopi garuṃ karotiyeva nāma. evaṃ akatvā amhe punappunaṃ ayācāpetvā suviññeyyampi no katvā kathehīti vuttaṃ hoti.

[03] ^b^yaṃ kho vo^eb^ti yaṃ kho tumhākaṃ. ^b^cakkhunā kho, āvuso, lokasmiṃ lokasaññī hoti lokamānī^eb^ti cakkhuñhi loke appahīnadiṭṭhi puthujjano sattalokavasena lokoti sañjānāti ceva maññati ca, tathā cakkavāḷalokavasena. na hi aññatra cakkhādīhi dvādasāyatanehi tassa sā saññā vā māno vā uppajjati. tena vuttaṃ, ``cakkhunā kho, āvuso, lokasmiṃ lokasaññī hoti lokamānī''ti. imassa ca lokassa gamanena anto nāma ñātuṃ vā daṭṭhuṃ vā pattuṃ vā na sakkā. lujjanaṭṭhena pana tasseva cakkhādibhedassa lokassa nibbānasaṅkhātaṃ antaṃ appatvā vaṭṭadukkhassa antakiriyā nāma natthīti veditabbā.

[03] evaṃ pañhaṃ vissajjetvā idāni ``sāvakena pañho kathitoti mā nikkaṅkhā ahuvattha, ayaṃ bhagavā sabbaññutaññāṇatulaṃ gahetvā nisinno. icchamānā tameva upasaṅkamitvā nikkaṅkhā hothā''ti uyyojento ^b^ākaṅkhamānā panā^eb^tiādimāha.

[03] ^b^imehi ākārehī^eb^ti imehi kāraṇehi cakkavāḷalokassa antābhāvakāraṇehi ceva saṅkhāralokassa antāpattikāraṇehi ca. ^b^imehi padehī^eb^ti imehi akkharasampiṇḍanehi. ^b^byañjanehī^eb^ti pāṭiyekkākkharehi.

[03] ^b^paṇḍito^eb^ti ^a^P2.0390^ea^ paṇḍiccena samannāgato. catūhi kāraṇehi paṇḍito dhātukusalo āyatanakusalo paccayākārakusalo kāraṇākāraṇakusaloti. ^b^mahāpañño^eb^ti mahante atthe mahante dhamme mahantā ^a^M3.0035^ea^ niruttiyo mahantāni paṭibhānāni paṭiggaṇhanasamatthatāya mahāpaññāya samannāgato. ^b^yathā^eb^ ^a^V3.0035^ea^ ^b^taṃ ānandenā^eb^ti yathā ānandena byākataṃ, taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. yathā ānandena taṃ byākataṃ, ahampi taṃ evameva byākareyyanti attho.

[03] 117^b^.^eb^ catutthe ^b^ye me^eb^ti ye mama. ^b^cetaso samphuṭṭhapubbā^eb^ti cittena anubhūtapubbā. ^b^tatra me cittaṃ bahulaṃ gacchamānaṃ gaccheyyā^eb^ti tesu pāsādattayatividhanāṭakādibhedasampattivasena anubhūtapubbesu pañcasu kāmaguṇesu bahūsu vāresu uppajjamānaṃ uppajjeyyāti dīpeti. ^b^paccuppannesu vā^eb^ti idha padhānacariyakāle chabbassāni supupphitavanasaṇḍajātānaṃ dijagaṇādīnaṃ vasena diṭṭhasutādibhedaṃ manoramārammaṇaṃ kāmaguṇaṃ katvā dassento ``evarūpesu paccuppannesu vā bahulaṃ uppajjeyyā''ti dasseti. ^b^appaṃ vā anāgatesū^eb^ti anāgate ``metteyyo nāma buddho bhavissati, saṅkho nāma rājā, ketumatī nāma rājadhānī''tiādivasena (dī0 ni0 3.106) parittakameva anāgatesu kāmaguṇesu uppajjeyyāti dasseti. ^b^tatra me attarūpenā^eb^ti tatra mayā attano hitakāmajātikena. ^b^appamādo^eb^ti sātaccakiriyā pañcasu kāmaguṇesu cittassa avossaggo. ^b^satī^eb^ti ārammaṇapariggahitasati. ^b^ārakkho^eb^ti ayaṃ appamādo ca sati ca cetaso ārakkho karaṇīyo, evaṃ me ahosīti dasseti, ārakkhatthāya ime dve dhammā kātabbāti vuttaṃ hoti.

[03] ^b^tasmātiha, bhikkhave, se āyatane veditabbe^eb^ti yasmā cetaso ārakkhatthāya appamādo ca sati ca kātabbā, yasmā tasmiṃ āyatane vidite appamādena vā satiyā vā kātabbaṃ natthi, tasmā ^a^P2.0391^ea^ se āyatane veditabbe, taṃ kāraṇaṃ jānitabbanti attho. ^b^saḷāyatananirodha^eb^nti saḷāyatananirodho vuccati nibbānaṃ, taṃ sandhāya bhāsitanti attho. nibbānasmiñhi cakkhuādīni ceva nirujjhanti rūpasaññādayo ca nirujjhantīti. sesaṃ vuttanayameva.

[03] 118-119^b^.^eb^ pañcame ^a^M3.0036^ea^ ^b^diṭṭheva dhamme^eb^ti imasmiṃyeva attabhāve. ^b^parinibbāyantī^eb^ti kilesaparinibbānena parinibbāyanti. ^b^tannissitaṃ viññāṇaṃ hotī^eb^ti taṇhānissitaṃ kammaviññāṇaṃ hoti ^a^V3.0036^ea^. ^b^tadupādāna^eb^nti taṃgahaṇaṃ, taṇhāgahaṇena sahagataṃ viññāṇaṃ hotīti attho. chaṭṭhaṃ uttānameva.
[03] 120^b^.^eb^ sattame ^b^santānessatī^eb^ti ghaṭessati, yogavicchedamassa pāpuṇituṃ na dassati.
[03] 121^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhame ^b^vimuttiparipācaniyā^eb^ti vimuttiṃ paripācentīti vimuttiparipācaniyā. ^b^dhammā^eb^ti pannarasa dhammā, te saddhindriyādīnaṃ visuddhikaraṇavasena veditabbā. vuttañhetaṃ --

[02] ``assaddhe puggale parivajjayato, saddhe puggale sevato bhajato payirupāsato, pasādanīye suttante paccavekkhato, imehi tīhākārehi saddhindriyaṃ visujjhati. kusīte puggale parivajjayato, āraddhavīriye puggale sevato bhajato payirupāsato, sammappadhāne paccavekkhato, imehi tīhākārehi vīriyindriyaṃ visujjhati. muṭṭhassatī puggale parivajjayato, upaṭṭhitassatī puggale sevato bhajato payirupāsato ^a^P2.0392^ea^, satipaṭṭhāne paccavekkhato, imehi tīhākārehi satindriyaṃ visujjhati. asamāhite puggale parivajjayato, samāhite puggale sevato bhajato payirupāsato, jhānavimokkhe paccavekkhato, imehi tīhākārehi samādhindriyaṃ visujjhati. duppaññe puggale parivajjayato, paññavante puggale sevato bhajato payirupāsato, gambhīrañāṇacariyaṃ paccavekkhato, imehi tīhākārehi paññindriyaṃ visujjhati. iti ime pañca puggale parivajjayato, pañca puggale sevato bhajato payirupāsato ^a^M3.0037^ea^, pañca suttante paccavekkhato, imehi pannarasahi ākārehi imāni pañcindriyāni visujjhantī''ti (paṭi0 ma0 1.184).

[03] aparepi pannarasa dhammā vimuttiparipācaniyā -- saddhāpañcamāni indriyāni, aniccasaññā, anicce dukkhasaññā, dukkhe anattasaññā, pahānasaññā, virāgasaññāti imā ^a^V3.0037^ea^ pañca nibbedhabhāgiyā saññā, meghiyattherassa kathitā kalyāṇamittatādayo pañca dhammāti (udā0 31). kāya pana velāya bhagavato etadahosīti? paccūsasamaye lokaṃ volokentassa.

[03] ^b^anekāni devatāsahassānī^eb^ti āyasmatā rāhulena padumuttarassa bhagavato pādamūle pālitanāgarājakāle patthanaṃ paṭṭhapentena saddhiṃ patthanaṃ paṭṭhapitadevatāsu pana kāci bhūmaṭṭhakā devatā, kāci antalikkhaṭṭhakā, kāci cātumahārājikā, kāci devaloke, kāci brahmaloke nibbattā. imasmiṃ pana divase sabbāpi tā ekaṭṭhāne andhavanasmiṃyeva sannipatitā, tā sandhāyāha -- ``anekāni devatāsahassānī''ti. ^b^dhammacakkhu^eb^nti imasmiṃ sutte cattāro ca maggā cattāri ca phalāni dhammacakkhunti veditabbāni. tattha hi kāci devatā sotāpannā ahesuṃ, kāci sakadāgāmī, anāgāmī, khīṇāsavā. tāsañca pana devatānaṃ ettakāti gaṇanavasena paricchedo natthi. sesaṃ sabbattha uttānameva.
[03] 122-123^b^.^eb^ navamadasamāni iṭṭhārammaṇavasena kathiyamāne bujjhanakānaṃ vasena vuttānīti.
[06] lokakāmaguṇavaggo dvādasamo.

[03] 124-126^b^.^eb^ gahapativaggassa ^a^P2.0393^ea^ paṭhame ^b^uggo^eb^ti paṇītadāyakānaṃ aggauggo, so bhagavatā ``etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ paṇītadāyakānaṃ yadidaṃ ^a^M3.0038^ea^ uggo gahapatī''ti evaṃ etadagge ṭhapito. sesametesu ceva dvīsu, tatiye ca vuttatthameva.

[03] 127-128^b^.^eb^ catutthe ^a^V3.0038^ea^ piṇḍaṃ ulamāno pariyesamāno pabbajitoti ^b^piṇḍolo^eb^. so kira parijiṇṇabhogo brāhmaṇo ahosi. atha bhikkhusaṅghassa lābhasakkāraṃ disvā piṇḍatthāya nikkhamitvā pabbajito. so mahantaṃ kapallapattaṃ gahetvā carati, tena kapallapūraṃ yāguṃ pivati, kapallapūre pūve khādati, kapallapūraṃ bhattaṃ bhuñjati. athassa mahagghasabhāvaṃ satthu ārocayiṃsu. satthā tassa pattatthavikaṃ nānujāni. heṭṭhāmañce pattaṃ nikkujjitvā ṭhapeti. so ṭhapentopi ghaṃsantova paṇāmetvā ṭhapeti, gaṇhantopi ghaṃsantova ākaḍḍhitvā gaṇhāti. taṃ gacchante kāle dhaṃsanena parikkhīṇaṃ nāḷikodanamattameva gaṇhanakaṃ jātaṃ. tato satthu ārocesuṃ, athassa satthā pattatthavikaṃ anujāni. thero aparena samayena indriyabhāvanaṃ bhāvetvā aggaphale arahatte patiṭṭhāsi. iti so piṇḍatthāya pabbajitattā piṇḍolo, gottena pana bhāradvājoti ubhayaṃ ekato katvā ^b^piṇḍolabhāradvājo^eb^ti vuccati.

[03] ^b^upasaṅkamī^eb^ti uggatuggatehi mahāamaccehi parivuto upasaṅkami. thero kira ekadivasaṃ sāvatthiyaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā katabhattakicco nidāghasamaye sītaṭhāne divāvihāraṃ nisīdissāmīti ākāsena gantvā gaṅgātīre udenassa rañño udapānaṃ nāma uyyānaṃ atthi, tattha pavisitvā aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle divāvihāraṃ nisīdi sītena udakavātena ^a^P2.0394^ea^ bījiyamāno.

[03] udenopi kho nāma rājā sattāhaṃ mahāpānaṃ pivitvā sattame divase uyyānaṃ paṭijaggāpetvā mahājanaparivāro uyyānaṃ gantvā maṅgalasilāpaṭṭe atthatāya seyyāya nipajji. tassa ekā paricārikā pāde sambāhamānā nisinnā. rājā kamena niddaṃ okkami. tasmiṃ niddaṃ okkante nāṭakitthiyo ``yassatthāya mayaṃ gītādīni payojeyyāma, so niddaṃ upagato, na ca niddākāle ^a^M3.0039^ea^ mahāsaddaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī''ti attano attano tūriyāni ṭhapetvā uyyānaṃ pakkantā. tā tattha tattha phalāphalāni khādamānā pupphāni piḷandhamānā vicarantiyo theraṃ disvā ``mā saddaṃ karitthā''ti aññamaññaṃ nivārayamānā vanditvā nisīdiṃsu. thero ``issā pahātabbā, maccheraṃ vinodetabba''ntiādinā nayena tāsaṃ anurūpaṃ dhammakathaṃ kathesi.

[03] sāpi ^a^V3.0039^ea^ kho rañño pāde sambāhamānā nisinnā itthī pāde cāletvā rājānaṃ pabodhesi. so ``kahaṃ tā gatā''ti pucchi. kiṃ tāsaṃ tumhehi? tā ekaṃ samaṇaṃ parivāretvā nisinnāti. rājā kuddho uddhane pakkhittaloṇaṃ viya taṭataṭāyamāno uṭṭhahitvā ``tambakipillikāhi naṃ khādāpessāmī''ti gacchanto ekasmiṃ asokarukkhe tambakipillikānaṃ puṭaṃ disvā hatthenākaḍḍhitvā sākhaṃ gaṇhituṃ nāsakkhi. kipillikapuṭo chijjitvā rañño sīse pati, sakalasarīraṃ sālithusehi parikiṇṇaṃ viya daṇḍadīpikāhi ḍayhamānaṃ viya ca ahosi. thero rañño paduṭṭhabhāvaṃ ñatvā iddhiyā ākāsaṃ pakkhandi. tāpi itthiyo uṭṭhāya rañño santikaṃ gantvā sarīraṃ puñchantiyo viya bhūmiyaṃ patitapatitā kipillikāyo gahetvā sarīre khipamānā sabbā mukhasattīhi vijjhiṃsu -- ``kiṃ nāmetaṃ, aññe rājāno pabbajite disvā vandanti, pañhaṃ pucchanti, ayaṃ pana rājā kipillikapuṭaṃ sīse bhinditukāmo jāto''ti.

[03] rājā attano aparādhaṃ disvā uyyānapālaṃ pakkosāpetvā pucchi -- ``kiṃ esa pabbajito? aññesupi divasesu idha āgacchatī''ti? āma, devāti. idha tvaṃ āgatadivase mayhaṃ āroceyyāsīti. theropi ^a^P2.0395^ea^ katipāheneva puna āgantvā rukkhamūle nisīdi. uyyānapālo disvā -- ``mahanto me ayaṃ paṇṇākāro''ti vegena gantvā rañño ārocesi. rājā uṭṭhahitvā saṅkhapaṇavādisaddaṃ nivāretvā uggatuggatehi amaccehi saddhiṃ uyyānaṃ agamāsi. tena vuttaṃ ``upasaṅkamī''ti.

[03] ^b^anikīḷitāvino kāmesū^eb^ti yā kāmesu kāmakīḷā, taṃ akīḷitapubbā, aparibhuttakāmāti attho. ^b^addhānañca āpādentī^eb^ti paveṇiṃ paṭipādenti, dīgharattaṃ anubandhāpenti. ^b^mātumattīsū^eb^ti mātupamāṇāsu. lokasmiñhi mātā bhaginī dhītāti idaṃ tividhaṃ garukārammaṇaṃ nāma ^a^M3.0040^ea^, iti garukārammaṇe upanibandhaṃ cittaṃ vimocetuṃ na labhatīti dassento evamāha. athassa tena pañhena cittaṃ anotarantaṃ disvā bhagavatā paṭikūlamanasikāravasena cittūpanibandhanatthaṃ vuttaṃ dvattiṃsākārakammaṭṭhānaṃ kathesi.

[03] ^b^abhāvitakāyā^eb^ti abhāvitapañcadvārikakāyā. ^b^tesaṃ taṃ dukkaraṃ hotī^eb^ti tesaṃ taṃ asubhakammaṭṭhānaṃ bhāvetuṃ dukkaraṃ hoti. itissa imināpi cittaṃ anotarantaṃ disvā indriyasaṃvarasīlaṃ kathesi ^a^V3.0040^ea^. indriyasaṃvarasmiñhi upanibandhacittaṃ viheṭhetuṃ na labhati. rājā taṃ sutvā tattha otiṇṇacitto ^b^acchariyaṃ, bho bhāradvājā^eb^tiādimāha.

[03] ^b^arakkhiteneva kāyenā^eb^tiādīsu hatthapāde kīḷāpento gīvaṃ parivattento kāyaṃ na rakkhati nāma, nānappakāraṃ duṭṭhullaṃ kathento vacanaṃ na rakkhati nāma, kāmavitakkādayo vitakkento cittaṃ na rakkhati nāma. ^b^rakkhiteneva kāyenā^eb^tiādīsu vuttavipariyāyena attho veditabbo.

[03] ^b^ativiya maṃ tasmiṃ samaye lobhadhammā parisahantī^eb^ti maṃ tasmiṃ samaye atikkamitvā lobho adhibhavatīti attho. ^b^upaṭṭhitāya satiyā^eb^ti kāyagatāya satiyā supaṭṭhitāya. ^b^na maṃ tathā tasmiṃ samaye^eb^ti tasmiṃ samaye maṃ yathā pubbe, na tathā lobho atikkamitvā uppajjatīti attho. ^b^parisahantī^eb^ti padassa uppajjantītipi atthoyeva. iti imasmiṃ sutte tayo kāyā kathitā. kathaṃ ^a^P2.0396^ea^? ``imameva kāya''nti ettha hi karajakāyo kathito, ``bhāvitakāyo''ti ettha pañcadvārikakāyo, ``rakkhiteneva kāyenā''ti ettha copanakāyo, kāyaviññattīti attho. pañcamaṃ uttānameva.

[03] 129^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhe ^b^rūpā ca manāpā^eb^ti rūpā ca manāpā saṃvijjanti. ^b^cakkhuviññāṇañcā^eb^ti cakkhuviññāṇañca saṃvijjati. ^b^sukhavedaniyaṃ phassa^eb^nti cakkhuviññāṇasampayuttaṃ upanissayavasena javanakāle sukhavedanāya paccayabhūtaṃ phassaṃ. ^b^sukhā vedanā^eb^ti ekaṃ phassaṃ paṭicca javanavasena sukhavedanā uppajjati. sesapadesupi eseva nayo.

[03] iti ^a^M3.0041^ea^ imasmiṃ sutte tevīsati dhātuyo kathitā. kathaṃ? ettha hi cakkhupasādo cakkhudhātu, tassa ārammaṇaṃ rūpadhātu, cakkhuviññāṇaṃ viññāṇadhātu, cakkhuviññāṇadhātuyā sahajātā tayo khandhā dhammadhātu, evaṃ pañcasu dvāresu catunnaṃ catunnaṃ vasena vīsati. manodvāre ``manodhātū''ti āvajjanacittaṃ gahitaṃ, ārammaṇañceva hadayavatthu ca dhammadhātu, vatthunissitaṃ manoviññāṇadhātūti ^a^V3.0041^ea^ evaṃ tevīsati honti. evaṃ tevīsatiyā dhātūnaṃ vasena dhātunānattaṃ vuttaṃ bhagavatāti dasseti.

[03] 130-131^b^.^eb^ sattame ^b^manāpaṃ itthetanti pajānātī^eb^ti yaṃ anena manāpaṃ rūpaṃ diṭṭhaṃ, taṃ itthetanti evametaṃ manāpameva tanti pajānāti. ^b^cakkhuviññāṇaṃ sukhavedaniyañca phassaṃ paṭiccā^eb^ti cakkhuviññāṇañceva, yo ca upanissayakoṭiyā vā anantarakoṭiyā vā samanantarakoṭiyā vā sampayuttakoṭiyā vā sukhavedanāya paccayo phasso, taṃ sukhavedaniyaṃ phassañca paṭicca uppajjati sukhavedanāti. esa nayo sabbattha. iti imesu dvīsu suttesu kiriyāmanoviññāṇadhātu āvajjanakiccā, manodhātuyeva vā samānā manodhātunāmena vuttāti veditabbā. aṭṭhamaṃ ^a^P2.0397^ea^ uttānameva.

[03] 132^b^.^eb^ navame ^b^makkarakate^eb^ti evaṃnāmake nagare ^b^araññakuṭikāya^eb^nti araññe katāya pāṭiyekkāya kuṭiyaṃ, na vihārapaccantakuṭiyaṃ. ^b^māṇavakā^eb^ti yepi tattha mahallakā, te mahallakakālepi antevāsikatāya māṇavakātveva vuttā. ^b^tenupasaṅkamiṃsū^eb^ti pāto sippaṃ uggaṇhitvā sāyaṃ ``ācariyassa kaṭṭhāni āharissāmā''ti araññaṃ pavisitvā vicarantā yena sā kuṭikā, tenupasaṅkamiṃsu. ^b^parito parito kuṭikāyā^eb^ti tassā kuṭikāya samantato samantato. ^b^seleyyakānī^eb^ti aññamaññassa piṭṭhiṃ gahetvā laṅghitvā ito cito caṅkamanakīḷanāni.

[03] ^b^muṇḍakā^eb^tiādīsu ^a^M3.0042^ea^ muṇḍe muṇḍāti, samaṇe ca samaṇāti vattuṃ vaṭṭeyya, ime pana hīḷentā ``muṇḍakā samaṇakā''ti āhaṃsu. ^b^ibbhā^eb^ti gahapatikā. ^b^kaṇhā^eb^ti kaṇhā, kāḷakāti attho. ^b^bandhupādāpaccā^eb^ti ettha ^b^bandhū^eb^ti brahmā adhippeto. tañhi brāhmaṇā pitāmahoti voharanti. pādānaṃ apaccā pādāpaccā, brahmuno piṭṭhipādato jātāti adhippāyo. tesaṃ kira ayaṃ laddhi ``brāhmaṇā brahmuno mukhato nikkhantā, khattiyā urato, vessā ^a^V3.0042^ea^ nābhito, suddā jāṇuto, samaṇā piṭṭhipādato''ti. ^b^bharatakāna^eb^nti kuṭimbikānaṃ. kuṭimbikā hi yasmā raṭṭhaṃ bharanti, tasmā bharatāti vuccanti. ime pana paribhavaṃ katvā vadamānā ``bharatakāna''nti āhaṃsu.

[03] ^b^vihārā nikkhamitvā^eb^ti ``rattiṭṭhakāparicchanne rajatapaṭṭasannibhasamavippakiṇṇavālike ramaṇīye pariveṇe kaṭṭhakalāpe bandhitvā khipamānā vālikaṃ āluḷetvā, hatthena hatthaṃ ādāya paṇṇakuṭiṃ pariyāyantā `ime imesaṃ bharatakānaṃ ^a^P2.0398^ea^ sakkatā, ime imesaṃ bharatakānaṃ sakkatā'ti punappunaṃ viravantā ativiya ime māṇavakā kīḷaṃ karonti, vihāre bhikkhūnaṃ atthibhāvampi na jānanti, dassessāmi nesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ atthibhāva''nti cintetvā paṇṇakuṭito nikkhami.

[03] ^b^sīluttamā pubbatarā ahesu^eb^nti guṇavantānaṃ guṇe kathite nigguṇānaṃ guṇābhāvo pākaṭova bhavissatīti porāṇakabrāhmaṇānaṃ guṇe kathento evamāha. tattha ^b^sīluttamā^eb^ti sīlajeṭṭhakā. sīlañhi tesaṃ uttamaṃ, na jātigottaṃ. ^b^ye purāṇaṃ sarantī^eb^ti ye porāṇakaṃ brāhmaṇadhammaṃ saranti. ^b^abhibhuyya kodha^eb^nti kodhaṃ abhibhavitvā tesaṃ dvārāni suguttāni surakkhitāni ahesuṃ. ^b^dhamme ca jhāne ca ratā^eb^ti dasavidhe kusalakammapathadhamme aṭṭhasamāpattijhānesu ca ratā.

[03] evaṃ porāṇānaṃ guṇaṃ kathetvā athetarahi brāhmaṇānaṃ mānaṃ nimmaddento ^b^ime ca vokkamma japāmase^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^vokkammā^eb^ti etehi guṇehi apakkamitvā. ^b^japāmase^eb^ti mayaṃ japāma sajjhāyāmāti ettakeneva brāhmaṇamhāti maññamānā brāhmaṇā mayanti iminā gottena mattā hutvā ^b^visamaṃ caranti,^eb^ visamāni kāyakammādīni karontīti attho. ^b^puthuattadaṇḍā^eb^ti ^a^M3.0043^ea^ puthu attā daṇḍā etehīti puthuattadaṇḍā, gahitanānāvidhadaṇḍāti attho. ^b^sataṇhātaṇhesū^eb^ti sataṇhanittaṇhesu. ^b^aguttadvārassa bhavanti moghā^eb^ti asaṃvutadvārassa sabbepi vatasamādānā moghā bhavantīti dīpeti. yathā kinti? ^b^supineva laddhaṃ purisassa vitta^eb^nti yathā supine purisassa laddhaṃ maṇimuttādinānāvidhaṃ vittaṃ moghaṃ hoti, pabujjhitvā kiñci na passati, evaṃ moghā bhavantīti attho.

[03] ^b^anāsakā^eb^ti ekāhadvīhādivasena anāhārakā. ^b^thaṇḍilasāyikā cā^eb^ti haritakusasanthate bhūmibhāge sayanaṃ, ^b^pāto sinānañca^eb^ ^a^P2.0399^ea^ ^b^tayo ca vedā^eb^ti pātova udakaṃ pavisitvā nhānañceva tayo ^a^V3.0043^ea^ ca vedā. ^b^kharājinaṃ jaṭā paṅko^eb^ti kharasamphassaṃ ajinacammañceva jaṭākalāpo ca paṅko ca, paṅko nāma dantamalaṃ. ^b^mantā sīlabbataṃ tapo^eb^ti mantā ca ajasīlagosīlasaṅkhātaṃ sīlaṃ ajavatagovatasaṅkhātaṃ vatañca. ayaṃ idāni brāhmaṇānaṃ tapoti vadati. ^b^kuhanā vaṅkadaṇḍā cā^eb^ti paṭicchannakūpo viya paṭicchannadosaṃ kohaññañceva vaṅkadaṇḍo, ca udumbarapalāsabeḷuvarukkhānaṃ aññatarato gahitaṃ vaṅkadaṇḍañcāti attho. ^b^udakācamanāni cā^eb^ti udakena mukhaparimajjanāni. ^b^vaṇṇā ete brāhmaṇāna^eb^nti ete brāhmaṇānaṃ parikkhārabhaṇḍakavaṇṇāti dasseti. ^b^kata kiñcikkhabhāvanā^eb^ti katā kiñcikkhabhāvanā. ayameva vā pāṭho, āmisakiñcikkhassa vaḍḍhanatthāya katanti attho.

[03] evaṃ etarahi brāhmaṇānaṃ mānaṃ nimmadditvā puna porāṇakabrāhmaṇānaṃ vaṇṇaṃ kathento ^b^cittañca susamāhita^eb^ntiādimāha. tattha ^b^susamāhita^eb^nti tesaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ cittaṃ upacārappanāsamādhīhi susamāhitaṃ ahosīti dasseti. ^b^akhila^eb^nti mudu athaddhaṃ. ^b^so maggo brahmapattiyā^eb^ti so seṭṭhapattiyā maggo, tumhe pana kiṃ brāhmaṇā nāmāti dīpento evamāha.

[03] ^b^āgamaṃsu nu khvidhā^eb^ti āgamaṃsu nu kho idha. ^b^adhimuccatī^eb^ti kilesavasena adhimutto giddho hoti. ^b^byāpajjatī^eb^ti byāpādavasena pūticittaṃ hoti. ^b^parittacetaso^eb^ti anupaṭṭhitasatitāya saṃkilesacittena parittacitto. ^b^cetovimutti^eb^nti phalasamādhiṃ. ^b^paññāvimutti^eb^nti phalapaññaṃ. ^b^appamāṇacetaso^eb^ti upaṭṭhitasatitāya nikkilesacittena appamāṇacitto.
[03] 133^b^.^eb^ dasame ^a^M3.0044^ea^ ^b^kāmaṇḍāya^eb^nti evaṃnāmake nagare. ^b^yagghe^eb^ti codanatthe nipāto. sesaṃ uttānamevāti.
[06] gahapativaggo terasamo.

[03] 134^b^.^eb^ devadahavaggassa ^a^V3.0044^ea^ ^a^P2.0400^ea^ paṭhame ^b^devadaha^eb^nti napuṃsakaliṅgena laddhanāmo nigamo. ^b^manoramā^eb^ti manaṃ ramayantā, manāpāti attho. ^b^amanoramā^eb^ti amanāpā.

[03] 135^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^b^chaphassāyatanikā nāmā^eb^ti visuṃ chaphassāyatanikā nāma nirayā natthi. sabbesupi hi ekatiṃsamahānirayesu chadvāraphassāyatanapaññatti hotiyeva. idaṃ pana avīcimahānirayaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. ^b^saggā^eb^ti idhāpi tāvatiṃsapurameva adhippetaṃ. kāmāvacaradevaloke pana ekasmimpi chaphassāyatanapaññattiyā abhāvo nāma natthi. iminā kiṃ dīpeti? niraye ekantadukkhasamappitabhāvena, devaloke ca ekantasukhasamappitattā ekantakhiḍḍārativasena uppannapamādena maggabrahmacariyavāsaṃ vasituṃ na sakkā. manussaloko pana vokiṇṇasukhadukkho, idheva apāyopi saggopi paññāyati. ayaṃ maggabrahmacariyassa kammabhūmi nāma, sā tumhehi laddhā. tasmā ye vo ime mānussakā khandhā laddhā, te vo lābhā. yañca vo idaṃ manussattaṃ laddhaṃ, paṭiladdho vo brahmacariyavāsassa khaṇo samayoti. vuttampi hetaṃ porāṇehi --
[21] ``ayaṃ kammabhūmi idha maggabhāvanā,
[27] ṭhānāni saṃvejaniyā bahū idha.
[26] saṃvegasaṃvejaniyesu vatthusu,
[22] saṃvegajātova payuñca yoniso''ti..

[03] 136^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^a^M3.0045^ea^ ^b^rūpasammuditā^eb^ti rūpe sammuditā pamoditā. ^b^dukkhā^eb^ti dukkhitā. ^b^sukho^eb^ti ^a^V3.0045^ea^ nibbānasukhena sukhito. ^b^kevalā^eb^ti ^a^P2.0401^ea^ sakalā. ^b^yāvatatthīti vuccatī^eb^ti yattakā atthīti vuccati. ^b^ete vo^eb^ti ettha vo-kāro nipātamattaṃ. ^b^paccanīkamidaṃ hoti, sabbalokena passata^eb^nti yaṃ idaṃ passantānaṃ paṇḍitānaṃ dassanaṃ, taṃ sabbalokena paccanīkaṃ hoti viruddhaṃ. loko hi pañcakkhandhe niccā sukhā attā subhāti maññati, paṇḍitā aniccā dukkhā anattā asubhāti. ^b^sukhato āhū^eb^ti sukhanti kathenti. ^b^sukhato vidū^eb^ti sukhanti jānanti. sabbametaṃ nibbānameva sandhāya vuttaṃ.

[03] ^b^sammūḷhetthā^eb^ti ettha nibbāne sammūḷhā. ^b^aviddasū^eb^ti bālā. sabbepi hi channavutipāsaṇḍino ``nibbānaṃ pāpuṇissāmā''ti saññino honti, te pana ``nibbānaṃ nāma ida''ntipi na jānanti. ^b^nivutāna^eb^nti kilesanīvaraṇena nivutānaṃ pariyonaddhānaṃ. ^b^andhakāro apassata^eb^nti apassantānaṃ andhakāro hoti. kiṃ taṃ evaṃ hoti? nibbānaṃ vā nibbānadassanaṃ vā apassantānañhi bālānaṃ nibbānampi nibbānadassanampi kāḷameghāvacchāditaṃ viya candamaṇḍalaṃ kaṭāhena paṭikujjitapatto viya ca niccakālaṃ tamo ceva andhakāro ca sampajjati.

[03] ^b^satañca vivaṭaṃ hoti, āloko passatāmivā^eb^ti satañca sappurisānaṃ paññādassanena passantānaṃ nibbānaṃ āloko viya vivaṭaṃ hoti. ^b^santike na vijānanti, magā dhammassa akovidā^eb^ti yaṃ attano sarīre kese vā lomādīsu vā aññatarakoṭṭhāsaṃ paricchinditvā anantarameva adhigantabbato attano vā khandhānaṃ nirodhamaggato santike nibbānaṃ. taṃ evaṃ santike samānampi maggabhūtā janā maggāmaggadhammassa catusaccadhammassa vā akovidā na jānanti.

[03] ^b^māradheyyānupannehī^eb^ti tebhūmakavaṭṭaṃ mārassa nivāsaṭṭhānaṃ anupannehi. ^b^ko^eb^ ^a^P2.0402^ea^ ^b^nu aññatra ariyebhī^eb^ti ṭhapetvā ariye ko nu añño nibbānapadaṃ jānituṃ arahati. ^b^sammadaññāya parinibbantī^eb^ti arahattapaññāya sammā jānitvā anantarameva anāsavā hutvā kilesaparinibbānena parinibbanti. atha vā sammadaññāya anāsavā hutvā ante khandhaparinibbānena parinibbāyanti.

[03] 137-145^b^.^eb^ catutthaṃ ^a^V3.0046^ea^ ^a^M3.0046^ea^ suddhikaṃ katvā desiyamāne bujjhanakānaṃ ajjhāsayena vuttaṃ. pañcamādīni tathā tathā bujjhantānaṃ ajjhāsayena vuttāni. attho pana tesaṃ pākaṭoyevāti.
[06] devadahavaggo cuddasamo.

[03] 146^b^.^eb^ navapurāṇavaggassa paṭhame ^b^navapurāṇānī^eb^ti navāni ca purāṇāni ca. ^b^cakkhu, bhikkhave, purāṇakamma^eb^nti na cakkhu purāṇaṃ, kammameva purāṇaṃ, kammato pana nibbattattā paccayanāmena evaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^abhisaṅkhata^eb^nti paccayehi abhisamāgantvā kataṃ. ^b^abhisañcetayita^eb^nti cetanāya pakappitaṃ. ^b^vedaniyaṃ daṭṭhabba^eb^nti vedanāya vatthūti passitabbaṃ. ^b^nirodhā vimuttiṃ phusatī^eb^ti imassa tividhassa kammassa nirodhena vimuttiṃ phusati. ^b^ayaṃ vuccatī^eb^ti ayaṃ tassā vimuttiyā ārammaṇabhūto nirodho kammanirodhoti vuccati. iti imasmiṃ sutte pubbabhāgavipassanā kathitā.
[03] 147-150^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^b^nibbānasappāya^eb^nti nibbānassa sappāyaṃ upakārapaṭipadaṃ. tatiyādīsupi eseva nayo. paṭipāṭiyā pana catūsupi etesu suttesu saha vipassanāya cattāro maggā kathitā.

[03] 151-152^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhe ^a^P2.0403^ea^ ^b^anantevāsika^eb^nti anto vasanakakilesavirahitaṃ. ^b^anācariyaka^eb^nti ācaraṇakakilesavirahitaṃ ^a^V3.0047^ea^. ^b^antassa vasantī^eb^ti anto assa vasanti. ^b^te naṃ samudācarantī^eb^ti te etaṃ adhibhavanti ajjhottharanti sikkhāpenti vā. ``evaṃ vejjakammaṃ karohi, evaṃ dūtakamma''nti iti sikkhāpanasaṅkhātena samudācaraṇatthenassa te ācariyā nāma honti, tehi ^a^M3.0047^ea^ ācariyehi sācariyakoti vuccati. sesamettha vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. sattamaṃ heṭṭhā kathitanayameva.

[03] 153^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhame ^b^yaṃ pariyāyaṃ āgammā^eb^ti yaṃ kāraṇaṃ āgamma. ^b^aññatreva saddhāyā^eb^ti vinā saddhāya saddhaṃ apanetvā. ettha ca saddhāti na paccakkhā saddhā. yo pana parassa evaṃ kira evaṃ kirāti kathentassa sutvā uppanno saddahanākāro, taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^ruci^eb^ādīsupi rucāpetvā khamāpetvā atthetanti gahaṇākāro ^b^ruci^eb^ nāma, evaṃ kira bhavissatīti anussavanaṃ ^b^anussavo,^eb^ nisīditvā ekaṃ kāraṇaṃ cintentassa kāraṇaṃ upaṭṭhāti, evaṃ upaṭṭhitassa atthetanti gahaṇaṃ ^b^ākāraparivitakko^eb^ nāma, kāraṇavitakkoti attho. kāraṇaṃ cintentassa pāpikā laddhi uppajjati, taṃ atthesāti gahaṇākāro ^b^diṭṭhinijjhānakkhanti^eb^ nāma. ^b^aññaṃ byākareyyā^eb^ti imāni pañca ṭhānāni muñcitvā arahattaṃ byākareyya. imasmiṃ sutte sekhāsekhānaṃ paccavekkhaṇā kathitā.

[03] 154-155^b^.^eb^ navame ^b^indriyasampanno^eb^ti paripuṇṇindriyo. tattha yena cha indriyāni sammasitvā arahattaṃ pattaṃ, so tehi nibbisevanehi indriyehi samannāgatattā, cakkhādīni vā cha indriyāni ^a^P2.0404^ea^ sammasantassa uppannehi saddhādīhi indriyehi samannāgatattā paripuṇṇindriyo nāma hoti, taṃ sandhāya bhagavā ^b^cakkhundriye ce^eb^tiādinā nayena desanaṃ vitthāretvā ^b^ettāvatā kho bhikkhu indriyasampanno hotī^eb^ti āha. dasamaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayamevāti.
[06] navapurāṇavaggo pañcadasamo.
[06] tatiyo paṇṇāsako.

[03] 156-159^b^.^eb^ nandikkhayavaggassa ^a^V3.0048^ea^ ^a^M3.0048^ea^ ^a^P3.0001^ea^ paṭhame ^b^nandikkhayā rāgakkhayo, rāgakkhayā nandikkhayo^eb^ti nandiyā ca rāgassa ca atthato ekattā vuttaṃ. ^b^suvimutta^eb^nti arahattaphalavimuttivasena suṭṭhu vimuttaṃ. sesamettha dutiyādīsu ca uttānameva.

[03] 160-161^b^.^eb^ pañcamaṃ samādhivikalānaṃ, chaṭṭhaṃ paṭisallānavikalānaṃ cittekaggatañca kāyavivekañca labhantānaṃ etesaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ phātiṃ gamissatīti ñatvā kathitaṃ. tattha ^b^okkhāyatī^eb^ti (paccakkhāyati) paññāyati pākaṭaṃ hoti. iti dvīsupi etesu saha vipassanāya cattāro maggā kathitā.
[03] 162-164^b^.^eb^ sattamādīsu ^a^P3.0002^ea^ tīsu therassa vimuttiparipācaniyā dhammāva kathitā.
[03] 165-167^b^.^eb^ dasamādīni tīṇi pāṭiyekkena puggalajjhāsayavasena vuttāni. tesaṃ attho vuttanayeneva veditabboti.
[06] nandikkhayavaggo solasamo.
