[22] aheṭhayanto pāṇāni, yāti lokavināyako..
[21] ``dakkhiṇaṃ ^a^P3.0049^ea^ paṭhamaṃ pādaṃ, uddharanto narāsabho
[22] gacchanto sirisampanno, sobhate dvipaduttamo..
[21] ``gacchato buddhaseṭṭhassa, heṭṭhāpādatalaṃ mudu.
[22] samaṃ samphusate bhūmiṃ, rajasā nupalippati..
[21] ``ninnaṭṭhānaṃ unnamati, gacchante lokanāyake.
[22] unnatañca samaṃ hoti, pathavī ca acetanā..
[21] ``pāsāṇā sakkharā ceva, kathalā khāṇukaṇṭakā.
[22] sabbe maggā vivajjanti, gacchante lokanāyake..
[21] ``nātidūre uddharati, naccāsanne ca nikkhipaṃ.
[22] aghaṭṭayanto niyyāti, ubho jāṇū ca gopphake..
[21] ``nātisīghaṃ pakkamati, sampannacaraṇo muni.
[22] na cāpi saṇikaṃ yāti, gacchamāno samāhito..
[21] ``uddhaṃ ^a^V3.0090^ea^ adho ca tiriyañca, disañca vidisaṃ tathā.
[22] na pekkhamāno so yāti, yugamattañhi pekkhati..
[21] ``nāgavikkantacāro ^a^M3.0092^ea^ so, gamane sobhate jino.
[22] cāruṃ gacchati lokaggo, hāsayanto sadevake..
[21] ``uḷurājāva sobhanto, catucārīva kesarī.
[22] tosayanto bahū satte, puraṃ seṭṭhaṃ upāgamī''ti..

[03] vaṇṇakālo nāma kiresa, evaṃvidhesu kālesu buddhassa sarīravaṇṇe vā guṇavaṇṇe vā dhammakathikassa thāmoyeva pamāṇaṃ. cuṇṇiyapadehi vā gāthābandhena vā yattakaṃ sakkoti, tattakaṃ vattabbaṃ. dukkathitanti na vattabbaṃ. appamāṇavaṇṇā hi buddhā. tesaṃ buddhāpi anavasesato vaṇṇaṃ vattuṃ asamatthā, pageva itarā pajāti. iminā sirivilāsena alaṅkatapaṭiyattaṃ sakyarājakulaṃ pavisitvā bhagavā pasannacittena janena gandhadhūmavāsacuṇṇādīhi pūjiyamāno santhāgāraṃ pāvisi. tena vuttaṃ ``atha kho bhagavā nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya saddhiṃ ^a^P3.0050^ea^ bhikkhusaṅghena yena navaṃ santhāgāraṃ tenupasaṅkamī''ti.

[03] ^b^bhagavantaṃyeva purakkhatvā^eb^ti bhagavantaṃ purato katvā. tattha bhagavā bhikkhūnañceva upāsakānañca majjhe nisinno gandhodakena nhāpetvā dukūlacumbaṭakena vodakaṃ katvā jātihiṅgulakena majjitvā rattakambalapaliveṭhite pīṭhe ṭhapitarattasuvaṇṇaghanapaṭimā viya ativirocittha. ayaṃ panettha porāṇānaṃ vaṇṇabhaṇanamaggo --
[21] ``gantvāna maṇḍalamāḷaṃ, nāgavikkantacāraṇo.
[22] obhāsayanto lokaggo, nisīdi varamāsane..
[21] ``tahiṃ nisinno naradammasārathi,
[27] devātidevo satapuññalakkhaṇo.
[26] buddhāsane ^a^V3.0091^ea^ majjhagato virocati,
[22] suvaṇṇanekkhaṃ viya paṇḍukambale..
[21] ``nekkhaṃ jambonadasseva, nikkhittaṃ paṇḍukambale.
[22] virocati vītamalo, maṇiverocano yathā..
[21] ``mahāsālova ^a^M3.0093^ea^ samphullo, nerurājāva'laṅkato.
[22] suvaṇṇayūpasaṅkāso, padumo kokanado yathā..
[21] ``jalanto dīparukkhova, pabbatagge yathā sikhī.
[22] devānaṃ pāricchattova, sabbaphullo virocatī''ti..

[03] ^b^kāpilavatthave sakye bahudeva rattiṃ dhammiyā kathāyā^eb^ti ettha dhammakathā nāma santhāgārānumodanāpaṭisaṃyuttā pakiṇṇakakathā veditabbā. tadā hi bhagavā ākāsagaṅgaṃ otārento viya pathavojaṃ ākaḍḍhanto viya mahājambuṃ matthake gahetvā cālento viya yojanikaṃ madhubhaṇḍaṃ cakkayantena pīḷetvā madhupānaṃ pāyamāno viya kapilavatthuvāsīnaṃ sakyānaṃ hitasukhāvahaṃ pakiṇṇakakathaṃ kathesi. ``āvāsadānaṃ nāmetaṃ, mahārāja, mahantaṃ, tumhākaṃ āvāso mayā paribhutto, bhikkhusaṅghena ca paribhutto ^a^P3.0051^ea^, mayā ca bhikkhusaṅghena ca paribhutto pana dhammaratanena paribhuttoyevāti tīhi ratanehi paribhutto nāma hoti. āvāsadānasmiñhi dinne sabbadānaṃ dinnameva hoti. bhummaṭṭhakapaṇṇasālāya vā sākhāmaṇḍapassa vāpi ānisaṃso nāma paricchindituṃ na sakkā. āvāsadānānubhāvena hi bhave bhave nibbattassāpi sambādhitagabbhavāso na hoti, dvādasahattho ovarako viya mātukucchi asambādhova hotī''ti. evaṃ nānānayavicittaṃ bahuṃ dhammiṃ kathaṃ kathetvā --
[21] ``sītaṃ uṇhaṃ paṭihanti, tato vāḷamigāni ca.
[22] sirīsape ca makase, sisire cāpi vuṭṭhiyo..
[21] ``tato ^a^V3.0092^ea^ vātātapo ghoro, sañjāto paṭihaññati.
[22] leṇatthañca sukhatthañca, jhāyituñca vipassituṃ..
[21] ``vihāradānaṃ saṅghassa, aggaṃ buddhena vaṇṇitaṃ.
[22] tasmā hi paṇḍito poso, sampassaṃ atthamattano..
[21] ``vihāre kāraye ramme, vāsayettha bahussute.
[22] tesaṃ annañca pānañca, vatthasenāsanāni ca..
[21] ``dadeyya ^a^M3.0094^ea^ ujubhūtesu, vippasannena cetasā.
[27] te tassa dhammaṃ desenti, sabbadukkhāpanūdanaṃ.
[22] yaṃ so dhammaṃ idhaññāya, parinibbāti anāsavo''ti.. (cūḷava0 295) --

[07] evaṃ ``ayampi āvāse ānisaṃso, ayampi āvāse ānisaṃso''ti bahudeva rattiṃ atirekataraṃ diyaḍḍhayāmaṃ āvāsānisaṃsakathaṃ kathesi. tattha imā tāva gāthāva saṅgahaṃ āruḷhā, pakiṇṇakadhammadesanā pana saṅgahaṃ nārohati. ^b^sandassetvā^eb^tiādīni vuttatthāneva.

[03] ^b^abhikkantā^eb^ti atikkantā dve yāmā gatā. ^b^yassa dāni kālaṃ maññathā^eb^ti yassa tumhe gamanassa kālaṃ maññatha, gamanakālo tumhākaṃ, gacchathāti vuttaṃ hoti. kasmā pana bhagavā te uyyojesīti? anukampāya. sukhumālā hi te, tiyāmarattiṃ nisīditvā vītināmentānaṃ sarīre ābādho uppajjeyya. bhikkhusaṅghopi mahā, tassa ṭhānanisajjānaṃ okāso laddhuṃ vaṭṭatīti ubhayānukampāya uyyojesi.

[03] ^b^vigatathinamiddho^eb^ti tatra kira bhikkhū yāmadvayaṃ ṭhitāpi ^a^P3.0052^ea^ nisinnāpi acālayiṃsu, pacchimayāme pana āhāro pariṇamati, tassa pariṇatattā bhikkhusaṅgho vigatathinamiddho jātoti akāraṇametaṃ. buddhānañhi kathaṃ suṇantassa kāyikacetasikadarathā na honti, kāyacittalahutādayo uppajjanti, tena tesaṃ dve yāme ṭhitānampi nisinnānampi dhammaṃ suṇantānaṃ thinamiddhaṃ vigataṃ, pacchimayāmepi sampatte tathā vigatameva jātaṃ. tenāha ``vigatathinamiddho''ti.

[03] ^b^piṭṭhi^eb^ ^a^V3.0093^ea^ ^b^me āgilāyatī^eb^ti kasmā āgilāyati? bhagavato hi chabbassāni mahāpadhānaṃ padahantassa mahantaṃ kāyadukkhaṃ ahosi, athassa aparabhāge mahallakakāle piṭṭhivāto uppajjīti. akāraṇaṃ vā etaṃ. pahoti hi bhagavā uppannaṃ vedanaṃ vikkhambhetvā ekampi dvepi sattāhāni ekapallaṅkena nisīdituṃ. santhāgārasālaṃ pana catūhi iriyāpathehi paribhuñjitukāmo ahosi. tattha pādadhovanaṭṭhānato yāva dhammāsanā agamāsi, ettake ṭhāne gamanaṃ nipphannaṃ. dhammāsanaṃ pattaṃ thokaṃ ṭhatvā nisīdi, ettake ṭhāne ṭhānaṃ nipphannaṃ. dveyāmaṃ dhammāsane nisīdi, ettake ṭhāne ^a^M3.0095^ea^ nisajjā nipphannā. idāni dakkhiṇena passena thokaṃ nipanne sayanaṃ nipphajjissatīti evaṃ catūhi iriyāpathehi paribhuñjitukāmo ahosi. upādinnakasarīrañca nāma ``no āgilāyatī''ti na vattabbaṃ, tasmā ciranisajjāya sañjātaṃ appakampi āgilāyanaṃ gahetvā evamāha.

[03] ^b^saṅghāṭiṃ paññāpetvā^eb^ti santhāgārassa kira ekapasse te rājāno paṭasāṇiṃ parikkhipāpetvā kappiyamañcakaṃ paññāpetvā kappiyapaccattharaṇena attharitvā upari suvaṇṇatārakagandhamālādidāmapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ vitānaṃ bandhitvā gandhatelappadīpaṃ āropayiṃsu, ``appeva nāma satthā dhammāsanato vuṭṭhāya thokaṃ vissamanto idha nipajjeyya, evaṃ no imaṃ santhāgāraṃ bhagavatā catūhi iriyāpathehi paribhuttaṃ dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya bhavissatī''ti. satthāpi ^a^P3.0053^ea^ tadeva sandhāya tattha saṅghāṭiṃ paññāpetvā nipajji. ^b^uṭṭhānasaññaṃ manasi karitvā^eb^ti ``ettakaṃ kālaṃ atikkamitvā vuṭṭhahissāmī''ti vuṭṭhānasaññaṃ citte ṭhapetvā, tañca kho aniddāyantova therassa dhammakathaṃ suṇamāno.

[03] ^b^avassutapariyāya^eb^nti avassutassa pariyāyaṃ, avassutassa kāraṇanti attho. ^b^adhimuccatī^eb^ti kilesādhimuccanena adhimuccati, giddho hoti. ^b^byāpajjatī^eb^ti byāpādavasena pūticitto hoti. ^b^cakkhuto^eb^ti cakkhubhāvena. ^b^māro^eb^ti kilesamāropi devaputtamāropi. ^b^otāra^eb^nti vivaraṃ. ^b^ārammaṇa^eb^nti paccayaṃ. naḷāgāratiṇāgāraṃ viya hi savisevanāni āyatanāni, tiṇukkā viya kilesuppattirahaṃ ārammaṇaṃ, tiṇukkāya ṭhapitaṭhapitaṭṭhāne aṅgārassujjalanaṃ viya ārammaṇe āpāthamāgate kilesānaṃ uppatti. tena vuttaṃ ^b^labhetha māro otāra^eb^nti.

[03] sukkapakkhe ^a^V3.0094^ea^ bahalamattikapiṇḍāvalepanaṃ kūṭāgāraṃ viya nibbisevanāni āyatanāni, tiṇukkā viya vuttapakārārammaṇaṃ, tiṇukkāya ṭhapitaṭhapitaṭṭhāne nibbāpanaṃ viya nibbisevanānaṃ āyatanānaṃ ārammaṇe āpāthamāgate kilesapariḷāhassa anuppatti. tena vuttaṃ ^b^neva labhetha māro otāra^eb^nti.

[03] 244^b^.^eb^ sattame ^a^M3.0096^ea^ ^b^dukkhadhammāna^eb^nti dukkhasambhavadhammānaṃ. pañcasu hi khandhesu sati chedanavadhabandhanādibhedaṃ dukkhaṃ sambhavati, tasmā te dukkhasambhavadhammattā dukkhadhammāti vuccanti. ^b^tathā kho panassā^eb^ti tenākārenassa. ^b^yathāssa kāme passato^eb^ti yenākārenassa kāme passantassa. ^b^yathā caranta^eb^nti yenākārena cārañca vihārañca anubandhitvā carantaṃ. ^b^aṅgārakāsūpamā^eb^ ^a^P3.0054^ea^ ^b^kāmā diṭṭhā hontī^eb^ti pariyeṭṭhimūlakassa ceva paṭisandhimūlakassa ca dukkhassa vasena aṅgārakāsu viya mahāpariḷāhāti diṭṭhā honti. kāme pariyesantānañhi nāvāya mahāsamuddogāhanājapathasaṅkupathapaṭipajjanaubhatobyūḷhasaṅgāmapakkhandanādivasena pariyeṭṭhimūlakampi, kāme paribhuñjantānaṃ kāmaparibhogacetanāya catūsu apāyesu dinnapaṭisandhimūlakampi mahāpariḷāhadukkhaṃ uppajjati. evametassa duvidhassāpi dukkhassa vasena aṅgārakāsu viya mahāpariḷāhāti diṭṭhā honti.

[03] ^b^dāya^eb^nti aṭaviṃ. ^b^puratopi kaṇṭako^eb^ti purimapasse vijjhitukāmo viya āsannaṭṭhāneyeva ṭhitakaṇṭako. ^b^pacchato^eb^tiādīsupi eseva nayo. heṭṭhā pana pādehi akkantaṭṭhānassa santike, na akkantaṭṭhāneyeva. evaṃ so kaṇṭakagabbhaṃ paviṭṭho viya bhaveyya. ^b^mā maṃ kaṇṭako^eb^ti mā maṃ kaṇṭako vijjhīti kaṇṭakavedhaṃ rakkhamāno.

[03] ^b^dandho, bhikkhave, satuppādo^eb^ti satiyā uppādoyeva dandho, uppannamattāya pana tāya kāci kilesā niggahitāva honti, na saṇṭhātuṃ sakkonti. cakkhudvārasmiñhi rāgādīsu uppannesu dutiyajavanavārena ``kilesā me uppannā''ti ñatvā tatiye javanavāre saṃvarajavanaṃyeva javati. anacchariyañcetaṃ, yaṃ vipassako tatiyajavanavāre kilese niggaṇheyya. cakkhudvāre pana iṭṭhārammaṇe āpāthagate bhavaṅgaṃ āvaṭṭetvā āvajjanādīsu uppannesu voṭṭhabbanānantaraṃ sampattakilesajavanavāraṃ ^a^V3.0095^ea^ nivattetvā kusalameva uppādeti. āraddhavipassakānañhi ayamānisaṃso bhāvanāpaṭisaṅkhāne patiṭṭhitabhāvassa.

[03] ^b^abhihaṭṭhuṃ^eb^ ^a^M3.0097^ea^ ^b^pavāreyyu^eb^nti sudinnattherassa viya raṭṭhapālakulaputtassa viya ca kāyena vā satta ratanāni abhiharitvā vācāya vā ``amhākaṃ dhanato yattakaṃ icchasi, tattakaṃ ^a^P3.0055^ea^ gaṇhā''ti vadantā pavāreyyuṃ. ^b^anudahantī^eb^ti sarīre paliveṭhitattā uṇhapariḷāhaṃ janetvā anudahanti. sañjātasede vā sarīre laggantā anusentītipi attho. ^b^yañhi taṃ, bhikkhave, citta^eb^nti idaṃ yasmā citte anāvaṭṭante puggalassa āvaṭṭanaṃ nāma natthi. evarūpañhi cittaṃ anāvaṭṭanti, tasmā vuttaṃ. iti imasmiṃ sutte vipassanābalameva dīpitaṃ.

[03] 245^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhame ^b^dassana^eb^nti paṭhamamaggassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. paṭhamamaggo hi kilesapahānakiccaṃ sādhento paṭhamaṃ nibbānaṃ passati, tasmā dassananti vuccati. gotrabhuñāṇaṃ pana kiñcāpi maggato paṭhamataraṃ passati, passitvā pana kattabbakiccassa kilesapahānassa abhāvena na dassananti vuccati. apica cattāropi maggā dassanameva. kasmā? sotāpattimaggakkhaṇe dassanaṃ visujjhati, phalakkhaṇe visuddhaṃ. sakadāgāmianāgāmiarahattamaggakkhaṇe visujjhati, phalakkhaṇe visuddhanti evaṃ kathentānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ sutvā so bhikkhu ``ahampi dassanaṃ visodhetvā arahattaphale patiṭṭhito dassanavisuddhikaṃ nibbānaṃ sacchikatvā viharissāmī''ti taṃ bhikkhuṃ upasaṅkamitvā evaṃ pucchi. so phassāyatanakammaṭṭhāniko channaṃ phassāyatanānaṃ vasena rūpārūpadhamme pariggahetvā arahattaṃ patto. ettha hi purimāni pañca āyatanāni rūpaṃ, manāyatanaṃ arūpaṃ. iti so attanā adhigatamaggameva kathesi.

[03] ^b^asantuṭṭho^eb^ti padesasaṅkhāresu ṭhatvā kathitattā asantuṭṭho. evaṃ kirassa ahosi -- ``ayaṃ padesasaṅkhāresu ṭhatvā kathesi. sakkā nu kho padesasaṅkhāresu ṭhatvā dassanavisuddhikaṃ nibbānaṃ pāpuṇitu''nti? tato naṃ pucchi -- ``āvuso, tvaṃyeva nu kho idaṃ dassanavisuddhikaṃ nibbānaṃ jānāsi, udāhu aññepi jānantā atthī''ti. atthāvuso, asukavihāre asukatthero nāmāti. so tampi upasaṅkamitvā pucchi. etenupāyena aññampi aññampīti.

[03] ettha ^a^V3.0096^ea^ ^a^M3.0098^ea^ ca dutiyo pañcakkhandhakammaṭṭhāniko rūpakkhandhavasena ^a^P3.0056^ea^ rūpaṃ, sesakkhandhavasena nāmanti nāmarūpaṃ vavatthapetvā anukkamena arahattaṃ patto. tasmā sopi attanā adhigatamaggameva kathesi. ayaṃ pana ``imesaṃ aññamaññaṃ na sameti, paṭhamena sappadesasaṅkhāresu ṭhatvāva kathitaṃ, iminā nippadesesū''ti asantuṭṭho hutvā tatheva taṃ pucchitvā pakkāmi.

[03] tatiyo mahābhūtakammaṭṭhāniko cattāri mahābhūtāni saṅkhepato ca vitthārato ca pariggahetvā arahattaṃ patto, tasmā ayampi attanā adhigatamaggameva kathesi. ayaṃ pana ``imesaṃ aññamaññaṃ na sameti, paṭhamena sappadesasaṅkhāresu ṭhatvā kathitaṃ, dutiyena nippadesesu, tatiyena atisappadesesū''ti asantuṭṭho hutvā tatheva taṃ pucchitvā pakkāmi.

[03] catuttho tebhūmakakammaṭṭhāniko. tassa kira samappavattā dhātuyo ahesuṃ, kallasarīraṃ balapattaṃ, kammaṭṭhānānipissa sabbāneva sappāyāni, atītā vā saṅkhārā hontu anāgatā vā paccuppannā vā kāmāvacarā vā rūpāvacarā vā arūpāvacarā vā, sabbepi sappāyāva. asappāyakammaṭṭhānaṃ nāma natthi. kālesupi purebhattaṃ vā hotu pacchābhattaṃ vā paṭhamayāmādayo vā, asappāyo kālo nāma natthi. yathā nāma cāribhūmiṃ otiṇṇo mahāhatthī hatthena gahetabbaṃ hattheneva luñcitvā gaṇhāti, pādehi paharitvā gahetabbaṃ pādehi paharitvā gaṇhāti, evameva sakale tebhūmakadhamme kalāpaggāhena gahetvā sammasanto arahattaṃ patto, tasmā esopi attanā adhigatamaggameva kathesi. ayaṃ pana ``imesaṃ aññamaññaṃ na sameti. paṭhamena sappadesasaṅkhāresu ṭhatvā kathitaṃ, dutiyena nippadesesu, puna tatiyena sappadesesu, catutthena nippadesesuyevā''ti asantuṭṭho hutvā taṃ pucchi -- ``kiṃ nu kho, āvuso, idaṃ dassanavisuddhikaṃ ^a^P3.0057^ea^ nibbānaṃ tumhehi attanova dhammatāya ñātaṃ, udāhu kenaci vo akkhāta''nti? āvuso, mayaṃ kiṃ jānāma? atthi pana sadevake loke sammāsambuddho, taṃ nissāyetaṃ amhehi ñātanti. so cintesi -- ``ime bhikkhū mayhaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ gahetvā kathetuṃ na sakkonti, ahaṃ sabbaññubuddhameva pucchitvā nikkaṅkho bhavissāmī''ti yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami.

[03] bhagavā ^a^M3.0099^ea^ tassa vacanaṃ sutvā ``yehi te pañho kathito, te cattāropi khīṇāsavā, sukathitaṃ tehi, tvaṃ pana attano andhabālatāya taṃ na sallakkhesī''ti na evaṃ vihesesi. kārakabhāvaṃ ^a^V3.0097^ea^ panassa ñatvā ``atthagavesako esa, dhammadesanāya eva naṃ bujjhāpessāmī''ti kiṃsukopamaṃ āhari. tattha bhūtaṃ vatthuṃ katvā evamattho vibhāvetabbo -- ekasmiṃ kira mahānagare eko sabbaganthadharo brāhmaṇavejjo paṇḍito paṭivasati. atheko nagarassa pācīnadvāragāmavāsī paṇḍurogapuriso tassa santikaṃ āgantvā taṃ vanditvā aṭṭhāsi. vejjapaṇḍito tena saddhiṃ sammoditvā ``kenatthena āgatosi bhadramukhā''ti, pucchi. rogenamhi, ayya, upadduto, bhesajjaṃ me kathehīti. tena hi, bho, gaccha, kiṃsukarukkhaṃ chinditvā, sosetvā jhāpetvā, tassa khārodakaṃ gahetvā iminā ciminā ca bhesajjena yojetvā, ariṭṭhaṃ katvā piva, tena te phāsukaṃ bhavissatīti. so tathā katvā nirogo balavā pāsādiko jāto.

[03] athañño dakkhiṇadvāragāmavāsī puriso teneva rogena āturo ``asuko kira bhesajjaṃ katvā arogo jāto''ti sutvā taṃ upasaṅkamitvā pucchi -- ``kena te, samma, phāsukaṃ jāta''nti. kiṃsukāriṭṭhena nāma, gaccha tvampi karohīti. sopi tathā katvā tādisova jāto.

[03] athañño pacchimadvāragāmavāsī...pe0... uttaradvāragāmavāsī puriso teneva rogena āturo ``asuko kira bhesajjaṃ katvā arogo jāto''ti taṃ upasaṅkamitvā pucchi ``kena te, samma, phāsukaṃ jāta''nti? kiṃsukāriṭṭhena nāma, gaccha tvampi karohīti. sopi tathā katvā tādisova jāto.

[03] athañño paccantavāsī adiṭṭhapubbakiṃsuko eko puriso teneva rogena āturo ciraṃ tāni tāni bhesajjāni katvā roge avūpasamamāne ``asuko kira nagarassa pācīnadvāragāmavāsī ^a^P3.0058^ea^ puriso bhesajjaṃ katvā arogo jāto''ti sutvā ``gacchāmahampi, tena katabhesajjaṃ karissāmī''ti daṇḍamolubbha anupubbena tassa santikaṃ gantvā, ``kena te, samma, phāsukaṃ jāta''nti pucchi. kiṃsukāriṭṭhena sammāti. kīdiso ^a^M3.0100^ea^ pana so kiṃsukoti. jhāpitagāme ṭhitajhāmathūṇo viyāti. iti so puriso attanā diṭṭhākārenava kiṃsukaṃ ācikkhi. tena hi diṭṭhakāle kiṃsuko patitapatto khāṇukakāle diṭṭhattā tādisova hoti.

[03] so pana puriso sutamaṅgalikattā ``ayaṃ `jhāpitagāme jhāmathūṇo viyā'ti āha, amaṅgalametaṃ ^a^V3.0098^ea^. etasmiñhi me bhesajje katepi rogo na vūpasamissatī''ti tassa veyyākaraṇena asantuṭṭho taṃ pucchi -- ``kiṃ nu kho, bho, tvaññeva kiṃsukaṃ jānāsi, udāhu aññopi atthī''ti. atthi, bho, dakkhiṇadvāragāme asuko nāmāti. so taṃ upasaṅkamitvā pucchi, svāssa pupphitakāle diṭṭhattā attano dassanānurūpena ``lohitako kiṃsuko''ti āha. so ``ayaṃ purimena viruddhaṃ āha, kāḷako lohitakato suvidūradūre''ti tassapi veyyākaraṇena asantuṭṭho ``atthi pana, bho, aññopi koci kiṃsukadassāvī, yena kiṃsuko diṭṭhapubbo''ti? pucchitvā, ``atthi pacchimadvāragāme asuko nāmā''ti vutte tampi upasaṅkamitvā pucchi. svāssa phalitakāle diṭṭhattā attano dassanānurūpena ``ocirakajāto ādinnasipāṭiko''ti āha. phalitakālasmiñhi kiṃsuko olambamānacīrako viya adhomukhaṃ katvā gahitāsikoso viya ca sirīsarukkho viya ca lambamānaphalo hoti. so ``ayaṃ purimehi viruddhaṃ āha, na sakkā imassa vacanaṃ gahetu''nti tassapi veyyākaraṇena asantuṭṭho ``atthi pana, bho, aññopi koci kiṃsukadassāvī, yena kiṃsuko diṭṭhapubbo''ti? pucchitvā, ``atthi uttaradvāragāme asuko nāmā''ti vutte tampi upasaṅkamitvā pucchi. so assa sañchannapattakāle diṭṭhattā attano dassanānurūpena ``bahalapattapalāso sandacchāyo''ti āha. ^b^sandacchāyo^eb^ nāma saṃsanditvā ṭhitacchāyo.

[03] so ``ayampi purimehi viruddhaṃ āha, na sakkā imassa vacanaṃ gahetu''nti tassapi veyyākaraṇena asantuṭṭho ^a^P3.0059^ea^ taṃ āha, ``kiṃ nu kho, bho, tumhe attanova dhammatāya kiṃsukaṃ jānātha, udāhu kenaci vo akkhāto''ti? kiṃ, bho, mayaṃ jānāma? atthi pana mahānagarassa majjhe ^a^M3.0101^ea^ amhākaṃ ācariyo vejjapaṇḍito, taṃ nissāya amhehi ñātanti. ``tena hi ahampi ācariyameva upasaṅkamitvā nikkaṅkho bhavissāmī''ti tassa santikaṃ upasaṅkamitvā taṃ vanditvā aṭṭhāsi. vejjapaṇḍito tena saddhiṃ sammoditvā, ``kenatthena āgatosi bhadramukhā''ti pucchi. rogenamhi, ayya, upadduto, bhesajjaṃ me kathethāti. tena hi, bho, gaccha, kiṃsukarukkhaṃ chinditvā sosetvā jhāpetvā tassa khārodakaṃ gahetvā iminā ciminā ca bhesajjena yojetvā ariṭṭhaṃ katvā piva, etena te phāsukaṃ bhavissatīti. so tathā katvā nirogo balavā pāsādiko jāto.

[03] tattha mahānagaraṃ viya nibbānanagaraṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. vejjapaṇḍito viya sammāsambuddho. vuttampi ce ^a^V3.0099^ea^ taṃ ``bhisakko sallakattoti kho, sunakkhatta, tathāgatassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassā''ti (ma0 ni0 3.65) catūsu dvāragāmesu cattāro vejjantevāsikā viya cattāro dassanavisuddhipattā khīṇāsavā. paccantavāsī paṭhamapuriso viya pañhapucchako bhikkhu. paccantavāsino catunnaṃ vejjantevāsikānaṃ kathāya asantuṭṭhassa ācariyameva upasaṅkamitvā pucchanakālo viya imassa bhikkhuno catunnaṃ dassanavisuddhipattānaṃ khīṇāsavānaṃ kathāya asantuṭṭhassa satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā pucchanakālo.

[03] ^b^yathā yathā adhimuttāna^eb^nti yena yenākārena adhimuttānaṃ. ^b^dassanaṃ suvisuddha^eb^nti nibbānadassanaṃ suṭṭhu visuddhaṃ. ^b^tathā tathā kho tehi sappurisehi byākata^eb^nti tena tenevākārena tuyhaṃ tehi sappurisehi kathitaṃ. yathā hi ``kāḷako kiṃsuko''ti kathento na aññaṃ kathesi, attanā diṭṭhanayena kiṃsukameva kathesi, evameva chaphassāyatanānaṃ vasena dassanavisuddhipattakhīṇāsavopi imaṃ pañhaṃ kathento na aññaṃ kathesi, attanā adhigatamaggena dassanavisuddhikaṃ nibbānameva kathesi.

[03] yathā ca ``lohitako ocirakajāto bahalapattapalāso kiṃsuko''ti kathentopi na aññaṃ kathesi, attanā diṭṭhanayena kiṃsukameva kathesi, evameva pañcupādānakkhandhavasena catumahābhūtavasena tebhūmakadhammavasena dassanavisuddhipattakhīṇāsavopi imaṃ pañhaṃ kathento ^a^M3.0102^ea^ na aññaṃ kathesi, attanā adhigatamaggena dassanavisuddhikaṃ nibbānameva kathesi.

[03] tattha yathā kāḷakakāle kiṃsukadassāvinopi taṃ dassanaṃ bhūtaṃ ^a^P3.0060^ea^ tacchaṃ na tena aññaṃ diṭṭhaṃ, kiṃsukova diṭṭho, evameva chaphassāyatanavasena dassanavisuddhipattassāpi khīṇāsavassa dassanaṃ bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ, na tena aññaṃ kathitaṃ, attanā adhigatamaggena dassanavisuddhikaṃ nibbānameva kathitaṃ. yathā ca lohitakāle ocirakajātakāle bahalapattapalāsakāle kiṃsukadassāvinopi taṃ dassanaṃ bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ, na tena aññaṃ diṭṭhaṃ, kiṃsukova diṭṭho, evameva pañcupādānakkhandhavasena catumahābhūtavasena tebhūmakadhammavasena dassanavisuddhipattassāpi khīṇāsavassa dassanaṃ bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ, na tena aññaṃ kathitaṃ, attanā adhigatamaggena dassanavisuddhikaṃ nibbānameva kathitaṃ.

[03] ^b^seyyathāpi^eb^ ^a^V3.0100^ea^, ^b^bhikkhu rañño paccantimaṃ nagara^eb^nti idaṃ kasmā āraddhaṃ? sace tena bhikkhunā taṃ sallakkhitaṃ, athassa dhammadesanatthaṃ āraddhaṃ. sace na sallakkhitaṃ, athassa iminā nagaropamena tassevatthassa dīpanatthāya āvibhāvanatthāya āraddhaṃ. tattha yasmā majjhimapadese nagarassa pākārādīni thirāni vā hontu dubbalāni vā, sabbaso vā mā hontu, corāsaṅkā na honti, tasmā taṃ aggahetvā ``paccantimaṃ nagara''nti āha. ^b^daḷhuddhāpa^eb^nti thirapākāraṃ. ^b^daḷhapākāratoraṇa^eb^nti thirapākārañceva thiratoraṇañca. toraṇāni nāma hi purisubbedhāni nagarassa alaṅkāratthaṃ karīyanti, coranivāraṇatthānipi hontiyeva. atha vā toraṇanti piṭṭhasaṅghāṭassetaṃ nāmaṃ, thirapiṭṭhasaṅghāṭantipi attho. ^b^chadvāra^eb^nti nagaradvāraṃ nāma ekampi hoti dvepi satampi sahassampi, idha pana satthā chadvārikanagaraṃ dassento evamāha. ^b^paṇḍito^eb^ti paṇḍiccena samannāgato. ^b^byatto^eb^ti veyyattiyena samannāgato visadañāṇo. ^b^medhāvī^eb^ti ṭhānuppattikapaññāsaṅkhātāya medhāya samannāgato.

[03] ^b^puratthimāya disāyā^eb^tiādimhi bhūtamatthaṃ katvā evamattho veditabbo -- samiddhe kira mahānagare sattaratanasampanno rājā cakkavatti rajjaṃ anusāsati, tassetaṃ paccantanagaraṃ rājāyuttavirahitaṃ ^a^P3.0061^ea^, atha purisā āgantvā ^a^M3.0103^ea^ ``amhākaṃ, deva, nagare āyuttako natthi, dehi no kiñci āyuttaka''nti āhaṃsu. rājā ekaṃ puttaṃ datvā ``gacchatha, etaṃ ādāya tattha abhisiñcitvā vinicchayaṭṭhānādīni katvā vasathā''ti. te tathā akaṃsu. rājaputto pāpamittasaṃsaggena katipāheyeva surāsoṇḍo hutvā, sabbāni vinicchayaṭṭhānādīni hāretvā, nagaramajjhe dhuttehi parivārito suraṃ pivanto naccagītādiratiyā vītināmeti. atha rañño āgantvā ārocayiṃsu.

[03] rājā ekaṃ paṇḍitaṃ amaccaṃ āṇāpesi -- ``gaccha kumāraṃ ovaditvā, vinicchayaṭṭhānādīni kāretvā, puna abhisekaṃ katvā, ehī''ti. na sakkā, deva, kumāraṃ ovadituṃ, caṇḍo kumāro ghāteyyāpi manti. athekaṃ balasampannaṃ yodhaṃ āṇāpesi -- ``tvaṃ iminā saddhiṃ gantvā sace so ovāde na tiṭṭhati, sīsamassa chindāhī''ti. iti so amacco yodho cāti idaṃ sīghaṃ dūtayugaṃ tattha gantvā dovārikaṃ pucchi -- ``kahaṃ, bho, nagarassa sāmi kumāro''ti. esa majjhesiṅghāṭake suraṃ pivanto dhuttaparivārito gītādiratiṃ anubhonto nisinnoti. atha taṃ dūtayugaṃ gantvā amacco tāvettha, ``sāmi, vinicchayaṭṭhānādīni ^a^V3.0101^ea^ kira kāretvā sādhukaṃ rajjaṃ anusāsā''ti āha. kumāro asuṇanto viya nisīdi. atha naṃ yodho sīse gahetvā, ``sace rañño āṇaṃ karosi, kara, no ce, ettheva te sīsaṃ pātessāmī''ti khaggaṃ abbāhi. paricārakā dhuttā tāvadeva disāsu palāyiṃsu. kumāro bhīto sāsanaṃ sampaṭicchi. athassa te tattheva abhisekaṃ katvā setacchattaṃ ussāpetvā ``sammā rajjaṃ anusāsāhī''ti raññā vuttaṃ yathābhūtavacanaṃ niyyātetvā yathāgatamaggameva paṭipajjiṃsu. imamatthaṃ āvikaronto bhagavā ``puratthimāya disāyā''ti āha.

[03] tatridaṃ ^a^P3.0062^ea^ opammasaṃsandanaṃ -- samiddhamahānagaraṃ viya hi nibbānanagaraṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, sattaratanasamannāgato rājā cakkavatti viya sattabojjhaṅgaratanasamannāgato dhammarājā sammāsambuddho, paccantimanagaraṃ viya sakkāyanagaraṃ, tasmiṃ nagare kūṭarājaputto viya imassa bhikkhuno kūṭacittuppādo, kūṭarājaputtassa dhuttehi parivāritakālo viya imassa bhikkhuno pañcahi nīvaraṇehi samaṅgikālo, dve sīghadūtā viya samathakammaṭṭhānañca vipassanākammaṭṭhānañca, mahāyodhena sīse gahitakālo viya uppannapaṭhamajjhānasamādhinā ^a^M3.0104^ea^ niccalaṃ katvā cittaggahitakālo, yodhena sīse gahitamatte dhuttānaṃ disāsu palāyitvā dūrībhāvo viya paṭhamajjhānamhi uppannamatte nīvaraṇānaṃ dūrībhāvo, ``karissāmi rañño sāsana''nti sampaṭicchitamatte vissaṭṭhakālo viya jhānato vuṭṭhitakālo, amaccena rañño sāsanaṃ ārocitakālo viya samādhinā cittaṃ kammaniyaṃ katvā vipassanākammaṭṭhānassa vaḍḍhitakālo, tatthevassa tehi dvīhi dūtehi katābhisekassa setacchattaussāpanaṃ viya samathavipassanākammaṭṭhānaṃ nissāya arahattappattassa vimuttisetacchattussāpanaṃ veditabbaṃ.

[03] ^b^nagaranti kho bhikkhu imassetaṃ cātumahābhūtikassa kāyassa adhivacana^eb^ntiādīsu pana ^b^cātumahābhūtikassā^eb^tiādīnaṃ padānaṃ attho heṭṭhā vitthāritova. kevalaṃ pana viññāṇarājaputtassa nivāsaṭṭhānattā ettha kāyo ``nagara''nti vutto, tasseva dvārabhūtattā cha āyatanāni ``dvārānī''ti, tesu dvāresu niccaṃ suppatiṭṭhitattā sati ``dovāriko''ti, kammaṭṭhānaṃ ācikkhantena dhammarājena pesitattā samathavipassanā ``sīghaṃ dūtayuga''nti. ettha mahāyodho viya samatho, paṇḍitāmacco viya vipassanā veditabbā.

[03] ^b^majjhe siṅghāṭako^eb^ti nagaramajjhe siṅghāṭako. ^b^mahābhūtāna^eb^nti hadayavatthussa nissayabhūtānaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ ^a^V3.0102^ea^. vatthurūpassa hi paccayadassanatthamevetaṃ catumahābhūtaggahaṇaṃ kataṃ. nagaramajjhe pana so rājakumāro viya sarīramajjhe hadayarūpasiṅghāṭake nisinno samathavipassanādūtehi arahattābhisekena abhisiñcitabbo vipassanāviññāṇarājaputto daṭṭhabbo. nibbānaṃ pana yathābhūtasabhāvaṃ akuppaṃ ^a^P3.0063^ea^ adhikārīti katvā ^b^yathābhūtaṃ vacana^eb^nti vuttaṃ. ariyamaggo pana yādisova pubbabhāgavipassanāmaggo, ayampi aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgatattā tādisoyevāti katvā ^b^yathāgatamaggo^eb^ti vutto. idaṃ tāvettha dhammadesanatthaṃ ābhatāya upamāya saṃsandanaṃ.

[03] tassevatthassa pākaṭīkaraṇatthaṃ ābhatapakkhe pana idaṃ saṃsandanaṃ -- ettha hi chadvārūpamā chaphassāyatanavasena dassanavisuddhipattaṃ khīṇāsavaṃ dassetuṃ ^a^M3.0105^ea^ ābhatā, nagarasāmiupamā pañcakkhandhavasena, siṅghāṭakūpamā catumahābhūtavasena, nagarūpamā tebhūmakadhammavasena dassanavisuddhipattaṃ khīṇāsavaṃ dassetuṃ ābhatā. saṅkhepato panimasmiṃ sutte catusaccameva kathitaṃ. sakalenapi hi nagarasambhārena dukkhasaccameva kathitaṃ, yathābhūtavacanena nirodhasaccaṃ, yathāgatamaggena maggasaccaṃ, dukkhassa pana pabhāvikā taṇhā samudayasaccaṃ. desanāpariyosāne pañhapucchako bhikkhu sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhitoti.

[03] 246^b^.^eb^ navame ^b^yassa kassaci, bhikkhave, bhikkhussa vā bhikkhuniyā vā^eb^ti idaṃ satthā yathā nāma mahākuṭumbiko mahantaṃ kasikammaṃ katvā, nipphannasasso gharadvāre maṇḍapaṃ katvā, ubhatosaṅghassa dānaṃ pavatteyya. kiñcāpi tena ubhatosaṅghassa dānaṃ paṭṭhapitaṃ, dvīsu pana parisāsu santappitāsu sesajanampi santappetiyeva, evameva bhagavā samadhikāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni pāramiyo pūretvā bodhimaṇḍe sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ adhigantvā pavattitavaradhammacakko jetavanamahāvihāre nisinno bhikkhuparisāya ceva bhikkhuniparisāya ca mahādhammayāgaṃ yajanto vīṇopamasuttaṃ ārabhi. taṃ penetaṃ kiñcāpi dve parisā sandhāya āraddhaṃ, catunnampi pana parisānaṃ avāritaṃ. tasmā sabbehipi sotabbañceva saddhātabbañca, pariyogāhitvā cassa attharaso vinditabboti.

[03] tattha ^a^P3.0064^ea^ ^b^chando^eb^tiādīsu ^b^chando^eb^ nāma pubbuppattikā dubbalataṇhā, so rañjetuṃ na sakkoti ^a^V3.0103^ea^. aparāparaṃ uppajjamānā pana balavataṇhā ^b^rāgo^eb^ nāma, so rañjetuṃ sakkoti. daṇḍādānādīni kātuṃ asamattho pubbuppattiko dubbalakodho ^b^doso^eb^ nāma. tāni kātuṃ samattho aparāparuppattiko balavakodho ^b^paṭighaṃ^eb^ nāma. ^b^moho^eb^ pana mohanasammohanavasena uppannaṃ aññāṇaṃ. evamettha pañcahipi padehi tīṇi akusalamūlāni gahitāni. tesu gahitesu sabbepi tammūlakā kilesā gahitāva honti. ``chando rāgo''ti vā padadvayena aṭṭhalobhasahagatacittuppādā, ``doso ^a^M3.0106^ea^ paṭigha''nti padadvayena dve domanassasahagatacittuppādā, mohapadena lobhadosarahitā dve uddhaccavicikicchāsahagatacittuppādā gahitāti. evaṃ sabbepi dvādasa cittuppādā dassitāva honti.

[03] ^b^sabhayo^eb^ti kilesacorānaṃ nivāsaṭṭhānattā sabhayo. ^b^sappaṭibhayo^eb^ti vadhabandhanādīnaṃ kāraṇattā sappaṭibhayo. ^b^sakaṇṭako^eb^ti rāgādīhi kaṇṭakehi sakaṇṭako. ^b^sagahano^eb^ti rāgagahanādīhi sagahano. ^b^ummaggo^eb^ti devalokaṃ vā manussalokaṃ vā nibbānaṃ vā gacchantassa amaggo. ^b^kummaggo^eb^ti kucchitajegucchibhūtaṭṭhānagamanaekapadikamaggo viya apāyasampāpakattā kummaggo. ^b^duhitiko^eb^ti ettha ihitīti iriyanā, dukkhā ihiti etthāti, ^b^duhitiko^eb^. yasmiñhi magge mūlaphalādikhādanīyaṃ vā sāyanīyaṃ vā natthi, tasmiṃ iriyanā dukkhā hoti, na sakkā taṃ paṭipajjitvā icchitaṭṭhānaṃ gantuṃ. kilesamaggampi paṭipajjitvā na sakkā sampattibhavaṃ gantunti kilesamaggo duhitikoti vutto. dvīhitikotipi pāṭho, esevattho. ^b^asappurisasevito^eb^ti kokālikādīhi asappurisehi sevito.

[03] ^b^tato cittaṃ nivāraye^eb^ti tehi cakkhuviññeyyehi rūpehi taṃ chandādivasena pavattacittaṃ asubhāvajjanādīhi upāyehi nivāraye. cakkhudvārasmiñhi iṭṭhārammaṇe rāge uppanne asubhato āvajjantassa cittaṃ nivattati, aniṭṭhārammaṇe dose uppanne mettato āvajjantassa cittaṃ nivattati, majjhattārammaṇe ^a^P3.0065^ea^ mohe uppanne uddesaparipucchaṃ garuvāsaṃ āvajjantassa cittaṃ nivattati. evaṃ asakkontena pana satthumahattataṃ dhammassa svākkhātatā saṅghassa suppaṭipatti ca āvajjitabbā. satthumahattataṃ paccavekkhatopi hi dhammassa svākkhātataṃ saṅghassa suppaṭipattiṃ paccavekkhatopi cittaṃ nivattati. tena vuttaṃ ``asubhāvajjanādīhi upāyehi nivāraye''ti.

[03] ^b^kiṭṭha^eb^nti kiṭṭhaṭṭhāne uppannasassaṃ. ^b^sampanna^eb^nti paripuṇṇaṃ sunipphannaṃ. ^b^kiṭṭhādo^eb^ti sassakhādako ^a^V3.0104^ea^. ^b^evameva kho^eb^ti ettha sampannakiṭṭhaṃ viya pañca kāmaguṇā daṭṭhabbā, kiṭṭhādo goṇo viya kūṭacittaṃ, kiṭṭhārakkhassa pamādakālo viya bhikkhuno chasu dvāresu satiṃ pahāya vicaraṇakālo, kiṭṭhārakkhassa pamādamāgamma goṇena gahitagabbhassa kiṭṭhassa khāditattā sassasāmino ^a^M3.0107^ea^ sassaphalānadhigamo viya chadvārarakkhikāya satiyā vippavāsamāgamma pañcakāmaguṇaṃ assādentena cittena kusalapakkhassa nāsitattā bhikkhuno sāmaññaphalādhigamābhāvo veditabbo.

[03] ^b^uparighaṭāya^eb^nti dvinnaṃ siṅgānaṃ antare. ^b^suniggahitaṃ niggaṇheyyā^eb^ti ghaṭāyaṃ patiṭṭhite nāsārajjuke suṭṭhu niggahitaṃ katvā niggaṇheyya. ^b^daṇḍenā^eb^ti muggarasadisena thūladaṇḍakena. ^b^evañhi so bhikkhave goṇo^eb^ti evaṃ so kiṭṭhārakkhassa pamādamanvāya yasmiṃ yasmiṃ khaṇe kiṭṭhaṃ otaritukāmo hoti, tasmiṃ tasmiṃ khaṇe evaṃ niggaṇhitvā tāḷetvā osajjanena nibbisevanabhāvaṃ upanīto goṇo.

[03] ^b^evameva kho^eb^ti idhāpi sampannakiṭṭhamiva pañca kāmaguṇā daṭṭhabbā, kiṭṭhādo viya kūṭacittaṃ, kiṭṭhārakkhassa appamādo viya imassa bhikkhuno chasu dvāresu satiyā avissajjanaṃ, daṇḍo viya suttanto, goṇassa kiṭṭhābhimukhakāle daṇḍena tāḷanaṃ viya cittassa bahiddhā puthuttārammaṇābhimukhakāle anamataggiyadevadūtāadittāasīvisūpamānāgatabhayādīsu ^a^P3.0066^ea^ taṃ taṃ suttaṃ āvajjetvā cittuppādassa puthuttārammaṇato nivāretvā mūlakammaṭṭhāne otāraṇaṃ veditabbaṃ. tenāhu porāṇā --
[21] ``subhāsitaṃ sutvā mano pasīdati,
[27] dameti naṃ pītisukhañca vindati.
[26] tadassa ārammaṇe tiṭṭhate mano,
[22] goṇova kiṭṭhādako daṇḍatajjito''ti..

[03] ^b^udujita^eb^nti tajjitaṃ. ^b^sudujita^eb^nti sutajjitaṃ, sujitantipi attho. udu, sudūti idaṃ pana nipātamattameva. ^b^ajjhatta^eb^nti gocarajjhattaṃ. ^b^santiṭṭhatī^eb^tiādīsu paṭhamajjhānavasena santiṭṭhati, dutiyajjhānavasena sannisīdati, tatiyajjhānavasena ekodi hoti, catutthajjhānavasena ^a^V3.0105^ea^ samādhiyati. sabbampi vā etaṃ paṭhamajjhānavasena veditabbaṃ. ettāvatā hi sammāsambuddhena samathānurakkhaṇaindriyasaṃvarasīlaṃ nāma kathitaṃ.

[03] ^b^rañño vā^eb^ti kassacideva paccantarañño vā. ^b^saddaṃ suṇeyyā^eb^ti paccūsakāle pabuddho kusalena vīṇāvādakena vādiyamānāya madhurasaddaṃ suṇeyya. ^b^rajanīyo^eb^tiādīsu cittaṃ rañjetīti ^b^rajanīyo^eb^. kāmetabbatāya ^a^M3.0108^ea^ ^b^kamanīyo^eb^. cittaṃ madayatīti ^b^madanīyo^eb^. cittaṃ mucchitaṃ viya karaṇato mucchiyatīti ^b^mucchanīyo^eb^. ābandhitvā viya gahaṇato bandhatīti ^b^bandhanīyo. alaṃ me, bho^eb^ti vīṇāya saṇṭhānaṃ disvā taṃ anicchanto evamāha. ^b^upadhāraṇe^eb^ti veṭṭhake. ^b^koṇa^eb^nti caturassaṃ sāradaṇḍakaṃ.

[03] ^b^so taṃ vīṇa^eb^nti so rājā ``āharatha naṃ vīṇaṃ, ahamassā saddaṃ pasissāmī''ti taṃ vīṇaṃ gahetvā. ^b^dasadhā vā^eb^tiādīsu paṭhamaṃ tāva dasadhā phāleyya, athassā saddaṃ apassanto satadhā phāleyya, tathāpi apassanto sakalikaṃ sakalikaṃ kareyya, tathāpi apassanto ``sakalikā jhāyissanti, saddo pana nikkhamitvā palāyissati, tadā naṃ passissāmī''ti agginā ḍaheyya. tathāpi apassanto ``sallahukāni ^a^P3.0067^ea^ masicuṇṇāni vātena bhassissanti, saddo sāradhaññaṃ viya pādamūle patissati, tadā naṃ passissāmī''ti mahāvāte vā ophuneyya. tathāpi apassanto ``masicuṇṇāni yathodakaṃ gamissanti, saddo pana pāraṃ gacchanto puriso viya nikkhamitvā tarissati, tadā naṃ passissāmī''ti nadiyā vā sīghasotāya pavāheyya.
[03] ^b^evaṃ vadeyyā^eb^ti sabbehipimehi upāyehi apassanto te manusse evaṃ vadeyya. ^b^asatī kirāya^eb^nti asatī kira ayaṃ vīṇā, lāmikāti attho. asatīti lāmakādhivacanametaṃ. yathāha --
[21] ``asā lokitthiyo nāma, velā tāsaṃ na vijjati.
[22] sārattā ca pagabbhā ca, sikhī sabbaghaso yathā''ti.. (jā0 1.1.61).

[03] ^b^yathevaṃ yaṃkiñci vīṇā nāmā^eb^ti na kevalañca vīṇāyeva lāmikā, yatheva pana ayaṃ vīṇā ^a^V3.0106^ea^ nāma, evaṃ yaṃkiñci aññampi tantibaddhaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ lāmakamevāti attho. ^b^evameva kho^eb^ti ettha vīṇā viya pañcakkhandhā daṭṭhabbā, rājā viya yogāvacaro. yathā so rājā taṃ vīṇaṃ dasadhā phālanato paṭṭhāya vicinanto saddaṃ adisvā vīṇāya anatthiko hoti, evaṃ yogāvacaro pañcakkhandhe sammasanto ahanti vā mamanti vā gahetabbaṃ apassanto khandhehi anatthiko hoti. tenassa taṃ khandhasammasanaṃ ^a^M3.0109^ea^ dassento ^b^rūpaṃ samanvesati yāvatā rūpassa gatī^eb^tiādimāha.

[03] tattha ^b^samanvesatī^eb^ti pariyesati. ^b^yāvatā rūpassa gatī^eb^ti yattakā rūpassa gati. tattha ^b^gatī^eb^ti gatigati, sañjātigati, salakkhaṇagati, vibhavagati, bhedagatīti pañcavidhā honti. tattha idaṃ rūpaṃ nāma heṭṭhā avīcipariyantaṃ katvā upari akaniṭṭhabrahmalokaṃ anto katvā etthantare saṃsarati vattati, ayamassa ^b^gatigati^eb^ nāma.

[03] ayaṃ pana kāyo neva padumagabbhe, na puṇḍarīkanīluppalādīsu sañjāyati, āmāsayapakkāsayānaṃ pana antare bahalandhakāre duggandhapavanavicarite paramajegucche okāse pūtimacchādīsu kimi viya sañjāyati ^a^P3.0068^ea^, ayaṃ rūpassa ^b^sañjātigati^eb^ nāma.

[03] duvidhaṃ pana rūpassa lakkhaṇaṃ, ``ruppatīti kho, bhikkhave, tasmā rūpa''nti (saṃ0 ni0 3.79) evaṃ vutta ruppanasaṅkhātaṃ paccattalakkhaṇañca aniccādibhedaṃ sāmaññalakkhaṇañca, ayamassa ^b^salakkhaṇagati^eb^ nāma.
[21] ``gati migānaṃ pavanaṃ, ākāso pakkhinaṃ gati.
[22] vibhavo gati dhammānaṃ, nibbānaṃ arahato gatī''ti.. (pari0 339) --

[25] evaṃ vutto rūpassa abhāvo ^b^vibhavagati^eb^ nāma. yo panassa bhedo, ayaṃ ^b^bhedagati^eb^ nāma. vedanādīsupi eseva nayo. kevalañhettha upari yāva bhavaggā tesaṃ sañjātigati, salakkhaṇagatiyañca vedayitasañjānanābhisaṅkharaṇavijānanavasena paccattalakkhaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.

[03] ^b^tampi tassa na hotī^eb^ti yadetaṃ rūpādīsu ahanti vā mamanti vā asmīti vā evaṃ niddiṭṭhaṃ ^a^V3.0107^ea^ diṭṭhitaṇhāmānaggāhattayaṃ, tampi tassa khīṇāsavassa na hotīti yathānusandhināva suttāgataṃ. tena vuttaṃ mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ --
[21] ``ādimhi sīlaṃ kathitaṃ, majjhe samādhibhāvanā.
[22] pariyosāne ca nibbānaṃ, esā vīṇopamā kathā''ti..

[03] 247^b^.^eb^ dasame ^a^M3.0110^ea^ ^b^arugatto^eb^ti vaṇasarīro. tesaṃyeva arūnaṃ pakkattā ^b^pakkagatto. saravana^eb^nti kaṇḍavanaṃ. ^b^evameva kho^eb^ti arugatto puriso viya dussīlapuggalo veditabbo. tassa kusakaṇṭakehi viddhassa sarapattehi ca asidhārūpamehi vilikhitagattassa bhiyyosomattāya dukkhadomanassaṃ viya tattha tattha sabrahmacārīhi ``ayaṃ so imesañca imesañca kammānaṃ kārako''ti vuccamānassa uppajjanadukkhaṃ veditabbaṃ.

[03] ^b^labhati vattāra^eb^nti labhati codakaṃ. ^b^evaṃkārī^eb^ti evarūpānaṃ vejjakammadūtakammādīnaṃ kārako. ^b^evaṃsamācāro^eb^ti vidhavā gocarādivasena evarūpagocaro. ^b^asucigāmakaṇṭako^eb^ti ^a^P3.0069^ea^ asuddhaṭṭhena asuci, gāmavāsīnaṃ vijjhanaṭṭhena kaṇṭakoti gāmakaṇṭako.
[03] ^b^pakkhi^eb^nti hatthisoṇḍasakuṇaṃ. ^b^ossajjeyyā^eb^ti vissajjeyya. ^b^āviñcheyyu^eb^nti ākaḍḍheyyuṃ. ^b^pavekkhāmī^eb^ti pavisissāmi. ^b^ākāsaṃ ḍessāmī^eb^ti ākāsaṃ uppatissāmi.

[03] etesu pana ahi ``bhogehi maṇḍalaṃ bandhitvā supissāmī''ti vammikaṃ pavisitukāmo hoti. susumāro ``dūre bilaṃ pavisitvā nipajjissāmī''ti udakaṃ pavisitukāmo hoti. pakkhī ``ajaṭākāse sukhaṃ vicarissāmī''ti ākāsaṃ ḍetukāmo hoti. kukkuro ``uddhanaṭṭhāne chārikaṃ byūhitvā usumaṃ gaṇhanto nipajjissāmī''ti gāmaṃ pavisitukāmo hoti. siṅgālo ``manussamaṃsaṃ khāditvā piṭṭhiṃ pasāretvā sayissāmī''ti āmakasusānaṃ pavisitukāmo hoti. makkaṭo ``ucce rukkhe abhiruhitvā disādisaṃ pakkhandissāmī''ti vanaṃ pavisitukāmo hoti.

[03] ^b^anuvidhāyeyyu^eb^nti ^a^V3.0108^ea^ anugaccheyyuṃ, anuvidhiyeyyuntipi pāṭho, anuvidhānaṃ āpajjeyyunti attho. yattha so yāti, tattheva gaccheyyunti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^evamevā^eb^ti ettha cha pāṇakā viya chāyatanāni daṭṭhabbāni, daḷharajju viya taṇhā, majjhe gaṇṭhi viya avijjā. yasmiṃ yasmiṃ dvāre ārammaṇaṃ balavaṃ hoti, taṃ taṃ āyatanaṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ārammaṇe āviñchati.

[03] imaṃ ^a^M3.0111^ea^ pana upamaṃ bhagavā sarikkhakena vā āhareyya āyatanānaṃ vā nānattadassanavasena. tattha ^b^sarikkhakena^eb^ tāva visuṃ appanākiccaṃ natthi, pāḷiyaṃyeva appitā. ^b^āyatanānaṃ nānattadassanena^eb^ pana ayaṃ appanā -- ahi nāmesa bahi sittasammaṭṭhe ṭhāne nābhiramati, saṅkāraṭṭhānatiṇapaṇṇagahanavammikāniyeva pana pavisitvā nipannakāle abhiramati, ekaggataṃ āpajjati. evameva cakkhupetaṃ visamajjhāsayaṃ, maṭṭhāsu suvaṇṇabhittiādīsu nābhiramati, oloketumpi na icchati, rūpacittapupphalatādivicittesuyeva ^a^P3.0070^ea^ pana abhiramati. tādisesu hi ṭhānesu cakkhumhi appahonte mukhampi vivaritvā oloketukāmo hoti.

[03] susumāropi bahi nikkhanto gahetabbaṃ na passati, akkhiṃ nimīletvā carati. yadā pana byāmasatamattaṃ udakaṃ ogāhitvā bilaṃ pavisitvā nipanno hoti, tadā tassa cittaṃ ekaggaṃ hoti, sukhaṃ supati. evameva sotampetaṃ bilajjhāsayaṃ ākāsasannissitaṃ, kaṇṇacchiddakūpakeyeva ajjhāsayaṃ karoti, kaṇṇacchiddākāsoyeva tassa saddasavane paccayo hoti. ajaṭākāsopi vaṭṭatiyeva. antoleṇasmiñhi sajjhāye kayiramāne na leṇacchadanaṃ bhinditvā saddo bahi nikkhamati, dvāravātapānachiddehi pana nikkhamitvā dhātuparamparā ghaṭṭento āgantvā sotapasādaṃ ghaṭṭeti. atha tasmiṃ kāle ``asukaṃ nāma sajjhāyatī''ti leṇapiṭṭhe nisinnā jānanti.

[03] evaṃ sante sampattagocaratā hoti, kiṃ panetaṃ sampattagocaranti? āma sampattagocaraṃ. yadi evaṃ dūre bheriādīsu vajjamānesu ``dūre saddo''ti jānanaṃ na bhaveyyāti. no na bhavati. sotapasādasmiñhi ghaṭṭite ``dūre saddo, āsanne saddo, paratīre orimatīre''ti tathā tathā jānanākāro hoti, dhammatā esāti. kiṃ etāya dhammatāya? yato yato chiddaṃ, tato tato savanaṃ hoti candimasūriyādīnaṃ dassanaṃ viyāti asampattagocaramevetaṃ.

[03] pakkhīpi ^a^V3.0109^ea^ rukkhe vā bhūmiyaṃ vā na ramati. yadā pana ekaṃ vā dve vā leḍḍupāte atikkamma ajaṭākāsaṃ pakkhando hoti, tadā ekaggacittataṃ āpajjati. evameva ghānampi ākāsajjhāsayaṃ vātūpanissayagandhagocaraṃ. tathā ^a^M3.0112^ea^ hi gāvo navavuṭṭhe deve bhūmiṃ ghāyitvā ghāyitvā ākāsābhimukho hutvā vātaṃ ākaḍḍhanti. aṅgulīhi gandhapiṇḍaṃ gahetvāpi ca upasiṅghanakāle vātaṃ anākaḍḍhanto neva tassa gandhaṃ jānāti.

[03] kukkuropi bahi caranto khemaṭṭhānaṃ na passati, leḍḍudaṇḍādīhi upadduto hoti. antogāmaṃ pavisitvā uddhanaṭṭhāne ^a^P3.0071^ea^ chārikaṃ byūhitvā nipannassa panassa phāsu hoti. evameva jivhāpi gāmajjhāsayā āposannissitarasārammaṇā. tathā hi tiyāmarattiṃ samaṇadhammaṃ katvāpi pātova pattacīvaramādāya gāmaṃ pavisitabbaṃ hoti. sukkhakhādanīyassa ca na sakkā kheḷena atemitassa rasaṃ jānituṃ.

[03] siṅgālopi bahi caranto ratiṃ na vindati, āmakasusāne manussamaṃsaṃ khāditvā nipannasseva panassa phāsu hoti. evameva kāyopi upādiṇṇakajjhāsayo pathavīsannissitaphoṭṭhabbārammaṇo. tathā hi aññaṃ upādiṇṇakaṃ alabhamānā sattā attanova hatthatale sīsaṃ katvā nipajjanti. ajjhattikabāhirā cassa pathavī ārammaṇaggahaṇe paccayo hoti. susanthatassāpi hi sayanassa heṭṭhāṭhitānampi vā phalakānaṃ na sakkā anisīdantena vā anuppīḷantena vā thaddhamudubhāvo jānitunti ajjhattikabāhirā pathavī etassa phoṭṭhabbajānane paccayo hoti.

[03] makkaṭopi bhūmiyaṃ vicaranto nābhiramati, hatthasatubbedhaṃ panassa rukkhaṃ āruyha viṭapapiṭṭhe nisīditvā disāvidisā olokentasseva phāsuko hoti. evaṃ manopi nānajjhāsayo bhavaṅgapaccayo, diṭṭhapubbepi nānārammaṇajjhāsayaṃ karotiyeva mūlabhavaṅgaṃ panassa paccayo hotīti ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthārena pana āyatanānaṃ nānattaṃ visuddhimagge āyatananiddese vuttameva.
[03] ^b^taṃ cakkhu nāviñchatī^eb^ti taṇhārajjukānaṃ āyatanapāṇakānaṃ kāyagatāsatithambhe baddhānaṃ nibbisevanabhāvaṃ āpannattā nākaḍḍhatīti imasmiṃ sutte pubbabhāgavipassanāva kathitā.

[03] 248^b^.^eb^ ekādasame ^a^V3.0110^ea^ ^a^M3.0113^ea^ ^a^P3.0072^ea^ ^b^yavakalāpī^eb^ti lāyitvā ṭhapitayavapuñjo. ^b^byābhaṅgihatthā^eb^ti kājahatthā. ^b^chahi byābhaṅgīhi haneyyu^eb^nti chahi puthulakājadaṇḍakehi potheyyuṃ. ^b^sattamo^eb^ti tesu chasu janesu yave pothetvā pasibbake pūretvā ādāya gatesu añño sattamo āgaccheyya. ^b^suhatatarā assā^eb^ti yaṃ tattha avasiṭṭhaṃ atthi bhusapalāpamattampi, tassa gahaṇatthaṃ suṭṭhutaraṃ hatā.

[03] ^b^evameva kho^eb^ti ettha catumahāpatho viya cha āyatanāni daṭṭhabbāni, catumahāpathe nikkhittayavakalāpī viya satto, cha byābhaṅgiyo viya iṭṭhāniṭṭhamajjhattavasena aṭṭhārasa ārammaṇāni, sattamā byābhaṅgī viya bhavapatthanā kilesā. yathā catumahāpathe ṭhapitā yavakalāpī chahi byābhaṅgīhi haññati, evamime sattā aṭṭhārasahi ārammaṇadaṇḍakehi chasu āyatanesu haññanti. yathā sattamena suhatatarā honti, evaṃ sattā bhavapatthanakilesehi suhatatarā honti bhavemūlakaṃ dukkhaṃ anubhavamānā.

[03] idāni nesaṃ taṃ bhavapatthanakilesaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^bhūtapubbaṃ, bhikkhave^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^tatrā^eb^ti sudhammāyaṃ bhummaṃ, sudhammāya devasabhāya dvāreti attho. ^b^dhammikā kho devā^eb^ti dhammikā ete devā nāma, yehi mādisaṃ asurādhipatiṃ gahetvā mayhaṃ bhedanamattampi na katanti sandhāya vadati. ^b^adhammikā devā^eb^ti adhammikā ete devā nāma, ye mādisaṃ asurādhipatiṃ navagūthasūkaraṃ viya kaṇṭhapañcamehi bandhanehi bandhitvā nisīdāpenti. ^b^evaṃ sukhumaṃ kho, bhikkhave, vepacittibandhana^eb^nti taṃ kira padumanāḷasuttaṃ viya makkaṭajālasuttaṃ viya ca sukhumaṃ hoti, chettuṃ pana neva vāsiyā na pharasunā sakkā. yasmā pana citteneva bajjhati, cittena muccati, tasmā ^a^P3.0073^ea^ ``vepacittibandhana''nti vuttaṃ.

[03] ^b^tato sukhumataraṃ mārabandhana^eb^nti kilesabandhanaṃ panesaṃ tatopi sukhumataraṃ, neva cakkhussa āpāthaṃ gacchati, na iriyāpathaṃ nivāreti. tena hi baddhā sattā pathavitalepi ākāsepi yojanasatampi yojanasahassampi ^a^M3.0114^ea^ gacchantipi āgacchantipi. chijjamānaṃ panetaṃ ñāṇeneva chijjati, na aññenāti ``ñāṇamokkhaṃ bandhana''ntipi vuccati.

[03] ^b^maññamāno^eb^ti ^a^V3.0111^ea^ taṇhādiṭṭhimānānaṃ vasena khandhe maññanto. ^b^baddho mārassā^eb^ti mārabandhanena baddho. karaṇatthe vā etaṃ sāmivacanaṃ, kilesamārena baddhoti attho. ^b^mutto pāpimato^eb^ti mārassa bandhanena mutto. karaṇattheyeva vā idaṃ sāmivacanaṃ, pāpimatā kilesabandhanena muttoti attho.

[03] ^b^asmī^eb^ti padena taṇhāmaññitaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^ayamahasmī^eb^ti diṭṭhimaññitaṃ. ^b^bhavissa^eb^nti sassatavasena diṭṭhimaññitameva. ^b^na bhavissa^eb^nti ucchedavasena. ^b^rūpī^eb^tiādīni sassatasseva pabhedadīpanāni. ^b^tasmā^eb^ti yasmā maññitaṃ ābādhaṃ antodosanikantanavasena rogo ceva gaṇḍo ca sallañca, tasmā. ^b^iñjita^eb^ntiādīni yasmā imehi kilesehi sattā iñjanti ceva phandanti ca papañcitā ca honti pamattākārapattā, tasmā tesaṃ ākāradassanatthaṃ vuttāni.

[03] mānagatavāre pana mānassa gataṃ ^b^mānagataṃ,^eb^ mānapavattīti attho. mānoyeva mānagataṃ gūthagataṃ muttagataṃ viya. tattha ^b^asmī^eb^ti idaṃ taṇhāya sampayuttamānavasena vuttaṃ. ^b^ayamahamasmī^eb^ti diṭṭhivasena. nanu ca diṭṭhisampayutto nāma māno natthīti? āma natthi, mānassa pana appahīnattā diṭṭhi nāma hoti. mānamūlakaṃ diṭṭhiṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
[06] āsīvisavaggo.
[06] catuttho paṇṇāsako.
[06] saḷāyatanasaṃyuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 249^b^.^eb^ vedanāsaṃyutte ^a^V3.0112^ea^ ^a^P3.0074^ea^ ^a^M3.0115^ea^ sagāthāvaggassa paṭhame ^b^samāhito^eb^ti upacārena vā appanāya vā samāhito. ^b^vedanā ca pajānātī^eb^ti vedanā dukkhasaccavasena pajānāti. ^b^vedanānañca sambhava^eb^nti tāsaṃyeva sambhavaṃ samudayasaccavasena pajānāti. ^b^yattha cetā^eb^ti yatthetā vedanā nirujjhanti, taṃ nibbānaṃ nirodhasaccavasena pajānāti. ^b^khayagāmina^eb^nti tāsaṃyeva vedanānaṃ khayagāminaṃ maggaṃ maggasaccavasena pajānāti. ^b^nicchāto parinibbuto^eb^ti nittaṇho hutvā kilesaparinibbānena parinibbuto. evamettha sutte sammasanacāravedanā kathitā. gāthāsu dvīhi padehi samathavipassanā kathitā, sesehi catusaccaṃ kathitaṃ. evamettha sabbasaṅgāhiko catubhūmakadhammaparicchedo vutto.

[03] 250^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^b^adukkhamasukhaṃ sahā^eb^ti adukkhamasukhañca sukhadukkhehi saha. ^b^ajjhattañca bahiddhā cā^eb^ti attano ca parassa ca. ^b^mosadhamma^eb^nti nassanasabhāvaṃ. ^b^palokina^eb^nti palujjanakaṃ bhijjanasabhāvaṃ. ^b^phussa phussa vayaṃ passa^eb^nti ñāṇena phusitvā phusitvā vayaṃ passanto. ^b^evaṃ tattha virajjatī^eb^ti evaṃ tāsu vedanāsu virajjati. idhāpi sutte sammasanacāravedanā kathitā, gāthāsu ñāṇaphusanaṃ.

[03] 251^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^a^V3.0113^ea^ ^a^P3.0075^ea^ ^b^acchecchi taṇha^eb^nti sabbampi taṇhaṃ chindi samucchindi. ^b^vivattayi saṃyojana^eb^nti dasavidhampi saṃyojanaṃ parivattayi nimmūlakamakāsi. ^b^sammā^eb^ti hetunā kāraṇena. ^b^mānābhisamayā^eb^ti mānassa dassanābhisamayā, pahānābhisamayā ca. arahattamaggo hi kiccavasena mānaṃ sampassati, ayamassa ^a^M3.0116^ea^ dassanābhisamayo. tena diṭṭho pana so tāvadeva pahīyati, diṭṭhavisena diṭṭhasattānaṃ jīvitaṃ viya. ayamassa pahānābhisamayo.

[03] ^b^antamakāsi dukkhassā^eb^ti evaṃ arahattamaggena mānassa diṭṭhattā ca pahīnattā ca ye ime ``kāyabandhanassa anto jīrati (cūḷava0 278) haritantaṃ vā''ti (ma0 ni0 1.304) evaṃ vuttāntimamariyādanto ca, ``antamidaṃ, bhikkhave, jīvikāna''nti (itivu0 91; saṃ0 ni0 3.80) evaṃ vuttalāmakanto ca, ``sakkāyo eko anto''ti (a0 ni0 6.61; cūḷani0 tissametteyyamāṇavapucchāniddesa 11) evaṃ vuttakoṭṭhāsanto ca, ``esevanto dukkhassa sabbapaccayasaṅkhayā''ti (saṃ ni0 2.51; 2.4.71; udā0 71) evaṃ vuttakoṭanto cāti cattāro antā, tesu sabbasseva vaṭṭadukkhassa aduṃ catutthakoṭisaṅkhātaṃ antamakāsi, paricchedaṃ parivaṭumaṃ akāsi, antimasamussayamattāvasesaṃ dukkhamakāsīti vuttaṃ hoti.

[03] ^b^sampajaññaṃ na riñcatī^eb^ti sampajaññaṃ na jahati. ^b^saṅkhyaṃ nopetī^eb^ti ratto duṭṭho mūḷhoti paññattiṃ na upeti, taṃ paññattiṃ pahāya khīṇāsavo nāma hotīti attho. imasmiṃ sutte ārammaṇānusayo kathito.

[03] 252^b^.^eb^ catutthe ^b^pātālo^eb^ti pātassa alaṃ pariyatto, natthi ettha patiṭṭhāti ^b^pātālo. asantaṃ avijjamāna^eb^nti asambhūtattaṃ apaññāyamānattaṃ. ^b^evaṃ vācaṃ bhāsatī^eb^ti atthi mahāsamudde pātāloti evaṃ vācaṃ. so hi yaṃ taṃ balavāmukhaṃ mahāsamuddassa udakaṃ vegena pakkhanditvā ^a^P3.0076^ea^ cakkavāḷaṃ vā sineruṃ vā āhacca yojanadviyojanadasayojanappamāṇampi uggantvā puna mahāsamudde ^a^V3.0114^ea^ patati, yassa patitaṭṭhāne mahānarakapapāto viya hoti, yaṃ loke balavāmukhanti vuccati. taṃ sandhāya evaṃ vadati.

[03] yasmā pana tattha tathārūpānaṃ macchakacchapadevadānavānaṃ patiṭṭhāpi hoti sukhanivāsopi, tasmā asantaṃ asaṃvijjamānaṃ taṃ taṃ vācaṃ bhāsati nāma. yasmā pana sabbaputhujjanā sārīrikāya dukkhavedanāya patiṭṭhātuṃ na sakkonti, tasmā pātassa alanti atthena ayameva pātāloti dassento ^b^sārīrikānaṃ kho etaṃ bhikkhave^eb^tiādimāha.

[03] ^b^pātāle^eb^ ^a^M3.0117^ea^ ^b^na paccuṭṭhāsī^eb^ti pātālasmiṃ na patiṭṭhāsi. ^b^gādha^eb^nti patiṭṭhaṃ. ^b^akkandatī^eb^ti anibaddhaṃ vippalāpaṃ vilapanto kandati. ^b^dubbalo^eb^ti dubbalañāṇo. ^b^appathāmako^eb^ti ñāṇathāmassa parittatāya parittathāmako. imasmiṃ sutte ariyasāvakoti sotāpanno. sotāpanno hi ettha dhuraṃ, balavavipassako na tikkhabuddhi uppannaṃ vedanaṃ ananuvattitvā patiṭṭhātuṃ samattho yogāvacaropi vaṭṭati.

[03] 253^b^.^eb^ pañcame ^b^dukkhato daṭṭhabbā^eb^ti vipariṇāmanavasena dukkhato daṭṭhabbā. ^b^sallato^eb^ti dukkhāpanavinivijjhanaṭṭhena sallāti daṭṭhabbā. ^b^aniccato^eb^ti adukkhamasukhā hutvā abhāvākārena aniccato daṭṭhabbā. ^b^addā^eb^ti addasa. ^b^santa^eb^nti santasabhāvaṃ.

[03] 254^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhe ^b^tatrā^eb^ti tesu dvīsu janesu. ^b^anuvedhaṃ vijjheyyā^eb^ti tasseva vaṇamukhassa aṅgulantare vā dvaṅgulantare vā āsannapadese anugatavedhaṃ. evaṃ viddhassa hi sā anuvedhā vedanā ^a^P3.0077^ea^ paṭhamavedanāya balavatarā hoti, pacchā uppajjamānā domanassavedanāpi evameva purimavedanāya balavatarā hoti. ^b^dukkhāya vedanāya nissaraṇa^eb^nti dukkhāya vedanāya hi samādhimaggaphalāni nissaraṇaṃ, taṃ so na jānāti, kāmasukhameva nissaraṇanti jānāti. ^b^tāsaṃ vedanāna^eb^nti tāsaṃ sukhadukkhavedanānaṃ. ^b^saññutto naṃ vedayatī^eb^ti kilesehi sampayuttova hutvā taṃ vedanaṃ ^a^V3.0115^ea^ vedayati, na vippayutto. ^b^saññutto dukkhasmā^eb^ti karaṇatthe nissakkaṃ, dukkhena sampayuttoti attho. ^b^saṅkhātadhammassā^eb^ti viditadhammassa tulitadhammassa. ^b^bahussutassā^eb^ti pariyattibahussutassa paṭivedhabahussutassa ca. ^b^sammā pajānāti bhavassa pāragū^eb^ti bhavassa pāraṃ nibbānaṃ gato, tadeva nibbānaṃ sammā pajānāti. imasmimpi sutte ārammaṇānusayova kathito. ariyasāvakesu ca khīṇāsavo ettha dhuraṃ, anāgāmīpi vaṭṭatīti vadanti.

[03] 255^b^.^eb^ sattame ^a^M3.0118^ea^ ^b^yena gilānasālā tenupasaṅkamī^eb^ti ``sadevake loke aggapuggalo tathāgatopi gilānupaṭṭhānaṃ gacchati, upaṭṭhātabbayuttakā nāma gilānāti bhikkhū saddahitvā okappetvā gilāne upaṭṭhātabbe maññissantī''ti ca ``ye tattha kammaṭṭhānasappāyā, tesaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathessāmī''ti ca cintetvā upasaṅkami. ^b^kāye kāyānupassī^eb^tiādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ parato vakkhāma. ^b^aniccānupassī^eb^ti aniccataṃ anupassanto. ^b^vayānupassī^eb^ti vayaṃ anupassanto. ^b^virāgānupassī^eb^ti virāgaṃ anupassanto. ^b^nirodhānupassī^eb^ti nirodhaṃ anupassanto. ^b^paṭinissaggānupassī^eb^ti paṭinissaggaṃ anupassanto.

[03] ettāvatā kiṃ dassitaṃ hoti? imassa bhikkhuno āgamanīyapaṭipadā, satipaṭṭhānāpi hi pubbabhāgāyeva, sampajaññepi aniccānupassanā vayānupassanā virāgānupassanāti ca imāpi tisso anupassanā pubbabhāgāyeva, nirodhānupassanāpi paṭinissaggānupassanāpi imā dve missakā. ettāvatā ^a^P3.0078^ea^ imassa bhikkhuno bhāvanākālo dassitoti. sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
[03] 256-257^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhame ^b^imameva phassaṃ paṭiccā^eb^ti vutte bujjhanakānaṃ ajjhāsayena vuttaṃ, atthato panetaṃ ninnānākaraṇaṃ. kāyova hi ettha phassoti vutto. navamaṃ uttānameva.

[03] 258^b^.^eb^ dasame ^a^V3.0116^ea^ ^b^sukhavedaniya^eb^nti sukhavedanāya paccayabhūtaṃ. sesesupi eseva nayo. anupadavaṇṇanā panettha heṭṭhā vitthāritāva. imasmiṃ suttadvaye sammasanacāravedanā kathitā.
[06] sagāthāvaggo paṭhamo.

[03] 259^b^.^eb^ rahogatavaggassa ^a^M3.0119^ea^ paṭhame ^b^yaṃ kiñci vedayitaṃ, taṃ dukkhasmi^eb^nti yaṃ kiñci vedayitaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ dukkhanti attho. ^b^saṅkhārānaṃyeva aniccata^eb^ntiādīsu yā esā saṅkhārānaṃ aniccatā khayadhammatā vayadhammatā vipariṇāmadhammatā, etaṃ sandhāya yaṃ kiñci vedayitaṃ, taṃ dukkhanti mayā bhāsitanti dīpeti. yā hi saṅkhārānaṃ aniccatā, vedanānampi sā aniccatā eva. aniccatā ca nāmesā maraṇaṃ, maraṇato uttari dukkhaṃ nāma natthīti iminā adhippāyena sabbā vedanā dukkhāti vuttā. ^b^atha kho pana bhikkhu mayā^eb^ti idaṃ na kevalaṃ ahaṃ vedanānaṃyeva nirodhaṃ paññāpemi, imesampi dhammānaṃ nirodhaṃ paññāpemīti dassanatthaṃ āraddhaṃ. vūpasamo ca passaddhiyo ca evarūpāya desanāya bujjhanakānaṃ ajjhāsayena ^a^P3.0079^ea^ vuttā. saññāvedayitanirodhaggahaṇena cettha cattāro āruppā gahitāva hontīti veditabbā.
[03] 260-261^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^b^puthū vāyanti mālutā^eb^ti bahū vātā vāyanti. sesaṃ uttānatthamevāti. tatiyaṃ vinā gāthāhi bujjhantānaṃ ajjhāsayena vuttaṃ.

[03] 262^b^.^eb^ catutthe ^a^V3.0117^ea^ ^b^puratthimā^eb^ti puratthimāya. evaṃ sabbattha. ^b^sāmisāpi sukhā vedanā^eb^tiādīsu ^b^sāmisā sukhā^eb^ nāma kāmāmisapaṭisaṃyuttā vedanā. ^b^nirāmisā sukhā^eb^ nāma paṭhamajjhānādivasena vipassanāvasena anussativasena ca uppannā vedanā. ^b^sāmisā dukkhā^eb^ nāma kāmāmiseneva sāmisā vedanā, ^b^nirāmisā dukkhā^eb^ nāma anuttaresu vimokkhesu pihaṃ upaṭṭhāpayato pihapaccayā uppannadomanassavedanā. ^b^sāmisā adukkhamasukhā^eb^ nāma kāmāmiseneva sāmisā vedanā. ^b^nirāmisā adukkhamasukhā^eb^ nāma catutthajjhānavasena uppannā adukkhamasukhā vedanā.

[03] 263-266^b^.^eb^ pañcamādīni ^a^M3.0120^ea^ cattāri heṭṭhā kathitanayāneva. purimāni panettha dve paripuṇṇapassaddhikāni, pacchimāni upaḍḍhapassaddhikāni. desanāya bujjhanakānaṃ ajjhāsayena vuttāni.

[03] 267-268^b^.^eb^ navame ^b^pañcakaṅgo thapatī^eb^ti ^b^pañcakaṅgo^eb^ti tassa nāmaṃ, vāsipharasunikhādanadaṇḍamuggarakāḷasuttanāḷisaṅkhātehi vā pañcahi aṅgehi samannāgatattā so pañcakaṅgoti paññāto. ^b^thapatī^eb^ti vaḍḍhakījeṭṭhako. ^b^udāyī^eb^ti paṇḍitaudāyitthero. ^b^pariyāya^eb^nti kāraṇaṃ. ^b^dvepānandā^eb^ti dvepi, ānanda, ^b^pariyāyenā^eb^ti ^a^P3.0080^ea^ kāraṇena. ettha ca kāyikacetasikavasena dve veditabbā, sukhādivasena tissopi, indriyavasena sukhindriyādikā pañca, dvāravasena cakkhusamphassajādikā cha, upavicāravasena ``cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā somanassaṭhāniyaṃ rūpaṃ upavicaratī''tiādikā aṭṭhārasa, cha gehasitāni somanassāni, cha nekkhammasitāni, cha gehasitāni domanassāni, cha nekkhammasitāni, cha gehasitā upekkhā, cha nekkhammasitāti evaṃ chattiṃsa. tā atīte chattiṃsa, anāgate chattiṃsa, paccuppanne chattiṃsāti evaṃ aṭṭhasataṃ vedanā veditabbā.

[03] ^b^pañcime^eb^ ^a^V3.0118^ea^ ^b^ānanda kāmaguṇā^eb^ti ayaṃ pāṭiyekko anusandhi. na kevalañhi dve ādiṃ katvā vedanā bhagavatā paññattā, pariyāyena ekāpi vedanā kathitā, taṃ dassento pañcakaṅgassa thapatino vādaṃ upatthambhetuṃ imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi. ^b^abhikkantatara^eb^nti sundarataraṃ. ^b^paṇītatara^eb^nti atappakataraṃ. ettha ca catutthajjhānato paṭṭhāya adukkhamasukhā vedanā, sāpi santaṭṭhena paṇītaṭṭhena ca sukhanti vuttā. nirodho avedayitasukhavasena sukhaṃ nāma jāto. pañcakāmaguṇavasena hi aṭṭhasamāpattivasena ca uppannaṃ vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ nāma, nirodho avedayitasukhaṃ nāma. iti vedayitasukhaṃ vā hotu avedayitasukhaṃ vā, niddukkhabhāvasaṅkhātena sukhaṭṭhena ekantasukhameva jātaṃ.

[03] ^b^yattha yatthā^eb^ti yasmiṃ yasmiṃ ṭhāne. ^b^sukhaṃ upalabbhatī^eb^ti vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā avedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā upalabbhati. ^b^taṃ taṃ tathāgato sukhasmiṃ paññapeti,^eb^ taṃ sabbaṃ tathāgato niddukkhabhāvaṃ sukhasmiṃyeva paññapetīti idha ^a^M3.0121^ea^ bhagavā nirodhasamāpattiṃ sīsaṃ katvā neyyapuggalassa vasena arahattanikūṭeneva desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi. dasamaṃ uttānatthamevāti.
[06] rahogatavaggo dutiyo.

[03] 269^b^.^eb^ tatiyavaggassa ^a^P3.0081^ea^ paṭhame ^b^moḷiyasīvako^eb^ti ^b^sīvako^eb^ti tassa nāmaṃ. cūḷā panassa atthi, tasmā moḷiyasīvakoti vuccati. ^b^paribbājako^eb^ti channaparibbājako. ^b^pittasamuṭṭhānānī^eb^ti pittapaccayāni. ^b^vedayitānī^eb^ti vedanā. tattha pittapaccayā tisso vedanā uppajjanti. kathaṃ? ekacco hi ``pittaṃ me kupitaṃ dujjānaṃ kho pana jīvita''nti dānaṃ deti, sīlaṃ samādiyati uposathakammaṃ karoti, evamassa kusalavedanā uppajjati. ekacco ``pittabhesajjaṃ karissāmī''ti pāṇaṃ hanati, adinnaṃ ādiyati, musā bhaṇati, dasa dussīlyakammāni karoti, evamassa akusalavedanā uppajjati. ekacco ``ettakenapi me bhesajjakaraṇena pittaṃ na ^a^V3.0119^ea^ vūpasammati, alaṃ yaṃ hoti. taṃ hotū''ti majjhatto kāyikavedanaṃ adhivāsento nipajjati, evaṃ assa abyākatavedanā uppajjati.

[03] ^b^sāmampi kho eta^eb^nti taṃ taṃ pittavikāraṃ disvā attanāpi etaṃ veditabbaṃ. ^b^saccasammata^eb^nti bhūtasammataṃ. lokopi hissa sarīre sabalavaṇṇatādipittavikāraṃ disvā ``pittamassa kupita''nti jānāti. ^b^tasmā^eb^ti yasmā sāmañca viditaṃ lokassa ca saccasammataṃ atidhāvanti, tasmā. ^b^semhasamuṭṭhānā^eb^dīsupi eseva nayo. ettha pana ^b^sannipātikānī^eb^ti tiṇṇampi pittādīnaṃ kopena samuṭṭhitāni. ^b^utupariṇāmajānī^eb^ti visabhāgaututo jātāni. jaṅgaladesavāsīnañhi anupadese vasantānaṃ visabhāgo utu uppajjati, anupadesavāsīnañca jaṅgaladeseti evaṃ malayasamuddatīrādivasenāpi utuvisabhāgatā uppajjatiyeva. tato jātāti utupariṇāmajātāni nāma.

[03] ^b^visamaparihārajānī^eb^ti ^a^M3.0122^ea^ mahābhāravahanasudhākoṭṭanādito vā ^a^P3.0082^ea^ avelāya carantassa sappaḍaṃsakūpapātādito vā visamaparihārato jātāni. ^b^opakkamikānī^eb^ti ``ayaṃ coro vā pāradāriko vā''ti gahetvā jaṇṇukakapparamuggarādīhi nippothanaupakkamaṃ paccayaṃ katvā uppannāni. etaṃ bahi upakkamaṃ labhitvā koci vuttanayeneva kusalaṃ karoti, koci akusalaṃ, koci adhivāsento nipajjati. ^b^kammavipākajānī^eb^ti kevalaṃ kammavipākato, jātāni. tesupi hi uppannesu vuttanayeneva koci kusalaṃ karoti, koci akusalaṃ, koci adhivāsento nipajjati. evaṃ sabbavāresu tividhāva vedanā honti.
[03] tattha purimehi sattahi kāraṇehi uppannā sārīrikā vedanā sakkā paṭibāhituṃ, kammavipākajānaṃ pana sabbabhesajjānipi sabbaparittānipi nālaṃ paṭighātāya. imasmiṃ sutte lokavohāro nāma kathitoti.

[03] 270-278^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^b^aṭṭhasatapariyāya^eb^nti aṭṭhasatassa kāraṇabhūtaṃ. ^b^dhammapariyāya^eb^nti dhammakāraṇaṃ. ^b^kāyikā ca cetasikā cā^eb^ti ettha kāyikā kāmāvacareyeva labbhanti, cetasikā catubhūmikāpi ^a^V3.0120^ea^. ^b^sukhā^eb^tiādīsu sukhā vedanā arūpāvacare natthi, sesāsu tīsu bhūmīsu labbhanti, dukkhā kāmāvacarāva, itarā catubhūmikā. pañcake sukhindriyadukkhindriyadomanassindriyāni kāmāvacarāneva, somanassindriyaṃ tebhūmakaṃ, upekkhindriyaṃ catubhūmakaṃ. chakke pañcasu dvāresu vedanā kāmāvacarāva, manodvāre catubhūmikā, aṭṭhārasake chasu iṭṭhārammaṇesu somanassena saha upavicarantīti ^b^somanassūpavicārā^eb^. sesadvayepi eseva nayo. iti ayaṃ desanā vicāravasena āgatā, taṃsampayuttānaṃ pana somanassādīnaṃ vasena idha aṭṭhārasa vedanā veditabbā.

[03] ^b^cha gehasitāni somanassānī^eb^tiādīsu ``cakkhuviññeyyānaṃ rūpānaṃ iṭṭhānaṃ kantānaṃ manāpānaṃ manoramānaṃ lokāmisapaṭisaṃyuttānaṃ paṭilābhaṃ vā paṭilābhato samanupassato pubbe vā paṭiladdhapubbaṃ atītaṃ niruddhaṃ vipariṇataṃ samanussarato uppajjati somanassaṃ. yaṃ evarūpaṃ ^a^P3.0083^ea^ somanassaṃ, idaṃ ^a^M3.0123^ea^ vuccati gehasitaṃ somanassa''nti (ma0 ni0 3.306). evaṃ chasu dvāresu vuttakāmaguṇanissitāni somanassāni ^b^cha gehasitasomanassāni^eb^ nāma.

[03] ``rūpānaṃ tveva aniccataṃ viditvā vipariṇāmavirāganirodhaṃ `pubbe ceva rūpā etarahi ca, sabbe te rūpā aniccā dukkhā vipariṇāmadhammā'ti evametaṃ yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya passato uppajjati somanassaṃ. yaṃ evarūpaṃ somanassaṃ, idaṃ vuccati nekkhammasitaṃ somanassa''nti (ma0 ni0 3.306) evaṃ chasu dvāresu iṭṭhārammaṇe āpāthagate aniccatādivasena vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā ussukkāpetuṃ sakkontassa ``ussukkitā me vipassanā''ti somanassajātassa uppannasomanassāni ^b^cha nekkhammasitasomanassāni^eb^ nāma.

[03] ``cakkhuviññeyyānaṃ rūpānaṃ iṭṭhānaṃ kantānaṃ manāpānaṃ manoramānaṃ lokāmisapaṭisaṃyuttānaṃ appaṭilābhaṃ vā appaṭilābhato samanupassato pubbe vā paṭiladdhapubbaṃ atītaṃ niruddhaṃ vipariṇataṃ samanussarato uppajjati domanassaṃ. yaṃ evarūpaṃ domanassaṃ, idaṃ vuccati gehasitaṃ domanassa''nti. evaṃ chasu dvāresu ``iṭṭhārammaṇaṃ nānubhavissāmi nānubhavāmī''ti vitakkayato uppannāni kāmaguṇanissitadomanassāni ^b^cha gehasitadomanassāni^eb^ nāma.

[03] ``rūpānaṃ tveva aniccataṃ viditvā vipariṇāmavirāganirodhaṃ `pubbe ceva rūpā etarahi ca ^a^V3.0121^ea^, sabbe te rūpā aniccā dukkhā vipariṇāmadhammā'ti evametaṃ yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya disvā anuttaresu vimokkhesu pihaṃ upaṭṭhāpeti `kudāssu nāmāhaṃ tadāyatanaṃ upasampajja viharissāmi, yadariyā etarahi āyatanaṃ upasampajja viharantī''ti. iti anuttaresu vimokkhesu pihaṃ upaṭṭhāpayato uppajjati pihapaccayā domanassaṃ. yaṃ evarūpaṃ domanassaṃ, idaṃ vuccati nekkhammasitaṃ domanassanti; evaṃ chasu dvāresu iṭṭhārammaṇe āpāthagate anuttaravimokkhasaṅkhātāriyaphaladhammesu pihaṃ upaṭṭhāpetvā tadadhigamāya aniccatādivasena vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā ussukkāpetuṃ asakkontassa ``imampi pakkhaṃ imampi māsaṃ imampi saṃvaccharaṃ vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā ariyabhūmiṃ ^a^P3.0084^ea^ pāpuṇituṃ nāsakkhi''nti anusocato uppannāni domanassāni ^b^cha nekkhammasitadomanassāni^eb^ nāma.

[03] ``cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā uppajjati upekkhā bālassa mūḷhassa puthujjanassa anodhijinassa avipākajinassa anādīnavadassāvino assutavato puthujjanassa ^a^M3.0124^ea^. yā evarūpā upekkhā, rūpaṃ sā nātivattati, tasmā sā upekkhā gehasitāti vuccatī''ti; evaṃ chasu dvāresu iṭṭhārammaṇe āpāthagate guḷapiṇḍake nilīnamakkhikā viya rūpādīni anativattamānā tattheva laggā laggitā hutvā uppannakāmaguṇanissitā upekkhā ^b^cha gehasitaupekkhā^eb^ nāma.

[03] ``rūpānaṃ tveva aniccataṃ viditvā vipariṇāmavirāganirodhaṃ pubbe ceva rūpā etarahi ca, `sabbe te rūpā aniccā dukkhā vipariṇāmadhammā'ti evametaṃ yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya passato uppajjati upekkhā. yā evarūpā upekkhā, rūpaṃ sā ativattati, tasmā sā upekkhā nekkhammasitāti vuccatī''ti; evaṃ chasu dvāresu iṭṭhādiārammaṇe āpāthagate iṭṭhe arajjantassa aniṭṭhe adussantassa asamapekkhane amuyhantassa uppannā vipassanāñāṇasampayuttā upekkhā ^b^nekkhammasitaupekkhā^eb^ nāma. imasmiṃ sutte sabbasaṅgāhako catubhūmakadhammaparicchedo kathito. tatiyādīni uttānatthāneva.

[03] 279^b^.^eb^ ekādasame ^b^sāmisā^eb^ti kilesāmisena sāmisā. ^b^nirāmisatarā^eb^ti nirāmisāyapi jhānapītiyā nirāmisatarāva. nanu ca dvīsu jhānesu pīti mahaggatāpi hoti lokuttarāpi, paccavekkhaṇapīti ^a^V3.0122^ea^ lokiyāva, sā kasmā nirāmisatarā jātāti? santapaṇītadhammapaccavekkhaṇavasena uppannattā. yathā hi rājavallabho cūḷupaṭṭhāko appaṭihārikaṃ yathāsukhaṃ rājakulaṃ pavisanto seṭṭhisenāpatiādayo pādena paharantopi na gaṇeti. kasmā? rañño āsannaparicārakattā. iti so tehi uttaritaro hoti, evamayampi santapaṇītadhammapaccavekkhaṇavasena ^a^P3.0085^ea^ uppannattā lokuttarapītitopi uttaritarāti veditabbā. sesavāresupi eseva nayo.
[03] vimokkhavāre pana rūpapaṭisaṃyutto vimokkho attano ārammaṇabhūtena rūpāmisavaseneva sāmiso nāma, arūpapaṭisaṃyutto rūpāmisābhāvena nirāmiso nāmāti.
[06] vedanāsaṃyuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 280-281^b^.^eb^ mātugāmasaṃyuttassa ^a^V3.0123^ea^ ^a^M3.0125^ea^ ^a^P3.0086^ea^ paṭhame ^b^aṅgehī^eb^ti aguṇaṅgehi. ^b^na ca rūpavā^eb^ti na rūpasampanno virūpo duddasiko. ^b^na ca bhogavā^eb^ti na bhogasampanno niddhano. ^b^na ca sīlavā^eb^ti na sīlasampanno dussīlo. ^b^alaso cā^eb^ti kantanapacanādīni kammāni kātuṃ na sakkoti, kusīto ālasiyo nisinnaṭṭhāne nisinnova, ṭhitaṭhāne ṭhitova niddāyati eva. ^b^pajañcassa na labhatī^eb^ti assa purisassa kulavaṃsapatiṭṭhāpakaṃ puttaṃ na labhati, vañjhitthī nāma hoti. sukkapakkho vuttavipariyāyena veditabbo. dutiyaṃ paṭhame vuttanayeneva parivattetabbaṃ.
[03] 282^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^b^āveṇikānī^eb^ti pāṭipuggalikāni purisehi asādhāraṇāni. ^b^pāricariya^eb^nti paricārikabhāvaṃ.

[03] 283-303^b^.^eb^ catutthe ^b^maccheramalapariyuṭṭhitenā^eb^ti pubbaṇhasamayasmiñhi mātugāmo khīradadhisaṅgopanarandhanapacanādīni kātuṃ āraddho, puttakehipi yāciyamāno kiñci dātuṃ na icchati. tenetaṃ vuttaṃ ``pubbaṇhasamayaṃ maccheramalapariyuṭṭhitena cetasā''ti. majjhanhikasamaye pana mātugāmo kodhābhibhūtova hoti, antoghare kalahaṃ alabhanto ^a^P3.0087^ea^ paṭivissakagharampi gantvā kalahaṃ ^a^V3.0124^ea^ karoti, sāmikassa ca ṭhitanisinnaṭṭhānāni vilokento vicarati. tena vuttaṃ ``majjhanhikasamayaṃ issāpariyuṭṭhitena cetasā''ti. sāyanhe panassā asaddhammapaṭisevanāya cittaṃ namati. tena vuttaṃ ``sāyanhasamayaṃ kāmarāgapariyuṭṭhitena cetasā''ti. pañcamādīni uttānatthāneva.

[03] 304^b^.^eb^ dasame ^a^M3.0126^ea^ ^b^rūpabala^eb^ntiādīsu rūpasampatti ^b^rūpabalaṃ,^eb^ bhogasampatti ^b^bhogabalaṃ,^eb^ ñātisampatti ^b^ñātibalaṃ,^eb^ puttasampatti ^b^puttabalaṃ,^eb^ sīlasampatti ^b^sīlabalaṃ^eb^. pañcasīladasasīlāni akhaṇḍāni katvā rakkhantassa hi sīlasampattiyeva sīlabalaṃ nāma hoti. ^b^imāni kho bhikkhave pañca balānī^eb^ti imāni pañca upatthambhanaṭṭhena balāni nāma vuccanti.

[03] 305-313^b^.^eb^ ^b^pasayhā^eb^ti abhibhavitvā. ^b^abhibhuyya vattatī^eb^ti abhibhavati ajjhottharati. ^b^neva rūpabalaṃ tāyatī^eb^ti neva rūpabalaṃ tāyituṃ rakkhituṃ sakkoti. ^b^nāsenteva naṃ, kule na vāsentī^eb^ti ``dussīlā saṃbhinnācārā atikkantamariyādā''ti gīvāyaṃ gahetvā nīharanti, na tasmiṃ kule vāsenti. ^b^vāsenteva naṃ kule, na nāsentī^eb^ti ``kiṃ rūpena bhogādīhi vā, parisuddhasīlā esā ācārasampannā''ti ñatvā ñātakā tasmiṃ kule vāsentiyeva, na nāsenti. sesaṃ sabbattha uttānatthamevāti.
[06] mātugāmasaṃyuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 314^b^.^eb^ jambukhādakasaṃyutte ^a^V3.0125^ea^ ^a^P3.0088^ea^ ^a^M3.0127^ea^ ^b^jambukhādako paribbājako^eb^ti evaṃnāmo therassa bhāgineyyo channaparibbājako. ^b^yo kho āvuso rāgakkhayo^eb^ti nibbānaṃ āgamma rāgo khīyati, tasmā nibbānaṃ rāgakkhayoti vuccati. ^b^dosamohakkhayesupi^eb^ eseva nayo.

[03] yo pana imināva suttena kilesakkhayamattaṃ nibbānanti vadeyya, so vattabbo ``kassa kilesānaṃ khayo, kiṃ attano, udāhu paresa''nti? addhā ``attano''ti vakkhati. tato pucchitabbo ``gotrabhuñāṇassa kiṃ ārammaṇa''nti? jānamāno ``nibbāna''nti vakkhati. kiṃ pana gotrabhuñāṇakkhaṇe kilesā khīṇā khīyanti khīyissantīti? ``khīṇā''ti vā ``khīyantī''ti vā na vattabbā, ``khīyissantī''ti pana vattabbāti. kiṃ pana tesu akhīṇesuyeva kilesesu gotrabhuñāṇaṃ kilesakkhayaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karotīti? addhā evaṃ vutte niruttaro bhavissati.

[03] maggañāṇenāpi cetaṃ yojetabbaṃ. maggakkhaṇepi hi kilesā ``khīṇā''ti vā ``khīyissantī''ti vā na vattabbā, ``khīyantī''ti pana vattabbā, na ca akhīṇesuyeva kilesesu kilesakkhayo ārammaṇaṃ hoti, tasmā sampaṭicchitabbametaṃ. yaṃ āgamma rāgādayo khīyanti, taṃ nibbānaṃ. taṃ panetaṃ ``rūpino dhammā arūpino dhammā''tiādīsu (dha0 sa0 dukamātikā 11) dukesu arūpino dhammāti saṅgahitattā na kilesakkhayamattamevāti.
[03] 315^b^.^eb^ arahattapañhabyākaraṇe ^a^V3.0126^ea^ yasmā arahattaṃ rāgadosamohānaṃ khīṇante uppajjati, tasmā ``rāgakkhayo dosakkhayo mohakkhayo''ti vuttaṃ.

[03] 316-328^b^.^eb^ ^b^te^eb^ ^a^M3.0128^ea^ ^a^P3.0089^ea^ ^b^loke sugatā^eb^ti te rāgādayo pahāya gatattā suṭṭhu gatāti sugatā. ^b^dukkhassa kho āvuso pariññattha^eb^nti vaṭṭadukkhassa parijānanatthaṃ. ^b^dukkhatā^eb^ti dukkhasabhāvo. ^b^dukkhadukkhatā^eb^tiādīsu dukkhasaṅkhāto dukkhasabhāvo dukkhadukkhatā. sesapadadvayepi eseva nayo.

[03] 329^b^.^eb^ ^b^abhiratī^eb^ti pabbajjāya anukkaṇṭhanatā. ^b^naciraṃ āvuso^eb^ti āvuso dhammānudhammappaṭipanno bhikkhu ``pāto anusiṭṭho sāyaṃ visesamadhigamissati, sāyaṃ anusiṭṭho pāto visesamadhigamissatī''ti (ma0 ni0 2.345) vuttattā ghaṭento vāyamanto nacirassaṃ lahuyeva arahaṃ assa, arahatte patiṭṭhaheyyāti dasseti. sesaṃ sabbattha uttānatthamevāti.
[06] jambukhādakasaṃyuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03] 330-331^b^.^eb^ sāmaṇḍakasaṃyuttepi ^a^V3.0127^ea^ imināva nayena attho veditabbo.
[06] sāmaṇḍakasaṃyuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 332-339^b^.^eb^ moggallānasaṃyutte ^a^V3.0128^ea^ ^a^M3.0129^ea^ ^b^kāmasahagatā^eb^ti pañcanīvaraṇasahagatā. tassa hi paṭhamajjhānavuṭṭhitassa pañca nīvaraṇāni santato upaṭṭhahiṃsu. tenassa taṃ paṭhamajjhānaṃ hānabhāgiyaṃ nāma ahosi. taṃ pamādaṃ ñatvā ^a^P3.0090^ea^ satthā ``mā pamādo''ti ovādaṃ adāsi. dutiyajjhānādīsupi imināva nayena attho veditabbo. ārammaṇasahagatameva hettha ``sahagata''nti vuttaṃ.

[03] 340^b^.^eb^ ^b^animittaṃ cetosamādhi^eb^nti niccanimittādīni pahāya pavattaṃ vipassanāsamādhiṃyeva sandhāyetaṃ vuttanti. ^b^nimittānusāri viññāṇaṃ hotī^eb^ti evaṃ iminā vipassanāsamādhivihārena viharato vipassanāñāṇe tikkhe sūre vahamāne. yathā nāma purisassa tikhiṇena pharasunā rukkhaṃ chindantassa ``suṭṭhu vata me pharasu vahatī''ti khaṇe khaṇe pharasudhāraṃ olokentassa chejjakiccaṃ na nipphajjati, evaṃ therassāpi ``sūraṃ vata me hutvā ñāṇaṃ vahatī''ti vipassanaṃ ārabbha nikanti uppajjati. atha vipassanākiccaṃ sādhetuṃ nāsakkhi. taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ ``nimittānusāri viññāṇaṃ hotī''ti. ^b^sabbanimittānaṃ amanasikārā animittaṃ cetosamādhiṃ upasampajja vihāsi^eb^nti sabbesaṃ niccasukhāttanimittānaṃ amanasikārena animittaṃ vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanāsampayuttaṃ cetosamādhiṃ nibbānārammaṇaṃ uparimaggaphalasamādhiṃ upasampajja vihāsiṃ.

[03] 341-342^b^.^eb^ ^b^aveccappasādenā^eb^ti ^a^V3.0129^ea^ acalappasādena. ^b^dasahi ṭhānehī^eb^ti dasahi kāraṇehi. ^b^adhigaṇhantī^eb^ti abhibhavanti, atikkamitvā tiṭṭhanti. sesaṃ sabbattha uttānatthamevāti.
[06] moggallānasaṃyuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 343^b^.^eb^ cittasaṃyuttassa ^a^V3.0130^ea^ ^a^P3.0091^ea^ ^a^M3.0130^ea^ paṭhame ^b^macchikāsaṇḍe^eb^ti evaṃnāmake vanasaṇḍe. ^b^ayamantarākathā udapādī^eb^ti porāṇakattherā atiracchānakathā honti, nisinnanisinnaṭṭhāne pañhaṃ samuṭṭhāpetvā ajānantā pucchanti, jānantā vissajjenti, tena nesaṃ ayaṃ kathā udapādi. ^b^migapathaka^eb^nti evaṃnāmakaṃ attano bhogagāmaṃ. so kira ambāṭakārāmassa piṭṭhibhāge hoti. ^b^tenupasaṅkamī^eb^ti ``therānaṃ pañhaṃ vissajjetvā phāsuvihāraṃ katvā dassāmī''ti cintetvā upasaṅkami. ^b^gambhīre buddhavacane^eb^ti atthagambhīre ceva dhammagambhīre ca buddhavacane. ^b^paññācakkhu kamatī^eb^ti ñāṇacakkhu vahati pavattati.

[03] 344^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^b^āyasmantaṃ thera^eb^nti tesu theresu jeṭṭhakaṃ mahātheraṃ. ^b^tuṇhī ahosī^eb^ti jānantopi avisāradattā na kiñci byāhari. ^b^byākaromahaṃ bhante^eb^ti ``ayaṃ thero neva attanā byākaroti, na aññe ajjhesati, upāsakopi bhikkhusaṅghaṃ viheseti, ahametaṃ byākaritvā phāsuvihāraṃ katvā dassāmī''ti cintetvā āsanato vuṭṭhāya therassa santikaṃ gantvā evaṃ okāsamakāsi, katāvakāso pana attano āsane nisīditvā byākāsi.

[03] ^b^sahatthā^eb^ti sahatthena. ^b^santappesī^eb^ti yāvadicchakaṃ dento suṭṭhu tappesi. ^b^sampavāresī^eb^ti ``alaṃ ala''nti hatthasaññāya ceva vācāya ca paṭikkhipāpesi. ^b^onītapattapāṇino^eb^ti ^a^P3.0092^ea^ pāṇito apanītapattā dhovitvā thavikāya osāpetvā aṃse laggitapattāti attho.

[03] 345^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^a^V3.0131^ea^ ^b^avantiyā^eb^ti dakkhiṇāpathe avantiraṭṭhe. ^b^kalyāṇaṃ vuccatī^eb^ti ``catūhi paccayehi paṭijaggissāmī''ti vacanaṃ niddosaṃ anavajjaṃ vuccati tayā upāsakāti adhippāyena vadati.

[03] 346^b^.^eb^ catutthe ^a^M3.0131^ea^ ^b^sesakaṃ vissajjethā^eb^ti tassa kira therehi saddhiṃyeva kaṃsathālaṃ pamajjitvā pāyāsaṃ vaḍḍhetvā adaṃsu. so bhuttapāyāso therehiyeva saddhiṃ gantukāmo cintesi ``ghare tāva upāsikā sesakaṃ vicāreti, idha panime dāsakammakārā mayā avuttā na vicāressanti, evāyaṃ paṇītapāyāso nassissatī''ti tesaṃ anujānanto evamāha. ^b^kuthita^eb^nti kudhitaṃ, heṭṭhā santattāya vālikāya upari ātapena ca atitikhiṇanti attho. idaṃ pana tepiṭake buddhavacane asambhinnapadaṃ. ^b^paveliyamānenā^eb^ti paṭiliyamānena ^b^sādhu khvassa bhante^eb^ti ``phāsuvihāraṃ karissāmi nesa''nti cintetvā evamāha.

[03] ^b^iddhābhisaṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkharī^eb^ti adhiṭṭhāniddhiṃ akāsi. ettha ca ``mandamando sītakavāto vāyatu, abbhamaṇḍapaṃ katvā devo ekamekaṃ phusāyatū''ti evaṃ nānāparikammaṃ -- ``savāto devo vassatū''ti evaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ ekatopi hoti. ``savāto devo vassatūti ekatoparikammaṃ, mandamando sītakavāto vāyatu, abbhamaṇḍapaṃ katvā devo ^a^P3.0093^ea^ ekamekaṃ phusāyatū''ti evaṃ nānāadhiṭṭhānaṃ hoti. vuttanayeneva nānāparikammaṃ nānādhiṭṭhānaṃ, ekato parikammaṃ ekato adhiṭṭhānampi hotiyeva. yathā tathā karontassa pana pādakajjhānato vuṭṭhāya kataparikammassa parikammānantarena mahaggatādhiṭṭhānacitteneva taṃ ijjhati. ^b^okāsesī^eb^ti vippakiri.

[03] 347^b^.^eb^ pañcame ^b^nelaṅgo^eb^ti niddoso. ^b^setapacchādo^eb^ti setapaṭicchādano. ^b^anīgha^eb^nti niddukkhaṃ. ^b^muhuttaṃ tuṇhī hutvā^eb^ti tassa atthapekkhanatthaṃ tīṇi piṭakāni kaṇṇe kuṇḍalaṃ viya sañcālento ^a^V3.0132^ea^ ``ayaṃ imassa attho, ayaṃ imassa attho''ti upaparikkhaṇatthaṃ muhuttaṃ tuṇhī hutvā. ^b^vimuttiyā^eb^ti arahattaphalavimuttiyā. imaṃ pana pañhaṃ kathento upāsako dukkaraṃ akāsi. sammāsambuddho hi ``passatha no tumhe, bhikkhave, etaṃ bhikkhuṃ ^a^M3.0132^ea^ āgacchantaṃ odātakaṃ tanukaṃ tuṅganāsika''nti (saṃ0 ni0 2.245) attano diṭṭhena kathesi. ayaṃ pana nayaggāhena ``arahato etaṃ adhivacana''nti āha.

[03] 348^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhe ^b^kati nu kho bhante saṅkhārā^eb^ti ayaṃ kira, gahapati, nirodhaṃ valañjeti, tasmā ``nirodhapādake saṅkhāre pucchissāmī''ti cintetvā evamāha. theropissa adhippāyaṃ ñatvā puññābhisaṅkhārādīsu anekesu saṅkhāresu vijjamānesupi kāyasaṅkhārādayova ācikkhanto ^b^tayo kho gahapatī^eb^tiādimāha. tattha kāyappaṭibaddhattā kāyena saṅkharīyati nibbattīyatīti ^b^kāyasaṅkhāro^eb^. vācāya saṅkharoti nibbattetīti ^b^vacīsaṅkhāro^eb^. cittappaṭibaddhattā cittena saṅkharīyati nibbattīyatīti ^b^cittasaṅkhāro^eb^.

[03] ^b^katamo^eb^ ^a^P3.0094^ea^ ^b^pana bhante^eb^ti idha kiṃ pucchati? ``ime saṅkhārā aññamaññaṃ missā āluḷitā avibhūtā duddīpanā. tathā hi kāyadvāre ādānaggahaṇamuñcanacopanāni pāpetvā uppannā aṭṭha kāmāvacarakusalacetanā dvādasa akusalacetanāti evaṃ kusalākusalā vīsati cetanāpi, assāsapassāsāpi ^b^kāyasaṅkhāro^eb^tveva vuccanti. vacīdvāre hanusañcopanaṃ vacībhedaṃ pāpetvā uppannā vuttappakārāva vīsati cetanāpi vitakkavicārāpi ^b^vacīsaṅkhāro^eb^tveva vuccanti. kāyavacīdvāresu copanaṃ apatvā raho nisinnassa cintayato uppannā kusalākusalā ekūnatiṃsacetanāpi, saññā ca vedanā cāti ime dve dhammāpi ^b^cittasaṅkhāro^eb^tveva vuccanti. evaṃ ime saṅkhārā aññamaññaṃ missā āluḷitā avibhūtā duddīpanā, te pākaṭe vibhūte katvā kathāpessāmī''ti pucchi.

[03] ^b^kasmā pana bhante^eb^ti idha kāyasaṅkhārādināmassa padatthaṃ pucchati. tassa vissajjane ^b^kāyappaṭibaddhā^eb^ti kāyanissitā. kāye sati honti, asati na honti. ^b^cittappaṭibaddhā^eb^ti cittanissitā. citte sati honti, asati na honti.

[03] idāni ^a^V3.0133^ea^ ^a^M3.0133^ea^ ``kiṃ nu kho esa saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ valañjeti, no valañjeti, ciṇṇavasī vā tattha no ciṇṇavasī''ti jānanatthaṃ pucchanto ^b^kathaṃ pana bhante saññāvedayitanirodhasamāpatti hotī^eb^ti āha. tassa vissajjane ^b^samāpajjissa^eb^nti vā ^b^samāpajjāmī^eb^ti vā padadvayena nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpattikālo kathito. ^b^samāpanno^eb^ti padena antonirodho. tathā purimehi dvīhi padehi sacittakakālo kathito, pacchimena acittakakālo.

[03] ^b^pubbeva tathā cittaṃ bhāvitaṃ hotī^eb^ti nirodhasamāpattito pubbe addhānaparicchedakāleyeva ``ettakaṃ kālaṃ acittako bhavissāmī''ti addhānaparicchedaṃ cittaṃ bhāvitaṃ hoti. ^b^yaṃ taṃ tathattāya upanetī^eb^ti yaṃ pana evaṃ bhāvitaṃ cittaṃ, taṃ puggalaṃ tathattāya acittakabhāvāya upaneti. ^b^vacīsaṅkhāro paṭhamaṃ nirujjhatī^eb^ti sesasaṅkhārehi paṭhamaṃ dutiyajjhāneyeva nirujjhati. ^b^tato kāyasaṅkhāro^eb^ti ^a^P3.0095^ea^ tato paraṃ kāyasaṅkhāro catutthajjhāne nirujjhati. ^b^tato cittasaṅkhāro^eb^ti tato paraṃ cittasaṅkhāro antonirodhe nirujjhati. ^b^āyū^eb^ti rūpajīvitindriyaṃ. ^b^viparibhinnānī^eb^ti upahatāni vinaṭṭhāni.

[03] tattha keci ``nirodhasamāpannassa `cittasaṅkhāro ca niruddho'ti vacanato cittaṃ aniruddhaṃ hoti, tasmā sacittakāpi ayaṃ samāpattī''ti vadanti. te vattabbā -- ``vacīsaṅkhāropissa niruddho''ti vacanato vācā aniruddhā hoti, tasmā nirodhasamāpannena dhammampi kathentena sajjhāyampi karontena nisīditabbaṃ siyā. yo cāyaṃ mato kālaṅkato, tassāpi cittasaṅkhāro niruddhoti vacanato cittaṃ aniruddhaṃ bhaveyya, tasmā kālaṅkate mātāpitaro vā arahante vā jhāpentena ānantariyakammaṃ kataṃ bhaveyya. iti byañjane abhinivesaṃ akatvā ācariyānaṃ naye ṭhatvā attho upaparikkhitabbo. attho hi paṭisaraṇaṃ, na byañjanaṃ.

[03] ^b^indriyāni vippasannānī^eb^ti kiriyamayapavattasmiñhi vattamāne bahiddhārammaṇesu pasāde ghaṭṭentesu indriyāni kilamanti, upahatāni makkhittāni viya honti vātādīhi uṭṭhitarajena catumahāpathe ṭhapitāadāso viya. yathā pana thavikāya pakkhipitvā mañjūsādīsu ṭhapito ādāso antoyeva ^a^M3.0134^ea^ virocati, evaṃ nirodhasamāpannassa bhikkhuno antonirodhe pañca pasādā ativiya virocanti. tena vuttaṃ ``indriyāni vippasannānī''ti.

[03] ^b^vuṭṭhahissa^eb^nti ^a^V3.0134^ea^ vā ^b^vuṭṭhahāmī^eb^ti vā padadvayena antonirodhakālo kathito, ^b^vuṭṭhito^eb^ti padena phalasamāpattikālo. tathā purimehi dvīhi padehi acittakakālo kathito, pacchimena sacittakakālo. ^b^pubbeva tathā cittaṃ bhāvitaṃ hotī^eb^ti nirodhasamāpattito pubbe addhānaparicchedakāleyeva ``ettakaṃ kālaṃ acittako hutvā tato paraṃ sacittako bhavissāmī''ti addhānaparicchedaṃ cittaṃ bhāvitaṃ hoti. ^b^yaṃ taṃ tathattāya upanetī^eb^ti yaṃ evaṃ bhāvitaṃ cittaṃ, taṃ puggalaṃ tathattāya sacittakabhāvāya upaneti. iti heṭṭhā nirodhasamāpajjannakālo ^a^P3.0096^ea^ gahito, idha nirodhato vuṭṭhānakālo.

[03] idāni nirodhakathaṃ kathetuṃ kāloti nirodhakathā kathetabbā siyā. sā panesā ``dvīhi balehi samannāgatattā tayo ca saṅkhārānaṃ paṭipassaddhiyā soḷasahi ñāṇacariyāhi navahi samādhicariyāhi vasībhāvatāpaññā nirodhasamāpattiyaṃ ñāṇa''nti mātikaṃ ṭhapetvā sabbākārena visuddhimagge kathitā, tasmā tattha kathitanayeneva gahetabbā. ko panāyaṃ nirodho nāma? catunnaṃ khandhānaṃ paṭisaṅkhā appavatti. atha kimatthametaṃ samāpajjantīti? saṅkhārānaṃ pavatte ukkaṇṭhitā sattāhaṃ acittakā hutvā sukhaṃ viharissāma, diṭṭhadhammanibbānaṃ nāmetaṃ yadidaṃ nirodhoti etadatthaṃ samāpajjanti.

[03] ^b^cittasaṅkhāro paṭhamaṃ uppajjatī^eb^ti nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassa hi phalasamāpatticittaṃ paṭhamaṃ uppajjati. taṃsampayuttaṃ saññañca vedanañca sandhāya ``cittasaṅkhāro paṭhamaṃ uppajjatī''ti āha. ^b^tato kāyasaṅkhāro^eb^ti tato paraṃ bhavaṅgasamaye kāyasaṅkhāro uppajjati.

[03] kiṃ pana phalasamāpatti assāsapassāse na samuṭṭhāpetīti? samuṭṭhāpeti. imassa pana catutthajjhānikā phalasamāpatti, sā na samuṭṭhāpeti. kiṃ vā etena? phalasamāpatti paṭhamajjhānikā vā hotu dutiyatatiyacatutthajjhānikā vā, santasamāpattito vuṭṭhitassa bhikkhuno assāsapassāsā ^a^M3.0135^ea^ abbohārikā honti, tesaṃ abbohārikabhāvo ^b^sañjīvattheravatthunā^eb^ veditabbo. sañjīvattherassa hi samāpattito vuṭṭhāya kiṃsukapupphasadise vītaccitaṅgāre maddamānassa gacchato cīvare aṃsumattampi na jhāyi, usmākāramattampi nāhosi. samāpattibalaṃ ^a^P3.0097^ea^ nāmetanti vadanti. evameva santāya phalasamāpattiyā vuṭṭhitassa bhikkhuno assāsapassāsā abbohārikā hontīti bhavaṅgasamayenevetaṃ kathitanti veditabbaṃ.

[03] ^b^tato^eb^ ^a^V3.0135^ea^ ^b^vacīsaṅkhāro^eb^ti tato paraṃ kiriyamayapavattavalañjanakāle vacīsaṅkhāro uppajjati. kiṃ bhavaṅgaṃ vitakkavicāre na samuṭṭhāpetīti? samuṭṭhāpeti. taṃsamuṭṭhānā pana vitakkavicārā vācaṃ abhisaṅkhātuṃ na sakkontīti kiriyamayapavattavalañjanakālenevetaṃ kathitaṃ.

[03] ^b^suññato phasso^eb^tiādayo saguṇenāpi ārammaṇenāpi kathetabbā. ^b^saguṇena^eb^ tāva suññatā nāma phalasamāpatti, tāya sahajātaphassaṃ sandhāya ``suññato phasso''ti vuttaṃ. animittappaṇihitesupi eseva nayo. ^b^ārammaṇena^eb^ pana nibbānaṃ rāgādīhi suññattā suññatā nāma, rāganimittādīnaṃ abhāvā animittaṃ, rāgadosamohappaṇidhīnaṃ abhāvā appaṇihitaṃ, suññataṃ nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā uppannaphalasamāpattisamphasso suññato nāma. animittappaṇihitesupi eseva nayo.

[03] aparā āgamaniyakathā nāma hoti. suññatānimittāppaṇihitāti hi vipassanāpi vuccati. tattha yo bhikkhu saṅkhāre aniccato pariggahetvā aniccato disvā aniccato vuṭṭhāti, tassa vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanā animittā nāma hoti. yo dukkhato pariggahetvā dukkhato disvā dukkhato vuṭṭhāti, tassa appaṇihitā nāma. yo anattato pariggahetvā anattato disvā anattato vuṭṭhāti, tassa suññatā nāma. tattha animittavipassanāya maggo animitto nāma, animittamaggassa phalaṃ animittaṃ nāma, animittaphalasamāpattisahajāte phasse phusante ``animitto phasso phusatī''ti vuccati. appaṇihitasuññatesupi eseva nayo. āgamaniyena kathite pana suññato vā phasso animitto vā phasso appaṇihito vā phassoti vikappo āpajjeyya, tasmā saguṇena ^a^M3.0136^ea^ ceva ārammaṇena ca kathetabbaṃ. evañhi tayo phassā phusantīti sameti.

[03] ^b^vivekaninna^eb^ntiādīsu nibbānaṃ viveko nāma. tasmiṃ viveke ninnaṃ onatanti vivekaninnaṃ. ^b^vivekapoṇa^eb^nti aññato ^a^P3.0098^ea^ agantvā yena viveko, tena vaṅkaṃ viya hutvā ṭhitanti vivekapoṇaṃ. yena viveko, tena patamānaṃ viya ṭhitanti ^b^vivekapabbhāraṃ^eb^.

[03] 349^b^.^eb^ sattame ^a^V3.0136^ea^ ^b^nānatthā ceva nānābyañjanā cā^eb^ti byañjanampi nesaṃ nānaṃ, atthopi. tattha byañjanassa nānatā pākaṭā. attho pana appamāṇā cetovimutti bhūmantarato mahaggatā hoti rūpāvacarā, ārammaṇato sattapaṇṇattiārammaṇā. ākiñcaññā bhūmantarato mahaggatā arūpāvacarā, ārammaṇato navattabbārammaṇā. suññatā bhūmantarato kāmāvacarā, ārammaṇato saṅkhārārammaṇā. vipassanā hi ettha suññatāti adhippetā. animittā bhūmantarato lokuttarā, ārammaṇato nibbānārammaṇā.

[03] ^b^rāgo kho bhante pamāṇakaraṇo^eb^tiādīsu yathā pabbatapāde pūtipaṇṇakasaṭaudakaṃ nāma hoti kāḷavaṇṇaṃ, olokentānaṃ byāmasatagambhīraṃ viya khāyati, yaṭṭhiṃ vā rajjuṃ vā gahetvā minantassa piṭṭhipādottharaṇamattampi na hoti; evameva yāva rāgādayo nuppajjanti, tāva puggalaṃ sañjānituṃ na sakkā hoti, sotāpanno viya sakadāgāmī viya anāgāmī viya ca khāyati. yadā panassa rāgādayo uppajjanti, tadā ratto duṭṭho mūḷhoti paññāyati. iti te ``ettako aya''nti puggalassa pamāṇaṃ dassentāva uppajjantīti pamāṇakaraṇā nāma vuttā.

[03] ^b^yāvatā kho bhante appamāṇā cetovimuttiyo^eb^ti yattakā appamāṇā cetovimuttiyo. kittakā pana tā? cattāro brahmavihārā, cattāro maggā, cattāri phalānīti dvādasa. tatra brahmavihārā pharaṇāppamāṇatāya appamāṇā, sesā pamāṇakārakānaṃ kilesānaṃ abhāvena nibbānampi appamāṇameva, cetovimutti pana na hoti, tasmā na gahitaṃ. ^b^akuppā^eb^ti arahattaphalacetovimutti. sā hi tāsaṃ sabbajeṭṭhikā, tasmā ^a^M3.0137^ea^ ``aggamakkhāyatī''ti vuttā. ^b^rāgo^eb^ ^a^P3.0099^ea^ ^b^kho bhante kiñcana^eb^nti rāgo uppajjitvā puggalaṃ kiñcati maddati palibundhati, tasmā kiñcananti vutto. manussā kira goṇehi khalaṃ maddāpentā ``kiñcehi kapila kiñcehi kāḷakā''ti vadanti. evaṃ maddanaṭṭho kiñcanaṭṭhoti veditabbo.^b^ dosamohesupi^eb^eseva nayo.
