[03] ^b^ākiñcaññā cetovimuttiyo^eb^ nāma nava dhammā ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ maggaphalāni ca. tattha ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ kiñcanaṃ ārammaṇaṃ assa natthīti ^b^ākiñcaññaṃ^eb^. maggaphalāni kiñcanānaṃ maddanapalibundhanakilesānaṃ ^a^V3.0137^ea^ natthitāya ākiñcaññāni, nibbānampi ākiñcaññaṃ, cetovimutti pana na hoti, tasmā na gahitaṃ.

[03] ^b^rāgo kho bhante nimittakaraṇo^eb^tiādīsu yathā nāma dvinnaṃ kulānaṃ sadisā dve vacchakā honti. yāva tesaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ na kataṃ hoti, tāva ``ayaṃ asukakulassa vacchako, ayaṃ asukakulassā''ti na sakkā hoti jānituṃ. yadā pana tesaṃ tisūlādīsu aññataraṃ lakkhaṇaṃ kataṃ hoti, tadā sakkā hoti jānituṃ. evameva yāva puggalassa rāgo nuppajjati, tāva na sakkā hoti jānituṃ ``ariyo vā puthujjano vā''ti. rāgo panassa uppajjamānova ``sarāgo nāma ayaṃ puggalo''ti sañjānananimittaṃ karonto viya uppajjati, tasmā nimittakaraṇoti vutto. ^b^dosamohesupi^eb^ eseva nayo.

[03] ^b^animittā cetovimuttiyo^eb^ nāma terasa dhammā vipassanā, cattāro āruppā, cattāro maggā, cattāri phalāni. tattha vipassanā niccanimittaṃ sukhanimittaṃ attanimittaṃ ugghāṭetīti ^b^animittā^eb^ nāma. cattāro āruppā rūpanimittassa abhāvā animittā nāma. maggaphalāni nimittakarānaṃ kilesānaṃ abhāvena animittāni, nibbānampi animittameva, taṃ pana cetovimutti na hoti, tasmā na gahitaṃ. atha kasmā suññatā cetovimutti na gahitāti? sā ``suññā rāgenā''tiādivacanato sabbattha anupaviṭṭhāva, tasmā visuṃ na gahitāti.

[03] ^b^ekatthā^eb^ti ^a^M3.0138^ea^ ārammaṇavasena ekatthā ``appamāṇaṃ ākiñcaññaṃ suññataṃ animitta''nti hi sabbānetāni nibbānasseva nāmāni. iti iminā pariyāyena ekatthā. aññasmiṃ pana ^a^P3.0100^ea^ ṭhāne appamāṇāpi hoti, aññasmiṃ ākiñcaññā, aññasmiṃ suññatā, aññasmiṃ animittāti iminā pariyāyena nānābyañjanāti.

[03] 350^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhame ^b^tenupasaṅkamī^eb^ti sayaṃ āgatāgamo viññātasāsano anāgāmī ariyasāvako samāno kasmā naggabhoggaṃ nissirikaṃ nigaṇṭhaṃ upasaṅkamīti? upavādamocanatthañceva vādāropanatthañca. nigaṇṭhā kira ``samaṇassa gotamassa sāvakā thaddhakhadirakhāṇukasadisā, kenaci ^a^V3.0138^ea^ saddhiṃ paṭisanthārampi na karontī''ti upavadanti, tassa upavādassa mocanatthañca, ``vādañcassa āropessāmī''ti upasaṅkami. ^b^na khvāhaṃ ettha bhante bhagavato saddhāya gacchāmī^eb^ti yassa ñāṇena asacchikataṃ hoti. so ``evaṃ kireta''nti aññassa saddhāya gaccheyya, mayā pana ñāṇenetaṃ sacchikataṃ, tasmā nāhaṃ ettha bhagavato saddhāya gacchāmīti dīpento evamāha.

[03] ^b^ulloketvā^eb^ti kāyaṃ unnāmetvā kucchiṃ nīharitvā gīvaṃ paggayha sabbaṃ disaṃ pekkhamāno ulloketvā. ^b^bādhetabbaṃ maññeyyā^eb^ti yathā vinivijjhitvā na nikkhamati, evaṃ paṭibāhitabbaṃ maññeyya bandhitabbaṃ vā. ^b^sahadhammikā^eb^ti sakāraṇā. ^b^atha maṃ paṭihareyyāsi saddhiṃ nigaṇṭhaparisāyā^eb^ti etesaṃ atthe ñāte atha me nigaṇṭhaparisāya saddhiṃ abhigaccheyyāsi, patīhārassa me santikaṃ āgantvā attano āgatabhāvaṃ jānāpeyyāsīti attho. ^b^eko pañho^eb^ti eko pañhamaggo, ekaṃ pañhagavesananti attho. ^b^eko uddeso^eb^ti ekaṃ nāma kinti? ayaṃ eko uddeso. ^b^ekaṃ veyyākaraṇa^eb^nti ``sabbe sattā āhāraṭṭhitikā''ti (khu0 pā0 4.1; a0 ni0 10.27) idaṃ ekaṃ veyyākaraṇaṃ. evaṃ sabbattha attho veditabbo.

[03] 351^b^.^eb^ navame ^a^M3.0139^ea^ ^a^P3.0101^ea^ ^b^kīvaciraṃ pabbajitassāti^eb^ kīvaciro kālo pabbajitassāti attho. ^b^uttari manussadhammā^eb^ti manussadhammo nāma dasakusalakammapathā, tato manussadhammato uttari. ^b^alamariyañāṇadassanaviseso^eb^ti ariyabhāvaṃ kātuṃ samatthatāya alamariyoti saṅkhāto ñāṇadassanaviseso. ^b^naggeyyā^eb^ti naggabhāvato. ^b^muṇḍeyyā^eb^ti muṇḍabhāvato. ^b^pavāḷanipphoṭanāyā^eb^ti pāvaḷanipphoṭanato, bhūmiyaṃ nisīdantassa ānisadaṭṭhāne laggānaṃ paṃsurajavālikānaṃ phoṭanatthaṃ gahitamorapiñchamattatoti attho.

[03] 352^b^.^eb^ dasame ^b^ārāmadevatā^eb^ti pupphārāmaphalārāmesu adhivatthā devatā. ^b^vanadevatā^eb^ti vanasaṇḍesu adhivatthā devatā. ^b^rukkhadevatā^eb^ti mattarājakāle vessavaṇo ca devatāti evaṃ tesu tesu rukkhesu adhivatthā devatā. ^b^osadhitiṇavanappatīsū^eb^ti harītakāmalakīādīsu muñjapabbajādīsu ^a^V3.0139^ea^ vanajeṭṭharukkhesu ca adhivatthā devatā. ^b^saṃgammā^eb^ti sannipatitvā. ^b^samāgammā^eb^ti tato tato samāgantvā. ^b^paṇidhehī^eb^ti patthanāvasena ṭhapehi. ^b^ijjhissati sīlavato cetopaṇidhī^eb^ti samijjhissati sīlavantassa cittapatthanā. ^b^dhammiko^eb^ti dasakusaladhammasamannāgato agatigamanarahito. ^b^dhammarājā^eb^ti tasseva vevacanaṃ, dhammena vā laddharajjattā dhammarājā. ^b^tasmā^eb^ti ``yasmā tena hi, ayyaputta, amhepi ovadāhī''ti vadatha, tasmā. ^b^appaṭivibhatta^eb^nti ``idaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dassāma, idaṃ attanā bhuñjissāmā''ti evaṃ avibhattaṃ bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ sādhāraṇameva bhavissatīti.
[06] cittasaṃyuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 353^b^.^eb^ gāmaṇisaṃyuttassa ^a^V3.0140^ea^ ^a^P3.0102^ea^ ^a^M3.0140^ea^ paṭhame ^b^caṇḍo gāmaṇī^eb^ti dhammasaṅgāhakattherehi caṇḍoti gahitanāmo eko gāmaṇi. ^b^pātukarotī^eb^ti bhaṇḍantaṃ paṭibhaṇḍanto akkosantaṃ paccakkosanto paharantaṃ paṭipaharanto pākaṭaṃ karotīti dasseti. ^b^na pātukarotī^eb^ti akkuṭṭhopi pahaṭopi kiñci paccanīkaṃ akarontoti dasseti.

[03] 354^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^b^tālapuṭo^eb^ti evaṃnāmako. tassa kira bandhanā pamuttatālapakkavaṇṇo viya mukhavaṇṇo vippasanno ahosi, tenassa tālapuṭoti nāmaṃ akaṃsu. svāyaṃ abhinīhārasampanno pacchimabhavikapuggalo. yasmā pana paṭisandhi nāma aniyatā ākāse khittadaṇḍasadisā, tasmā esa naṭakule nibbatti. vuḍḍhippatto pana naṭasippe aggo hutvā sakalajambudīpe pākaṭo jāto. tassa pañca sakaṭasatāni pañca mātugāmasatāni parivāro, bhariyāyapissa tāvatakāvāti mātugāmasahassena ceva sakaṭasahassena ca saddhiṃ yaṃ yaṃ nagaraṃ vā nigamaṃ vā pavisati, tatthassa puretarameva satasahassaṃ denti. samajjavesaṃ gaṇhitvā pana mātugāmasahassena saddhiṃ kīḷaṃ karontassa yaṃ hatthūpagapādūpagādiābharaṇajātaṃ khipanti, tassa pariyanto natthi. so taṃdivasaṃ mātugāmasahassaparivārito rājagahe kīḷaṃ katvā paripakkañāṇattā saparivārova yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami.

[03] ^b^saccālikenā^eb^ti ^a^P3.0103^ea^ saccena ca alikena ca. ^b^tiṭṭhateta^eb^nti tiṭṭhatu etaṃ. ^b^rajanīyā^eb^ti rāgappaccayā mukhato pañcavaṇṇasuttanīharaṇavātavuṭṭhidassanādayo aññe ca kāmassādasaṃyuttākāradassanakā ^a^V3.0141^ea^ abhinayā. ^b^bhiyyosomattāyā^eb^ti adhikappamāṇattāya. ^b^dosanīyā^eb^ti dosappaccayā hatthapādacchedādidassanākārā. ^b^mohanīyā^eb^ti mohappaccayā udakaṃ gahetvā telakaraṇaṃ, telaṃ gahetvā udakakaraṇanti evamādayo māyāpabhedā.

[03] ^b^pahāso^eb^ ^a^M3.0141^ea^ ^b^nāma nirayo^eb^ti visuṃ pahāsanāmako nirayo nāma natthi, avīcisseva pana ekasmiṃ koṭṭhāse naccantā viya gāyantā viya ca naṭavesaṃ gahetvāva paccanti, taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^nāhaṃ, bhante, etaṃ rodāmī^eb^ti ahaṃ, bhante, etaṃ bhagavato byākaraṇaṃ na rodāmīti evaṃ sakammakavasenettha attho veditabbo, na assuvimocanamattena. ``mataṃ vā ammarodantī''tiādayo cettha aññepi vohārā veditabbā.

[03] 355-357^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^b^yodhājīvo^eb^ti yuddhena jīvikaṃ kappanako dhammasaṅgāhakattherehi evaṃ gahitanāmo. ^b^ussahati vāyamatī^eb^ti ussāhaṃ vāyāmaṃ karoti. ^b^pariyāpādentī^eb^ti maraṇaṃ paṭipajjāpenti. ^b^dukkaṭa^eb^nti duṭṭhu kataṃ. ^b^duppaṇihita^eb^nti duṭṭhu ṭhapitaṃ. ^b^parajito nāma nirayo^eb^ti ayampi na visuṃ eko nirayo, avīcisseva pana ekasmiṃ koṭṭhāse pañcāvudhasannaddhā ^a^P3.0104^ea^ phalakahatthā hatthiassarathe āruyha saṅgāme yujjhantā viya paccanti, taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. catutthapañcamesupi eseva nayo.

[03] 358^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhe ^b^pacchābhūmakā^eb^ti pacchābhūmivāsino. ^b^kāmaṇḍalukā^eb^ti sakamaṇḍaluno. ^b^sevālamālikā^eb^ti pātova udakato sevālañceva uppalādīni ca gahetvā udakasuddhikabhāvajānanatthāya mālaṃ katvā piḷandhanakā. ^b^udakorohakā^eb^ti sāyaṃpātaṃ udakaṃ orohanakā. ^b^uyyāpentī^eb^ti upari yāpenti. ^b^saññāpentī^eb^ti sammā ñāpenti. ^b^saggaṃ nāma okkāmentī^eb^ti parivāretvā ṭhitā ``gaccha, bho, brahmalokaṃ, gaccha, bho, brahmaloka''nti vadantā saggaṃ pavesenti. ^b^anuparisakkeyyā^eb^ti anuparigaccheyya. ^b^ummujjā^eb^ti ummujja uṭṭhaha. ^b^thalamuplavā^eb^ti thalamabhiruha. ^b^tatra yāssā^eb^ti tatra yā bhaveyya. ^b^sakkharā vā kaṭhalā vā^eb^ti sakkharā ca kaṭhalā ca ^a^V3.0142^ea^. ^b^sā adhogāmī assā^eb^ti sā adho gaccheyya, heṭṭhāgāmī bhaveyya. ^b^adhogacchā^eb^ti heṭṭhā gaccha.

[03] 359^b^.^eb^ sattame ^a^M3.0142^ea^ ^b^jaṅgala^eb^nti thaddhaṃ na mudu. ^b^ūsara^eb^nti sañjātaloṇaṃ. ^b^pāpabhūmī^eb^ti lāmakabhūmibhāgaṃ. ^b^maṃdīpā^eb^tiādīsu ahaṃ dīpo patiṭṭhā etesanti maṃdīpā. ahaṃ leṇo allīyanaṭṭhānaṃ etesanti ^b^maṃleṇā^eb^. ahaṃ tāṇaṃ rakkhā etesanti ^b^maṃtāṇā^eb^. ahaṃ saraṇaṃ bhayanāsanaṃ etesanti ^b^maṃsaraṇā. viharantī^eb^ti maṃ evaṃ katvā viharanti.

[03] ^b^gobhattampī^eb^ti dhaññaphalassa abhāvena lāyitvā kalāpakalāpaṃ bandhitvā ṭhapitaṃ gimhakāle gunnampi khādanaṃ bhavissatīti attho. ^b^udakamaṇiko^eb^ti kucchiyaṃ maṇikamekhalāya evaṃ laddhanāmo bhājanaviseso. ^b^ahārī aparihārī^eb^ti udakaṃ na harati na pariharati, na pariyādiyatīti attho. iti ^a^P3.0105^ea^ imasmiṃ sutte sakkaccadhammadesanāva kathitā. buddhānañhi asakkaccadhammadesanā nāma natthi. sīhasamānavuttino hi buddhā, yathā sīho pabhinnavaravāraṇassapi sasabiḷārādīnampi gahaṇatthāya ekasadisameva vegaṃ karoti, evaṃ buddhāpi ekassa desentāpi dvinnaṃ bahūnaṃ bhikkhuparisāya bhikkhuniupāsakaupāsikāparisāyapi titthiyānampi desentā sakkaccameva desenti. catasso pana parisā saddahitvā okappetvā suṇantīti tāsaṃ desanā sakkaccadesanā nāma jātā.

[03] 360^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhame ^b^yaṃbahulaṃ yaṃbahula^eb^nti iminā nigaṇṭho attanāva attano vādaṃ bhindati. tasmā bhagavā ^b^evaṃ sante na koci āpāyiko^eb^tiādimāha. purimāni pana cattāri padāni diṭṭhiyā paccayā honti. tasmā tesupi ādīnavaṃ dassento ^b^idha, gāmaṇi, ekacco satthā evaṃvādī hotī^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^ahampamhī^eb^ti ahampi amhi.

[03] ^b^mettāsahagatenā^eb^tiādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ saddhiṃ bhāvanānayena visuddhimagge vuttameva. ^a^V3.0143^ea^ ^b^seyyathāpi, gāmaṇi, balavā saṅkhadhamo^eb^tiādi pana idha apubbaṃ. tattha ^b^balavā^eb^ti balasampanno. ^b^saṅkhadhamo^eb^ti saṅkhadhamako. ^b^appakasirenā^eb^ti akicchena adukkhena. dubbalo hi saṅkhadhamo saṅkhaṃ dhamantopi ^a^M3.0143^ea^ na sakkoti catasso disā sarena viññāpetuṃ, nāssa saṅkhasaddo sabbato pharati, balavato pana vipphāriko hoti, tasmā ``balavā''ti āha.

[03] ^b^mettāya cetovimuttiyā^eb^ti ettha ``mettā''ti vutte upacāropi appanāpi vaṭṭati, ``cetovimuttī''ti vutte pana appanāva vaṭṭati. ^b^yaṃ pamāṇakataṃ kamma^eb^nti pamāṇakataṃ kammaṃ nāma kāmāvacaraṃ vuccati, appamāṇakataṃ kammaṃ nāma rūpāvacaraṃ. tañhi pamāṇaṃ atikkamitvā odhisakānodhisakadisāpharaṇavasena vaḍḍhetvā katattā appamāṇakatanti vuccati.

[03] ^b^na taṃ tatrāvasissati, na taṃ tatrāvatiṭṭhatī^eb^ti taṃ kāmāvacarakammaṃ ^a^P3.0106^ea^ tasmiṃ rūpārūpāvacarakamme na ohīyati na tiṭṭhati. kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? taṃ kāmāvacarakammaṃ tassa rūpārūpāvacarakammassa antarā laggituṃ vā ṭhātuṃ vā rūpārūpāvacarakammaṃ pharitvā pariyādiyitvā attano okāsaṃ gahetvā patiṭṭhātuṃ vā na sakkoti. atha kho rūpārūpāvacarakammameva kāmāvacaraṃ mahogho viya parittaṃ udakaṃ pharitvā pariyādiyitvā attano okāsaṃ katvā tiṭṭhati, tassa vipākaṃ paṭibāhitvā sayameva brahmasahabyataṃ upanetīti. iti idaṃ suttaṃ ādimhi kilesavasena vuṭṭhāya avasāne brahmavihāravasena gahitattā yathānusandhināva gataṃ.

[03] 361^b^.^eb^ navame ^b^dubbhikkhā^eb^ti dullabhabhikkhā. ^b^dvīhitikā^eb^ti ``jīvissāma nu kho na nu kho''ti evaṃ pavattaīhitikā. ``duhitikā''tipi pāṭho. ayameva attho. dukkhā īhiti ettha na sakkā koci payogo sukhena kātunti ^b^duhitikā^eb^. tattha tattha matamanussānaṃ vippakiṇṇāni setāni aṭṭhikāni etthāti ^b^setaṭṭhikā. salākāvuttā^eb^ti salākamattavuttā, yaṃ tattha vuttaṃ vāpitaṃ, taṃ salākamattameva ahosi, phale na janayatīti attho.

[03] ^b^uggilitu^eb^nti ^a^M3.0144^ea^ dve ante mocetvā kathetuṃ asakkonto uggilituṃ bahi nīharituṃ na sakkhīti ^a^V3.0144^ea^. ^b^ogilitu^eb^nti pucchāya dosaṃ disvā hāretuṃ asakkonto ogilituṃ anto pavesetuṃ na sakkhīti.

[03] ^b^ito so gāmaṇi ekanavutikappe^eb^ti bhagavā kathayamānova yāva nikkhanto nāsikavāto na puna pavisati, tāvatakena kālena ekanavutikappe anussari ``atthi nu kho kiñci kule pakkabhikkhādānena upahatapubba''nti parijānanatthaṃ. athekampi ^a^P3.0107^ea^ apassanto ``ito so, gāmaṇī''tiādimāha. idāni dānādīnaṃ ānisaṃsaṃ kathento ^b^atha kho yāni tāni kulāni aḍḍhānī^eb^ti dhammadesanaṃ ārabhi. tattha ^b^dānasambhūtānī^eb^ti dānena sambhūtāni nibbattāni. sesapadadvayepi eseva nayo. ettha pana ^b^saccaṃ nāma^eb^ saccavāditā. ^b^sāmaññaṃ nāma^eb^ sesasīlaṃ. ^b^vikiratī^eb^ti ayogena vaḷañjento vippakirati. ^b^vidhamatī^eb^ti dhamento viya nāseti. ^b^viddhaṃsetī^eb^ti nāseti. ^b^aniccatā^eb^ti hutvā abhāvo bahunāpi kālena saṅgatānaṃ khaṇeneva antaradhānaṃ.

[03] 362^b^.^eb^ dasame ^b^taṃ parisaṃ etadavocā^eb^ti tassa kira evaṃ ahosi ``kulaputtā pabbajantā puttadārañceva jātarūparajatañca pahāyeva pabbajanti, na ca sakkā yaṃ pahāya pabbajitā, taṃ tehi gahetu''nti nayaggāhe ṭhatvā ``mā ayyo''tiādivacanaṃ avoca. ^b^ekaṃseneta^eb^nti etaṃ pañcakāmaguṇakappanaṃ assamaṇadhammo asakyaputtiyadhammoti ekaṃsena dhāreyyāsi.

[03] ^b^tiṇa^eb^nti senāsanacchadanatiṇaṃ. ^b^pariyesitabba^eb^nti tiṇacchadane vā iṭṭhakacchadane vā gehe palujjante yehi taṃ kāritaṃ, tesaṃ santikaṃ gantvā ``tumhehi kāritasenāsanaṃ ovassati, na sakkā tattha vasitu''nti ācikkhitabbaṃ. manussā sakkontā karissanti, asakkontā ``tumhe vaḍḍhakiṃ gahetvā kārāpetha, mayaṃ te saññāpessāmā''ti vakkhanti. evaṃ vutte kāretvā tesaṃ ācikkhitabbaṃ. manussā vaḍḍhakīnaṃ dātabbaṃ dassanti. sace āvāsasāmikā natthi, aññesampi bhikkhācāravattena ārocetvā kāretuṃ vaṭṭati. idaṃ sandhāya ``pariyesitabba''nti vuttaṃ.

[03] ^b^dāru^eb^nti ^a^V3.0145^ea^ ^a^M3.0145^ea^ senāsane gopānasiādīsu palujjamānesu tadatthāya dāruṃ. ^b^sakaṭa^eb^nti gihivikataṃ katvā tāvakālikasakaṭaṃ. na kevalañca sakaṭameva, aññampi vāsipharasukuddālādiupakaraṇaṃ evaṃ pariyesituṃ vaṭṭati. ^b^puriso^eb^ti hatthakammavasena puriso pariyesitabbo. yaṃkiñci hi purisaṃ ``hatthakammaṃ ^a^P3.0108^ea^, āvuso, katvā dassasī''ti vatvā ``dassāmi, bhante,''ti vutte ``idañcidañca karohī''ti yaṃ icchati, taṃ kāretuṃ vaṭṭati. ^b^na tvevāhaṃ, gāmaṇi, kenaci pariyāyenā^eb^ti jātarūparajataṃ panāhaṃ kenacipi kāraṇena pariyesitabbanti na vadāmi.

[03] 363^b^.^eb^ ekādasame ^b^mallesū^eb^ti evaṃnāmake janapade. ^b^vadhenā^eb^ti māraṇena. ^b^jāniyā^eb^ti dhanajāniyā. ^b^akālikena pattenā^eb^ti na kālantarena pattena, kālaṃ anatikkamitvāva pattenāti attho. ^b^ciravāsī nāma kumāro^eb^ti evaṃnāmako tassa putto. ^b^bahi āvasathe paṭivasatī^eb^ti bahinagare kiñcideva sippaṃ uggaṇhanto vasati. imasmiṃ sutte vaṭṭadukkhaṃ kathitaṃ.

[03] 364^b^.^eb^ dvādasame ^b^rāsiyo^eb^ti rāsiṃ katvā pañhassa pucchitattā rāsiyoti evaṃ dhammasaṅgāhakattherehi gahitanāmo. ^b^tapassi^eb^nti tapanissitakaṃ. ^b^lūkhajīvi^eb^nti lūkhajīvikaṃ. ^b^antā^eb^ti koṭṭhāsā. ^b^gāmo^eb^ti gāmmo. gammotipi pāṭho, gāmavāsīnaṃ dhammoti attho. ^b^attakilamathānuyogo^eb^ti attano kilamathānuyogo, sarīradukkhakaraṇanti attho.

[03] kasmā panettha kāmasukhallikānuyogo gahito, kasmā attakilamathānuyogo, kasmā majjhimā paṭipadāti? kāmasukhallikānuyogo tāva kāmabhogīnaṃ dassanatthaṃ gahito, attakilamathānuyogo tapanissitakānaṃ, majjhimā paṭipadā tiṇṇaṃ nijjaravatthūnaṃ dassanatthaṃ gahitā. kiṃ etesaṃ dassane payojananti? ime dve ante pahāya tathāgato majjhimāya paṭipadāya sammāsambodhiṃ patto. so kāmabhoginopi na sabbe garahati na pasaṃsati, tapanissitakepi na sabbe garahati na ^a^M3.0146^ea^ pasaṃsati, garahitabbayuttakeyeva garahati, pasaṃsitabbayuttake ^a^P3.0109^ea^ pasaṃsatīti imassatthassa pakāsanaṃ etesaṃ dassane payojananti veditabbaṃ.

[03] idāni ^a^V3.0146^ea^ tamatthaṃ pakāsento ^b^tayo khome, gāmaṇi, kāmabhogino^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^sāhasenā^eb^ti sāhasikakammena. ^b^na saṃvibhajatī^eb^ti mittasahāyasandiṭṭhasambhattānaṃ saṃvibhāgaṃ na karoti. ^b^na puññāni karotī^eb^ti anāgatabhavassa paccayabhūtāni puññāni na karoti. ^b^dhammādhammenā^eb^ti dhammena ca adhammena ca. ^b^ṭhānehī^eb^ti kāraṇehi. ^b^sacchikarotī^eb^ti kathaṃ attānaṃ ātāpento paritāpento sacchikaroti? caturaṅgavīriyavasena ca dhutaṅgavasena ca. ^b^tisso sandiṭṭhikā nijjarā^eb^ti ettha ekopi maggo tiṇṇaṃ kilesānaṃ nijjaraṇatāya tisso nijjarāti vuttoti.

[03] 365^b^.^eb^ terasame ^b^dūteyyānī^eb^ti dūtakammāni paṇṇāni ceva mukhasāsanāni ca. ^b^pāṇātipātañcāha^eb^nti idaṃ kasmā āraddhaṃ? na kevalaṃ ahaṃ māyaṃ jānāmi, aññampi idañcidañca jānāmīti sabbaññubhāvadassanatthaṃ āraddhaṃ. ^b^santi hi, gāmaṇi, eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā^eb^ti idaṃ sesasamaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ laddhiṃ dassetvā tassā pajahāpanatthaṃ āraddhaṃ.

[03] ^b^mālī kuṇḍalī^eb^ti mālāya mālī, kuṇḍalehi kuṇḍalī. ^b^itthikāmehī^eb^ti itthīhi saddhiṃ kāmā itthikāmā, tehi itthikāmehi. ^b^āvasathāgāra^eb^nti kulagharassa ekasmiṃ ṭhāne ekekasseva sukhanivāsatthāya kataṃ vāsāgāraṃ. ^b^tenāhaṃ yathāsatti yathābalaṃ saṃvibhajāmī^eb^ti tassāhaṃ attano sattianurūpena ceva balānurūpena ca saṃvibhāgaṃ karomi. ^b^ala^eb^nti yuttaṃ. ^b^kaṅkhaniye ṭhāne^eb^ti kaṅkhitabbe kāraṇe. ^b^cittasamādhi^eb^nti tasmiṃ dhammasamādhismiṃ ṭhito tvaṃ saha vipassanāya catunnaṃ maggānaṃ vasena cittasamādhiṃ sace paṭilabheyyāsīti dasseti. ^b^apaṇṇakatāya^eb^ ^a^P3.0110^ea^ ^b^mayha^eb^nti ayaṃ paṭipadā mayhaṃ apaṇṇakatāya anaparādhakatāya eva saṃvattatīti attho. ^b^kaṭaggāho^eb^ti jayaggāho.

[03] ^b^ayaṃ kho, gāmaṇi, dhammasamādhi, tatra ce tvaṃ cittasamādhiṃ paṭilabheyyāsī^eb^ti ettha ^b^dhammasamādhī^eb^ti dasakusalakammapathadhammā, ^b^cittasamādhī^eb^ti saha vipassanāya ^a^M3.0147^ea^ cattāro maggā. atha vā ``pāmojjaṃ jāyati, pamuditassa pīti jāyatī''ti (a0 ni0 5.26) evaṃ vuttā pāmojjapītipassaddhisukhasamādhisaṅkhātā pañca dhammā dhammasamādhi nāma, cittasamādhi pana saha vipassanāya ^a^V3.0147^ea^ cattāro maggāva. atha vā dasakusalakammapathā cattāro brahmavihārā cāti ayaṃ dhammasamādhi nāma, taṃ dhammasamādhiṃ pūrentassa uppannā cittekaggatā cittasamādhi nāma. ^b^evaṃ tvaṃ imaṃ kaṅkhādhammaṃ pajaheyyāsī^eb^ti evaṃ tvaṃ imasmiṃ vuttappabhede dhammasamādhismiṃ ṭhito sace evaṃ cittasamādhiṃ paṭilabheyyāsi, ekaṃsenetaṃ kaṅkhaṃ pajaheyyāsīti attho. sesaṃ sabbattha vuttanayamevāti.
[06] gāmaṇisaṃyuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 366-376^b^.^eb^ asaṅkhatasaṃyutte ^a^V3.0148^ea^ ^a^M3.0148^ea^ ^a^P3.0111^ea^ ^b^asaṅkhata^eb^nti akataṃ. ^b^hitesinā^eb^ti hitaṃ esantena. ^b^anukampakenā^eb^ti anukampamānena. ^b^anukampaṃ upādāyā^eb^ti anukampaṃ cittena pariggahetvā, paṭiccātipi vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^kataṃ vo taṃ mayā^eb^ti taṃ mayā imaṃ asaṅkhatañca asaṅkhatamaggañca desentena tumhākaṃ kataṃ. ettakameva hi anukampakassa satthu kiccaṃ, yadidaṃ aviparītadhammadesanā. ito paraṃ pana paṭipatti nāma sāvakānaṃ kiccaṃ. tenāha ^b^etāni, bhikkhave, rukkhamūlāni...pe0... amhākaṃ anusāsanī^eb^ti iminā rukkhamūlasenāsanaṃ dasseti. ^b^suññāgārānī^eb^ti iminā janavivittaṃ ṭhānaṃ. ubhayena ca yogānurūpaṃ senāsanaṃ ācikkhati, dāyajjaṃ niyyāteti.

[03] ^b^jhāyathā^eb^ti ārammaṇūpanijjhānena aṭṭhatiṃsārammaṇāni, lakkhaṇūpanijjhānena ca aniccādito khandhāyatanādīni upanijjhāyatha, samathañca vipassanañca vaḍḍhethāti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^mā pamādatthā^eb^ti mā pamajjittha. ^b^mā pacchā vippaṭisārino ahuvatthā^eb^ti ye hi pubbe daharakāle arogakāle sattasappāyādisampattikāle satthu sammukhībhāvakāle ca yonisomanasikārarahitā rattindivaṃ maṅkulabhattaṃ hutvā seyyasukhaṃ middhasukhaṃ anubhontā pamajjanti, te pacchā jarākāle rogakāle maraṇakāle vipattikāle satthu parinibbutakāle ca taṃ pubbe pamādavihāraṃ anussarantā sappaṭisandhikālakiriyañca bhāriyaṃ sampassamānā vippaṭisārino honti. tumhe pana tādisā mā ahuvatthāti dassento āha ^a^P3.0112^ea^ ``mā pacchā vippaṭisārino ahuvatthā''ti.
[03] ^b^ayaṃ ^a^V3.0149^ea^ vo amhākaṃ anusāsanī^eb^ti ayaṃ amhākaṃ santikā ``jhāyatha mā pamādatthā''ti tumhākaṃ anusāsanī, ovādoti vuttaṃ hoti.
[03] 377-409^b^.^eb^ ^b^kāye^eb^ ^a^M3.0149^ea^ ^b^kāyānupassī^eb^tiādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ parato vakkhāma.

[03] ^b^anata^eb^ntiādīsu taṇhānatiyā abhāvena anataṃ. catunnaṃ āsavānaṃ abhāvena ^b^anāsavaṃ^eb^. paramatthasaccatāya ^b^saccaṃ^eb^. vaṭṭassa parabhāgaṭṭhena ^b^pāraṃ^eb^. saṇhaṭṭhena ^b^nipuṇaṃ^eb^. suṭṭhu duddasatāya ^b^sududdasaṃ^eb^. jarāya ajaritattā ^b^ajajjaraṃ^eb^. thiraṭṭhena ^b^dhuvaṃ^eb^. apalujjanatāya ^b^apalokitaṃ^eb^. cakkhuviññāṇena apassitabbattā ^b^anidassanaṃ^eb^. taṇhāmānadiṭṭhipapañcānaṃ abhāvena ^b^nippapañcaṃ^eb^.

[03] santabhāvaṭṭhena ^b^santaṃ^eb^. maraṇābhāvena ^b^amataṃ^eb^. uttamaṭṭhena ^b^paṇītaṃ^eb^. sassirikaṭṭhena ^b^sivaṃ^eb^. nirupaddavatāya ^b^khemaṃ^eb^. taṇhākkhayassa paccayattā ^b^taṇhakkhayaṃ^eb^.

[03] vimhāpanīyaṭṭhena accharaṃ paharitabbayuttakanti ^b^acchariyaṃ^eb^. abhūtameva bhūtaṃ ajātaṃ hutvā atthīti vā ^b^abbhutaṃ^eb^. niddukkhattā ^b^anītikaṃ^eb^. niddukkhasabhāvattā ^b^anītikadhammaṃ^eb^. vānābhāvena ^b^nibbānaṃ^eb^. byābajjhābhāveneva ^b^abyābajjhaṃ^eb^. virāgādhigamassa paccayato ^b^virāgaṃ^eb^. paramatthasuddhitāya ^b^suddhi^eb^. tīhi bhavehi muttatāya ^b^mutti^eb^. kāmālayānaṃ abhāvena ^b^anālayaṃ^eb^. patiṭṭhaṭṭhena ^b^dīpaṃ^eb^. allīyitabbayuttaṭṭhena ^b^leṇaṃ^eb^. tāyanaṭṭhena ^b^tāṇaṃ^eb^. bhayasaraṇaṭṭhena ^b^saraṇaṃ,^eb^ bhayanāsananti attho. paraṃ ayanaṃ gati patiṭṭhāti ^b^parāyaṇaṃ^eb^. sesamettha vuttanayamevāti.
[06] asaṅkhatasaṃyuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 410^b^.^eb^ abyākatasaṃyuttassa ^a^V3.0150^ea^ ^a^P3.0113^ea^ ^a^M3.0150^ea^ paṭhame ^b^khemā^eb^ti gihikāle bimbisārassa upāsikā saddhāpabbajitā mahātherī ``etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvikānaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ mahāpaññānaṃ yadidaṃ khemā''ti evaṃ bhagavatā mahāpaññatāya etadagge ṭhapitā. ^b^paṇḍitā^eb^ti paṇḍiccena samannāgatā. ^b^viyattā^eb^ti veyyattiyena samannāgatā. ^b^medhāvinī^eb^ti medhāya paññāya samannāgatā. ^b^bahussutā^eb^ti pariyattibāhusaccenapi paṭivedhabāhusaccenapi samannāgatā.

[03] ^b^gaṇako^eb^ti acchiddakagaṇanāya kusalo. ^b^muddiko^eb^ti aṅgulimuddāya gaṇanāya kusalo. ^b^saṅkhāyako^eb^ti piṇḍagaṇanāya kusalo. ^b^gambhīro^eb^ti caturāsītiyojanasahassagambhīro. ^b^appameyyo^eb^ti āḷhakagaṇanāya appameyyo. ^b^duppariyogāho^eb^ti āḷhakagaṇanāya pamāṇagahaṇatthaṃ durogāho. ^b^yena rūpena tathāgata^eb^nti yena rūpena dīgho rasso sāmo odātoti sattasaṅkhātaṃ tathāgataṃ paññapeyya. ^b^taṃ rūpaṃ tathāgatassa pahīna^eb^nti taṃ vuttappakārarūpaṃ samudayappahānena sabbaññutathāgatassa pahīnaṃ. ^b^rūpasaṅkhāya vimutto^eb^ti āyatiṃ rūpassa anuppattiyā rūpārūpakoṭṭhāsenapi evarūpo nāma bhavissatīti vohārassapi paṭipassaddhattā rūpapaṇṇattiyāpi vimutto. ^b^gambhīro^eb^ti ajjhāsaya gambhīratāya ca guṇagambhīratāya ca gambhīro. tassa evaṃ guṇagambhīrassa sato sabbaññutathāgatassa yaṃ upādāya sattasaṅkhāto tathāgatoti paññatti hoti, tadabhāvena tassā paññattiyā abhāvaṃ passantassa ayaṃ sattasaṅkhāto ^b^hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā^eb^ti idaṃ vacanaṃ na upeti na yujjati, ^b^na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā^eb^tiādivacanampi na upeti na yujjatīti attho.

[03] ^b^saṃsandissatī^eb^ti ^a^P3.0114^ea^ ekaṃ bhavissati. ^b^samessatī^eb^ti nirantaraṃ bhavissati. ^b^na virodhayissatī^eb^ti ^a^V3.0151^ea^ na viruddhaṃ padaṃ bhavissati. ^b^aggapadasmi^eb^nti desanāya. desanā hi idha aggapadanti adhippetā.
[03] 411^b^.^eb^ dutiyaṃ ^a^M3.0151^ea^ ^b^khandhiyavagge^eb^ vitthāritameva, abyākatādhikārato pana idha vuttaṃ.

[03] 412-417^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^b^rūpagatameta^eb^nti rūpamattametaṃ. ettha rūpato añño koci satto nāma na upalabbhati, rūpe pana sati nāmamattaṃ etaṃ hotīti dasseti. ^b^vedanāgatameta^eb^ntiādīsupi eseva nayo. ^b^ayaṃ kho āvuso hetū^eb^ti ayaṃ rūpādīni muñcitvā anupalabbhiyasabhāvo hetu, yenetaṃ abyākataṃ bhagavatāti. catutthādīni uttānatthāneva.

[03] 418^b^.^eb^ navame ^b^kutūhalasālāya^eb^nti kutūhalasālā nāma paccekasālā natthi, yattha pana nānātitthiyā samaṇabrāhmaṇā nānāvidhaṃ kathaṃ pavattenti, sā bahūnaṃ ``ayaṃ kiṃ vadati, ayaṃ kiṃ vadatī''ti kutūhaluppavattiṭṭhānato kutūhalasālāti vuccati. ^b^dūrampi gacchatī^eb^ti yāva ābhassarabrahmalokā gacchati. ^b^imañca kāyaṃ nikkhipatī^eb^ti cuticittena nikkhipati. ^b^anupapanno hotī^eb^ti cutikkhaṇeyeva paṭisandhicittassa anuppannattā anupapanno hoti.

[03] 419^b^.^eb^ dasame ^a^P3.0115^ea^ ^b^tesametaṃ saddhiṃ abhavissā^eb^ti tesaṃ laddhiyā saddhiṃ etaṃ abhavissa.^b^ anulomaṃ abhavissa ñāṇassa uppādāya sabbe dhammā anattā^eb^ti yaṃ etaṃ ``sabbe dhammā anattā''ti vipassanāñāṇaṃ uppajjati, api nu me tassa anulomaṃ abhavissāti attho.

[03] 420^b^.^eb^ ekādasame ^a^V3.0152^ea^ ^a^M3.0152^ea^ ^b^etamettakena ettakamevā^eb^ti āvuso yassāpi etaṃ ettakena kālena ``hetumhi sati rūpītiādi paññāpanā hoti, asati na hotī''ti byākaraṇaṃ bhaveyya, tassa ettakameva bahu. ^b^ko pana vādo atikkante^eb^ti atikkante pana atimanāpe dhammadesanānaye vādoyeva ko, natthi vādo, chinnā kathāti.
[06] abyākatasaṃyuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06] iti sāratthappakāsiniyā saṃyuttanikāya-aṭṭhakathāya
[06] saḷāyatanavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
